124 using item_menu = std::function<item_location( const item_location_filter & )>;

127 struct sub_effect_parser {
128  using f_t = talk_effect_fun_t::func( * )( const JsonObject &, std::string_view );
129  using f_t_beta = talk_effect_fun_t::func( * )( const JsonObject &, std::string_view, bool );
130  using f_t_effect = talk_effect_fun_t ( * )( const JsonObject &, std::string_view );
131  using f_t_beta_effect = talk_effect_fun_t ( * )( const JsonObject &, std::string_view, bool );
132 
133  sub_effect_parser( std::string_view key_alpha_, jarg arg_, f_t f_ ) : key_alpha( key_alpha_ ),
134  arg( arg_ ) {
135  f = [f_]( const JsonObject & jo, std::string_view key, bool ) {
136  return talk_effect_fun_t( f_( jo, key ) );
137  };
138  }
139  sub_effect_parser( std::string_view key_alpha_, std::string_view key_beta_, jarg arg_,
140  f_t_beta f_ ) : key_alpha( key_alpha_ ), key_beta( key_beta_ ), arg( arg_ ) {
141  f = [f_]( const JsonObject & jo, std::string_view key, bool beta ) {
142  return talk_effect_fun_t( f_( jo, key, beta ) );
143  };
144  has_beta = true;
145  }
146  sub_effect_parser( std::string_view key_alpha_,
147  jarg arg_, f_t_effect f_ )
148  : key_alpha( key_alpha_ ), arg( arg_ ) {
149  f = [f_]( const JsonObject & jo, std::string_view key, bool ) {
150  return f_( jo, key );
151  };
152  }
153 
154  bool check( const JsonObject &jo, bool beta = false ) const {
155  std::string_view key = beta ? key_beta : key_alpha;
156  if( ( ( arg & jarg::member ) && jo.has_member( key ) ) ||
157  ( ( arg & jarg::object ) && jo.has_object( key ) ) ||
158  ( ( arg & jarg::string ) && jo.has_string( key ) ) ||
159  ( ( arg & jarg::array ) && jo.has_array( key ) ) ) {
160  return true;
161  }
162  return false;
163  }
164 
165  bool has_beta = false;
166  std::string_view key_alpha;
167  std::string_view key_beta;
168  jarg arg;
169  std::function<talk_effect_fun_t( const JsonObject &, std::string_view, bool )> f;
170 };
171 
172 struct item_search_data {
173  itype_id id;
174  item_category_id category;
175  material_id material;
176  int calories = 0;
177  std::vector<flag_id> flags;
178  std::vector<flag_id> excluded_flags;
179  bool worn_only;
180  bool wielded_only;
181 
182  explicit item_search_data( const JsonObject &jo ) {
183  id = itype_id( jo.get_string( "id", "" ) );
184  category = item_category_id( jo.get_string( "category", "" ) );
185  material = material_id( jo.get_string( "material", "" ) );
186  if( jo.has_int( "calories" ) ) {
187  calories = jo.get_int( "calories" );
188  }
189  for( std::string flag : jo.get_string_array( "flags" ) ) {
190  flags.emplace_back( flag );
191  }
192  for( std::string flag : jo.get_string_array( "excluded_flags" ) ) {
193  excluded_flags.emplace_back( flag );
194  }
195  worn_only = jo.get_bool( "worn_only", false );
196  wielded_only = jo.get_bool( "wielded_only", false );
197  }
198 
199  bool check( const Character *guy, const item_location &loc ) {
200  if( !id.is_empty() && id != loc->typeId() ) {
201  return false;
202  }
203  if( !category.is_empty() && category != loc->get_category_shallow().id ) {
204  return false;
205  }
206  if( !material.is_empty() && loc->made_of( material ) == 0 ) {
207  return false;
208  }
209  if( calories > 0 ) {
210  // This is very stupid but we need a dummy to calculate nutrients
211  npc dummy;
212  if( dummy.compute_effective_nutrients( *loc.get_item() ).kcal() < calories ) {
213  return false;
214  }
215  }
216  for( flag_id flag : flags ) {
217  if( !loc->has_flag( flag ) ) {
218  return false;
219  }
220  }
221  for( flag_id flag : excluded_flags ) {
222  if( loc->has_flag( flag ) ) {
223  return false;
224  }
225  }
226  if( worn_only && !guy->is_worn( *loc ) ) {
227  return false;
228  }
229  if( wielded_only && !guy->is_wielding( *loc ) ) {
230  return false;
231  }
232  return true;
233  }
234 };
235 
236 #define dbg(x) DebugLog((x),D_GAME) << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << ": "
237 
238 static int topic_category( const talk_topic &the_topic );
239 
240 static const talk_topic &special_talk( const std::string &action );
241 
242 static bool friendly_teacher( const Character &student, const Character &teacher )
243 {
244  return ( student.is_npc() && teacher.is_avatar() ) ||
245  ( teacher.is_npc() && teacher.as_npc()->is_player_ally() );
246 }
247 
248 std::string talk_trial::name() const
249 {
250  static const std::array<std::string, NUM_TALK_TRIALS> texts = { {
251  "", translate_marker( "LIE" ), translate_marker( "PERSUADE" ), translate_marker( "INTIMIDATE" ), ""
252  }
253  };
254  if( static_cast<size_t>( type ) >= texts.size() ) {
255  debugmsg( "invalid trial type %d", static_cast<int>( type ) );
256  return std::string();
257  }
258  return texts[type].empty() ? std::string() : _( texts[type] );
259 }
260 
261 static void run_eoc_vector( const std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> &eocs, const dialogue &d )
262 {
263  dialogue newDialog( d );
264  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : eocs ) {
265  eoc->activate( newDialog );
266  }
267 }
268 
269 static std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> load_eoc_vector( const JsonObject &jo,
270  const std::string_view member )
271 {
272  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> eocs;
273  if( jo.has_array( member ) ) {
274  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
275  eocs.push_back( effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jv, "" ) );
276  }
277  } else if( jo.has_member( member ) ) {
278  eocs.push_back( effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jo.get_member( member ), "" ) );
279  }
280  return eocs;
281 }
282 
283 struct eoc_entry {
284  effect_on_condition_id id;
285  std::optional<str_or_var> var;
286 };
287 static std::vector<eoc_entry>
288 load_eoc_vector_id_and_var(
289  const JsonObject &jo, const std::string_view member )
290 {
291  std::vector<eoc_entry> eocs_entries;
292  auto process_jv = [member, &eocs_entries]( const JsonValue & jv ) {
293  eoc_entry entry;
294  if( jv.test_object() ) {
295  JsonObject jo = jv.get_object();
296  jo.allow_omitted_members();
297  if( !jo.has_member( "id" ) ) {
298  entry.var = get_str_or_var( jv, member, false );
299  }
300  }
301  if( !entry.var ) {
302  entry.id = effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jv, "" );
303  }
304  eocs_entries.push_back( entry );
305  };
306  if( jo.has_array( member ) ) {
307  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
308  process_jv( jv );
309  }
310  } else if( jo.has_member( member ) ) {
311  process_jv( jo.get_member( member ) );
312  }
313  return eocs_entries;
314 }
315 
316 
317 /** Time (in turns) and cost (in cent) for training: */
318 time_duration calc_skill_training_time_char( const Character &teacher, const Character &student,
319  const skill_id &skill )
320 {
321  return 1_hours + 30_minutes * student.get_skill_level( skill ) -
322  1_minutes * teacher.get_skill_level( skill );
323 }
324 
325 int calc_skill_training_cost_char( const Character &teacher, const Character &student,
326  const skill_id &skill )
327 {
328  if( friendly_teacher( student, teacher ) ) {
329  return 0;
330  }
331  int skill_level = student.get_knowledge_level( skill );
332  return 1000 * ( 1 + skill_level ) * ( 1 + skill_level );
333 }
334 
335 time_duration calc_proficiency_training_time( const Character &, const Character &student,
336  const proficiency_id &proficiency )
337 {
338  return std::min( 30_minutes, student.proficiency_training_needed( proficiency ) );
339 }
340 
341 int calc_proficiency_training_cost( const Character &teacher, const Character &student,
342  const proficiency_id &proficiency )
343 {
344  if( friendly_teacher( student, teacher ) ) {
345  return 0;
346  }
347  return to_seconds<int>( calc_proficiency_training_time( teacher, student, proficiency ) );
348 }
349 
350 // TODO: all styles cost the same and take the same time to train,
351 // maybe add values to the ma_style class to makes this variable
352 // TODO: maybe move this function into the ma_style class? Or into the NPC class?
353 time_duration calc_ma_style_training_time( const Character &, const Character &,
354  const matype_id & )
355 {
356  return 30_minutes;
357 }
358 
359 int calc_ma_style_training_cost( const Character &teacher, const Character &student,
360  const matype_id & )
361 {
362  if( friendly_teacher( student, teacher ) ) {
363  return 0;
364  }
365  return 800;
366 }
367 
368 // quicker to learn with instruction as opposed to books.
369 // if this is a known spell, then there is a set time to gain some exp.
370 // if player doesn't know this spell, then the NPC will teach all of it
371 // which takes max 6 hours, min 3 hours.
372 // TODO: a system for NPCs to train new stuff in bits and pieces
373 // and remember the progress.
374 time_duration calc_spell_training_time( const Character &, const Character &student,
375  const spell_id &id )
376 {
377  if( student.magic->knows_spell( id ) ) {
378  return 1_hours;
379  } else {
380  const int time_int = student.magic->time_to_learn_spell( student, id ) / 50;
381  return time_duration::from_seconds( clamp( time_int, 7200, 21600 ) );
382  }
383 }
384 
385 static int calc_spell_training_cost_gen( const bool knows, int difficulty, int level )
386 {
387  int ret = ( 100 * std::max( 1, difficulty ) * std::max( 1, level ) );
388  if( !knows ) {
389  ret = ret * 2;
390  }
391  return ret;
392 }
393 
394 int calc_spell_training_cost( const Character &teacher, const Character &student,
395  const spell_id &id )
396 {
397  if( friendly_teacher( student, teacher ) ) {
398  return 0;
399  }
400  const spell &temp_spell = teacher.magic->get_spell( id );
401  const bool knows = student.magic->knows_spell( id );
402  return calc_spell_training_cost_gen( knows, temp_spell.get_difficulty( student ),
403  temp_spell.get_level() );
404 }
405 
406 int Character::calc_spell_training_cost( const bool knows, int difficulty, int level ) const
407 {
408  const npc *n = as_npc();
409  if( !n || n->is_player_ally() ) {
410  return 0;
411  }
412  return calc_spell_training_cost_gen( knows, difficulty, level );
413 }
414 
415 // Rescale values from "mission scale" to "opinion scale"
416 int npc_trading::cash_to_favor( const npc &, int cash )
417 {
418  // TODO: It should affect different NPCs to a different degree
419  // Square root of mission value in dollars
420  // ~31 for zed mom, 50 for horde master, ~63 for plutonium cells
421  double scaled_mission_val = std::sqrt( cash / 100.0 );
422  return roll_remainder( scaled_mission_val );
423 }

468 
469 // given a vector of NPCs, presents a menu to allow a player to pick one.
470 // everyone == true adds another entry at the end to allow selecting all listed NPCs
471 // this implies a return value of npc_list.size() means "everyone"
472 static int npc_select_menu( const std::vector<npc *> &npc_list, const std::string &prompt,
473  const bool everyone = true )
474 {
475  if( npc_list.empty() ) {
476  return -1;
477  }
478  const int npc_count = npc_list.size();
479  if( npc_count == 1 ) {
480  return 0;
481  } else {
482  uilist nmenu;
483  std::vector<tripoint> locations;
484  nmenu.text = prompt;
485  for( const npc *elem : npc_list ) {
486  nmenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, elem->name_and_activity() );
487  locations.emplace_back( elem->pos_bub().raw() );
488  }
489  if( npc_count > 1 && everyone ) {
490  nmenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Everyone" ) );
491  locations.emplace_back( get_avatar().pos_bub().raw() );
492  }
493  pointmenu_cb callback( locations );
494  nmenu.callback = &callback;
495  nmenu.w_y_setup = 0;
496  nmenu.query();
497  return nmenu.ret;
498  }
499 
500 }
501 
502 static int creature_select_menu( const std::vector<Creature *> &talker_list,
503  const std::string &prompt,
504  const bool everyone = true )
505 {
506  if( talker_list.empty() ) {
507  return -1;
508  }
509  const int npc_count = talker_list.size();
510  if( npc_count == 1 ) {
511  return 0;
512  } else {
513  uilist nmenu;
514  std::vector<tripoint> locations;
515  nmenu.text = prompt;
516  for( const Creature *elem : talker_list ) {
517  if( elem->is_npc() ) {
518  nmenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, elem->as_npc()->name_and_activity() );
519  } else {
520  nmenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, elem->disp_name() );
521  }
522  locations.emplace_back( elem->pos_bub().raw() );
523  }
524  if( npc_count > 1 && everyone ) {
525  nmenu.addentry( -1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Everyone" ) );
526  locations.emplace_back( get_avatar().pos_bub().raw() );
527  }
528  pointmenu_cb callback( locations );
529  nmenu.callback = &callback;
530  nmenu.w_y_setup = 0;
531  nmenu.query();
532  return nmenu.ret;
533  }
534 }
535 
536 std::vector<int> npcs_select_menu( const std::vector<Character *> &npc_list,
537  const std::string &prompt,
538  const std::function<bool( const Character * )> &exclude_func )
539 {
540  std::vector<int> picked;
541  if( npc_list.empty() ) {
542  return picked;
543  }
544  const int npc_count = npc_list.size();
545  int last_index = 0;
546  do {
547  uilist nmenu;
548  nmenu.text = prompt;
549  for( int i = 0; i < npc_count; i++ ) {
550  std::string entry;
551  if( std::find( picked.begin(), picked.end(), i ) != picked.end() ) {
552  entry = "* ";
553  }
554  bool enable = exclude_func == nullptr || !exclude_func( npc_list[i] );
555  entry += npc_list[i]->name_and_maybe_activity();
556  nmenu.addentry( i, enable, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, entry );
557  }
558  nmenu.addentry( npc_count, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Finish selection" ) );
559  nmenu.selected = nmenu.fselected = last_index;
560  nmenu.query();
561  if( nmenu.ret < 0 ) {
562  return std::vector<int>();
563  } else if( nmenu.ret >= npc_count ) {
564  break;
565  }
566  std::vector<int>::iterator exists = std::find( picked.begin(), picked.end(), nmenu.ret );
567  if( exists != picked.end() ) {
568  picked.erase( exists );
569  } else {
570  picked.push_back( nmenu.ret );
571  }
572  last_index = nmenu.fselected;
573  } while( true );
574  return picked;
575 }
576 
577 static std::string training_select_menu( const Character &c, const std::string &prompt )
578 {
579  int i = 0;
580  uilist nmenu;
581  nmenu.text = prompt;
582  std::vector<std::string> trainlist;
583  for( const std::pair<const skill_id, SkillLevel> &s : *c._skills ) {
584  bool enabled = s.first->is_teachable() && s.second.level() > 0;
585  std::string entry = string_format( "%s: %s (%d)", _( "Skill" ), s.first->name(), s.second.level() );
586  nmenu.addentry( i, enabled, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, entry );
587  trainlist.emplace_back( s.first.c_str() );
588  i++;
589  }
590  for( const proficiency_id &p : c.known_proficiencies() ) {
591  std::string entry = string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Proficiency" ), p->name() );
592  nmenu.addentry( i, p->is_teachable(), MENU_AUTOASSIGN, entry );
593  trainlist.emplace_back( p.c_str() );
594  i++;
595  }
596  for( const matype_id &m : c.known_styles( true ) ) {
597  std::string entry = string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Style" ), m->name.translated() );
598  nmenu.addentry( i, m->teachable, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, entry );
599  trainlist.emplace_back( m.c_str() );
600  i++;
601  }
602  for( const spell_id &s : c.magic->spells() ) {
603  std::string entry = string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Spell" ), s->name.translated() );
604  nmenu.addentry( i, s->teachable, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, entry );
605  trainlist.emplace_back( s.c_str() );
606  i++;
607  }
608  nmenu.query();
609  if( nmenu.ret > -1 && nmenu.ret < static_cast<int>( trainlist.size() ) ) {
610  return trainlist[nmenu.ret];
611  }
612  return "";
613 }
614 
615 static void npc_batch_override_toggle(
616  const std::vector<npc *> &npc_list, ally_rule rule, bool state )
617 {
618  for( npc *p : npc_list ) {
619  p->rules.toggle_specific_override_state( rule, state );
620  }
621 }
622 
623 static void npc_temp_orders_menu( const std::vector<npc *> &npc_list )
624 {
625  if( npc_list.empty() ) {
626  return;
627  }
628  npc *guy = npc_list.front();
629  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
630  bool done = false;
631  uilist nmenu;
632 
633  while( !done ) {
634  int override_count = 0;
635  std::string output_string = string_format( _( "%s currently has these temporary orders:" ),
636  guy->get_name() );
637  for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
638  if( guy->rules.has_override_enable( rule.second.rule ) ) {
639  override_count++;
640  output_string += "\n ";
641  output_string += ( guy->rules.has_override( rule.second.rule ) ? rule.second.rule_true_text :
642  rule.second.rule_false_text );
643  }
644  }
645  if( override_count == 0 ) {
646  output_string += std::string( "\n " ) + _( "None." ) + "\n";
647  }
648  if( npc_list.size() > 1 ) {
649  output_string += std::string( "\n" ) +
650  _( "Other followers might have different temporary orders." );
651  }
652  nmenu.reset();
653  nmenu.text = _( "Issue what temporary order?" );
654  nmenu.desc_enabled = true;
655  parse_tags( output_string, player_character, *guy );
656  nmenu.footer_text = output_string;
657  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_DONE, true, 'd', _( "Done issuing orders" ) );
658  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_FORBID_ENGAGE, true, 'f',
659  guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::forbid_engage ) ?
660  _( "Go back to your usual engagement habits" ) : _( "Don't engage hostiles for the time being" ) );
661  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_NO_GUNS, true, 'g', guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::use_guns ) ?
662  _( "Use whatever weapon you normally would" ) : _( "Don't use ranged weapons for a while" ) );
663  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_PULP, true, 'p', guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::allow_pulp ) ?
664  _( "Pulp zombies if you like" ) : _( "Hold off on pulping zombies for a while" ) );
665  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_FOLLOW_CLOSE, true, 'c',
666  guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::follow_close ) &&
667  guy->rules.has_override( ally_rule::follow_close ) ?
668  _( "Go back to keeping your usual distance" ) : _( "Stick close to me for now" ) );
669  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_MOVE_FREELY, true, 'm',
670  guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::follow_close ) &&
671  !guy->rules.has_override( ally_rule::follow_close ) ?
672  _( "Go back to keeping your usual distance" ) : _( "Move farther from me if you need to" ) );
673  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_SLEEP, true, 's',
674  guy->rules.has_override_enable( ally_rule::allow_sleep ) ?
675  _( "Go back to your usual sleeping habits" ) : _( "Take a nap if you need it" ) );
676  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_CLEAR_OVERRIDES, true, 'o', _( "Let's go back to your usual behaviors" ) );
677  nmenu.query();
678 
679  switch( nmenu.ret ) {
680  case NPC_CHAT_FORBID_ENGAGE:
681  npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::forbid_engage, true );
682  break;
683  case NPC_CHAT_NO_GUNS:
684  npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::use_guns, false );
685  break;
686  case NPC_CHAT_PULP:
687  npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::allow_pulp, false );
688  break;
689  case NPC_CHAT_FOLLOW_CLOSE:
690  npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::follow_close, true );
691  break;
692  case NPC_CHAT_MOVE_FREELY:
693  npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::follow_close, false );
694  break;
695  case NPC_CHAT_SLEEP:
696  npc_batch_override_toggle( npc_list, ally_rule::allow_sleep, true );
697  break;
698  case NPC_CHAT_CLEAR_OVERRIDES:
699  for( npc *p : npc_list ) {
700  p->rules.clear_overrides();
701  }
702  break;
703  default:
704  done = true;
705  break;
706  }
707  }
708 
709 }
710 
711 static int npc_activities_menu()
712 {
713  uilist nmenu;
714  nmenu.text = _( "What should be worked on?" );
715 
716  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_MOVE_LOOT, true, 'l', _( "Organizing loot into zones" ) );
717  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_BUTCHERY, true, 'b', _( "Butchering corpses" ) );
718  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_CHOP_TREES, true, 't', _( "Chopping down trees" ) );
719  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_CHOP_PLANKS, true, 'p', _( "Chopping logs into planks" ) );
720  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_CONSTRUCTION, true, 'c', _( "Constructing blueprints" ) );
721  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_CRAFT, true, 'C', _( "Crafting item" ) );
722  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_DISASSEMBLY, true, 'd', _( "Disassembly of items" ) );
723  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_FARMING, true, 'f', _( "Farming plots" ) );
724  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_FISHING, true, 'F', _( "Fishing in a zone" ) );
725  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_MINING, true, 'M', _( "Mining out tiles" ) );
726  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_MOPPING, true, 'm', _( "Mopping up stains" ) );
727  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_READ_REPEATEDLY, true, 'R',
728  _( "Study from books you have in order" ) );
729  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION, true, 'v',
730  _( "Deconstructing vehicles" ) );
731  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_VEHICLE_REPAIR, true, 'V', _( "Repairing vehicles" ) );
732  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_UNASSIGN, true, '-',
733  _( "Taking it easy (Stop what they are working on)" ) );
734 
735  nmenu.query();
736 
737  return nmenu.ret;
738 }
739 
740 static void tell_veh_stop_following()
741 {
742  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
743  for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : get_map().get_vehicles() ) {
744  vehicle *v = veh.v;
745  if( v->has_engine_type( fuel_type_animal, false ) && v->is_owned_by( player_character ) ) {
746  v->is_following = false;
747  v->engine_on = false;
748  }
749  }
750 }
751 
752 static void assign_veh_to_follow()
753 {
754  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
755  for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : get_map().get_vehicles() ) {
756  vehicle *v = veh.v;
757  if( v->has_engine_type( fuel_type_animal, false ) && v->is_owned_by( player_character ) ) {
758  v->activate_animal_follow();
759  }
760  }
761 }
762 
763 static void tell_magic_veh_to_follow()
764 {
765  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
766  for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : get_map().get_vehicles() ) {
767  vehicle *v = veh.v;
768  if( v->magic ) {
769  for( const vpart_reference &vp : v->get_all_parts() ) {
770  const vpart_info &vpi = vp.info();
771  if( vpi.has_flag( "MAGIC_FOLLOW" ) && v->is_owned_by( player_character ) ) {
772  v->activate_magical_follow();
773  break;
774  }
775  }
776  }
777  }
778 }
779 
780 static void tell_magic_veh_stop_following()
781 {
782  for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : get_map().get_vehicles() ) {
783  vehicle *v = veh.v;
784  if( v->magic ) {
785  for( const vpart_reference &vp : v->get_all_parts() ) {
786  const vpart_info &vpi = vp.info();
787  if( vpi.has_flag( "MAGIC_FOLLOW" ) ) {
788  v->is_following = false;
789  v->engine_on = false;
790  break;
791  }
792  }
793  }
794  }
795 }
796 
797 void game::chat()
798 {
799  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
800  int volume = player_character.get_shout_volume();
801 
802  const std::vector<Creature *> available = get_creatures_if( [&]( const Creature & guy ) {
803  // TODO: Get rid of the z-level check when z-level vision gets "better"
804  return ( guy.is_npc() || ( guy.is_monster() &&
805  guy.as_monster()->has_flag( mon_flag_CONVERSATION ) &&
806  !guy.as_monster()->type->chat_topics.empty() ) ) && u.posz() == guy.posz() && u.sees( guy.pos() ) &&
807  rl_dist( u.pos(), guy.pos() ) <= SEEX * 2;
808  } );
809  const int available_count = available.size();
810  const std::vector<npc *> followers = get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
811  return guy.is_player_ally() && guy.is_following() && guy.can_hear( u.pos(), volume );
812  } );
813  const int follower_count = followers.size();
814  const std::vector<npc *> guards = get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
815  return guy.mission == NPC_MISSION_GUARD_ALLY &&
816  guy.companion_mission_role_id != "FACTION_CAMP" &&
817  guy.can_hear( u.pos(), volume );
818  } );
819  const int guard_count = guards.size();
820 
821  const std::vector<npc *> available_for_activities = get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
822  return guy.is_player_ally() && guy.can_hear( u.pos(), volume ) &&
823  guy.companion_mission_role_id != "FACTION CAMP";
824  } );
825  const int available_for_activities_count = available_for_activities.size();
826 
827  if( player_character.has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) &&
828  !( player_character.is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask ) ||
829  player_character.is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask_on ) ) ) {
830  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You can't speak without your face!" ) );
831  return;
832  }
833  std::vector<vehicle *> animal_vehicles;
834  std::vector<vehicle *> following_vehicles;
835  std::vector<vehicle *> magic_vehicles;
836  std::vector<vehicle *> magic_following_vehicles;
837  for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : get_map().get_vehicles() ) {
838  vehicle *&v = veh.v;
839  if( v->has_engine_type( fuel_type_animal, false ) &&
840  v->is_owned_by( player_character ) ) {
841  animal_vehicles.push_back( v );
842  if( v->is_following ) {
843  following_vehicles.push_back( v );
844  }
845  }
846  if( v->magic ) {
847  for( const vpart_reference &vp : v->get_all_parts() ) {
848  const vpart_info &vpi = vp.info();
849  if( vpi.has_flag( "MAGIC_FOLLOW" ) ) {
850  magic_vehicles.push_back( v );
851  if( v->is_following ) {
852  magic_following_vehicles.push_back( v );
853  }
854  break;
855  }
856  }
857  }
858  }
859 
860  uilist nmenu;
861  nmenu.text = std::string( _( "What do you want to do?" ) );
862 
863  if( !available.empty() ) {
864  const Creature *guy = available.front();
865  std::string title;
866  if( guy->is_npc() ) {
867  title = guy->as_npc()->name_and_activity();
868  } else if( guy->is_monster() ) {
869  title = guy->as_monster()->disp_name();
870  }
871  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_TALK, true, 't', available_count == 1 ?
872  string_format( _( "Talk to %s" ), title ) :
873  _( "Talk to…" ) );
874  }
875 
876  if( !available_for_activities.empty() ) {
877  const Creature *guy = available_for_activities.front();
878  std::string title;
879  if( guy->is_npc() ) {
880  title = guy->as_npc()->name_and_activity();
881  } else if( guy->is_monster() ) {
882  title = guy->as_monster()->disp_name();
883  }
884  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES, true, 'A', available_for_activities_count == 1 ?
885  string_format( _( "Tell %s to work on…" ), title ) :
886  _( "Tell someone to work on…" )
887  );
888  }
889 
890  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_YELL, true, 'a', _( "Yell" ) );
891  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_SENTENCE, true, 'b', _( "Yell a sentence" ) );
892  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_EMOTE, true, 'E', _( "Emote" ) );
893  if( !animal_vehicles.empty() ) {
894  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ANIMAL_VEHICLE_FOLLOW, true, 'F',
895  _( "Whistle at your animals pulling vehicles to follow you." ) );
896  }
897  if( !magic_vehicles.empty() ) {
898  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_COMMAND_MAGIC_VEHICLE_FOLLOW, true, 'Q',
899  _( "Utter a magical command that will order your magical vehicles to follow you." ) );
900  }
901  if( !magic_following_vehicles.empty() ) {
902  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_COMMAND_MAGIC_VEHICLE_STOP_FOLLOW, true, 'q',
903  _( "Utter a magical command that will order your magical vehicles to stop following you." ) );
904  }
905  if( !following_vehicles.empty() ) {
906  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ANIMAL_VEHICLE_STOP_FOLLOW, true, 'S',
907  _( "Whistle at your animals pulling vehicles to stop following you." ) );
908  }
909  if( !guards.empty() ) {
910  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_FOLLOW, true, 'f', guard_count == 1 ?
911  string_format( _( "Tell %s to follow" ), guards.front()->get_name() ) :
912  _( "Tell someone to follow…" )
913  );
914  }
915  if( !followers.empty() ) {
916  bool enable_seminar = !player_character.has_effect( effect_asked_to_train );
917  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_START_SEMINAR, enable_seminar, 'T',
918  enable_seminar ? _( "Start a training seminar" ) :
919  _( "Start a training seminar (You've already taught enough for now)" ) );
920  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_GUARD, true, 'g', follower_count == 1 ?
921  string_format( _( "Tell %s to guard" ), followers.front()->get_name() ) :
922  _( "Tell someone to guard…" )
923  );
924  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_MOVE_TO_POS, true, 'G',
925  follower_count == 1 ? string_format( _( "Tell %s to move to location" ),
926  followers.front()->get_name() ) : _( "Tell someone to move to location…" ) );
927  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_AWAKE, true, 'w', _( "Tell everyone on your team to wake up" ) );
928  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_MOUNT, true, 'M', _( "Tell everyone on your team to mount up" ) );
929  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_DISMOUNT, true, 'm', _( "Tell everyone on your team to dismount" ) );
930  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_DANGER, true, 'D',
931  _( "Tell everyone on your team to prepare for danger" ) );
932  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_CLEAR_OVERRIDES, true, 'r',
933  _( "Tell everyone on your team to relax (Clear Overrides)" ) );
934  nmenu.addentry( NPC_CHAT_ORDERS, true, 'o', _( "Tell everyone on your team to temporarily…" ) );
935  }
936  std::string message;
937  std::string yell_msg;
938  std::string emote_msg;
939  bool is_order = true;
940  nmenu.query();
941 
942  if( nmenu.ret < 0 ) {
943  return;
944  }
945 
946  switch( nmenu.ret ) {
947  case NPC_CHAT_TALK: {
948  const int npcselect = creature_select_menu( available, _( "Talk to whom?" ), false );
949  if( npcselect < 0 ) {
950  return;
951  }
952  get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( *available[npcselect] ) );
953  break;
954  }
955  case NPC_CHAT_YELL:
956  is_order = false;
957  message = _( "loudly." );
958  break;
959  case NPC_CHAT_SENTENCE: {
960  std::string popupdesc = _( "Enter a sentence to yell" );
961  string_input_popup popup;
962  popup.title( _( "Yell a sentence" ) )
963  .width( 64 )
964  .description( popupdesc )
965  .identifier( "sentence" )
966  .max_length( 128 )
967  .query();
968  yell_msg = popup.text();
969  is_order = false;
970  break;
971  }
972  case NPC_CHAT_EMOTE: {
973  std::string popupdesc =
974  _( "What do you want to emote? (This will have no in-game effect!)" );
975  string_input_popup popup;
976  popup.title( _( "Emote" ) )
977  .width( 64 )
978  .description( popupdesc )
979  .identifier( "sentence" )
980  .max_length( 128 )
981  .query();
982  emote_msg = popup.text();
983  is_order = false;
984  break;
985  }
986  case NPC_CHAT_START_SEMINAR: {
987  const std::string &t = training_select_menu( player_character,
988  _( "What would you like to teach?" ) );
989  if( t.empty() ) {
990  return;
991  }
992  int id_type = -1;
993  std::vector<Character *> clist( followers.begin(), followers.end() );
994  const std::string query_str = _( "Who should participate in the training seminar?" );
995  std::vector<int> selected;
996  skill_id sk( t );
997  if( sk.is_valid() ) {
998  selected = npcs_select_menu( clist, query_str, [&]( const Character * n ) {
999  return !n ||
1000  n->get_knowledge_level( sk ) >= static_cast<int>( player_character.get_skill_level( sk ) );
1001  } );
1002  id_type = 0;
1003  }
1004  matype_id ma( t );
1005  if( ma.is_valid() ) {
1006  selected = npcs_select_menu( clist, query_str, [&]( const Character * n ) {
1007  return !n || n->has_martialart( ma );
1008  } );
1009  id_type = 1;
1010  }
1011  proficiency_id pr( t );
1012  if( pr.is_valid() ) {
1013  selected = npcs_select_menu( clist, query_str, [&]( const Character * n ) {
1014  return !n || n->has_proficiency( pr );
1015  } );
1016  id_type = 2;
1017  }
1018  spell_id sp( t );
1019  if( sp.is_valid() ) {
1020  selected = npcs_select_menu( clist, query_str, [&]( const Character * n ) {
1021  return !n || ( n->magic->knows_spell( sp ) &&
1022  n->magic->get_spell( sp ).get_level() >= player_character.magic->get_spell( sp ).get_level() );
1023  } );
1024  id_type = 3;
1025  }
1026  if( selected.empty() ) {
1027  return;
1028  }
1029  std::vector<Character *> to_train;
1030  for( int i : selected ) {
1031  if( followers[i] ) {
1032  to_train.push_back( followers[i] );
1033  }
1034  }
1035  talk_function::teach_domain d;
1036  d.skill = id_type == 0 ? sk : skill_id();
1037  d.style = id_type == 1 ? ma : matype_id();
1038  d.prof = id_type == 2 ? pr : proficiency_id();
1039  d.spell = id_type == 3 ? sp : spell_id();
1040  talk_function::start_training_gen( player_character, to_train, d );
1041  break;
1042  }
1043  case NPC_CHAT_GUARD: {
1044  const int npcselect = npc_select_menu( followers, _( "Who should guard here?" ) );
1045  if( npcselect < 0 ) {
1046  return;
1047  }
1048  if( npcselect == follower_count ) {
1049  for( npc *them : followers ) {
1050  talk_function::assign_guard( *them );
1051  }
1052  yell_msg = _( "Everyone guard here!" );
1053  } else {
1054  talk_function::assign_guard( *followers[npcselect] );
1055  yell_msg = string_format( _( "Guard here, %s!" ), followers[npcselect]->get_name() );
1056  }
1057  break;
1058  }
1059  case NPC_CHAT_MOVE_TO_POS: {
1060  const int npcselect = npc_select_menu( followers, _( "Who should move?" ) );
1061  if( npcselect < 0 ) {
1062  return;
1063  }
1064 
1065  map &here = get_map();
1066  std::optional<tripoint> p = look_around();
1067 
1068  if( !p ) {
1069  return;
1070  }
1071 
1072  if( here.impassable( tripoint( *p ) ) ) {
1073  add_msg( m_info, _( "This destination can't be reached." ) );
1074  return;
1075  }
1076 
1077  if( npcselect == follower_count ) {
1078  for( npc *them : followers ) {
1079  them->goto_to_this_pos = here.getglobal( *p );
1080  }
1081  yell_msg = _( "Everyone move there!" );
1082  } else {
1083  followers[npcselect]->goto_to_this_pos = here.getglobal( *p );
1084  yell_msg = string_format( _( "Move there, %s!" ), followers[npcselect]->get_name() );
1085  }
1086  break;
1087  }
1088  case NPC_CHAT_FOLLOW: {
1089  const int npcselect = npc_select_menu( guards, _( "Who should follow you?" ) );
1090  if( npcselect < 0 ) {
1091  return;
1092  }
1093  if( npcselect == guard_count ) {
1094  for( npc *them : guards ) {
1095  talk_function::stop_guard( *them );
1096  }
1097  yell_msg = _( "Everyone follow me!" );
1098  } else {
1099  talk_function::stop_guard( *guards[npcselect] );
1100  yell_msg = string_format( _( "Follow me, %s!" ), guards[npcselect]->get_name() );
1101  }
1102  break;
1103  }
1104  case NPC_CHAT_AWAKE:
1105  for( npc *them : followers ) {
1106  talk_function::wake_up( *them );
1107  }
1108  yell_msg = _( "Stay awake!" );
1109  break;
1110  case NPC_CHAT_MOUNT:
1111  for( npc *them : followers ) {
1112  if( them->has_effect( effect_riding ) || them->is_hallucination() ) {
1113  continue;
1114  }
1115  talk_function::find_mount( *them );
1116  }
1117  yell_msg = _( "Mount up!" );
1118  break;
1119  case NPC_CHAT_DISMOUNT:
1120  for( npc *them : followers ) {
1121  if( them->has_effect( effect_riding ) ) {
1122  them->npc_dismount();
1123  }
1124  }
1125  yell_msg = _( "Dismount!" );
1126  break;
1127  case NPC_CHAT_DANGER:
1128  for( npc *them : followers ) {
1129  them->rules.set_danger_overrides();
1130  }
1131  yell_msg = _( "We're in danger. Stay awake, stay close, don't go wandering off, "
1132  "and don't open any doors." );
1133  break;
1134  case NPC_CHAT_CLEAR_OVERRIDES:
1135  for( npc *p : followers ) {
1136  talk_function::clear_overrides( *p );
1137  }
1138  yell_msg = _( "As you were." );
1139  break;
1140  case NPC_CHAT_ORDERS:
1141  npc_temp_orders_menu( followers );
1142  break;
1143  case NPC_CHAT_ANIMAL_VEHICLE_FOLLOW:
1144  assign_veh_to_follow();
1145  break;
1146  case NPC_CHAT_ANIMAL_VEHICLE_STOP_FOLLOW:
1147  tell_veh_stop_following();
1148  break;
1149  case NPC_CHAT_COMMAND_MAGIC_VEHICLE_FOLLOW:
1150  tell_magic_veh_to_follow();
1151  break;
1152  case NPC_CHAT_COMMAND_MAGIC_VEHICLE_STOP_FOLLOW:
1153  tell_magic_veh_stop_following();
1154  break;
1155  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES: {
1156  const int activity = npc_activities_menu();
1157 
1158  std::vector<int> npcs_selected;
1159 
1160  if( available_for_activities_count == 1 ) {
1161  npcs_selected.push_back( 0 );
1162  } else {
1163  std::vector<Character *> clist( available_for_activities.begin(), available_for_activities.end() );
1164  npcs_selected = npcs_select_menu( clist, _( "Who should we assign?" ), nullptr );
1165  }
1166 
1167  for( int i : npcs_selected ) {
1168 
1169  npc *selected_npc = available_for_activities[i];
1170 
1171  switch( activity ) {
1172  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_MOVE_LOOT: {
1173  talk_function::sort_loot( *selected_npc );
1174  break;
1175  }
1176  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_BUTCHERY: {
1177  talk_function::do_butcher( *selected_npc );
1178  break;
1179  }
1180  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_CHOP_PLANKS: {
1181  talk_function::do_chop_plank( *selected_npc );
1182  break;
1183  }
1184  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_CHOP_TREES: {
1185  talk_function::do_chop_trees( *selected_npc );
1186  break;
1187  }
1188  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_CONSTRUCTION: {
1189  talk_function::do_construction( *selected_npc );
1190  break;
1191  }
1192  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_CRAFT: {
1193  talk_function::do_craft( *selected_npc );
1194  break;
1195  }
1196  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_DISASSEMBLY: {
1197  talk_function::do_disassembly( *selected_npc );
1198  break;
1199  }
1200  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_FARMING: {
1201  talk_function::do_farming( *selected_npc );
1202  break;
1203  }
1204  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_FISHING: {
1205  talk_function::do_fishing( *selected_npc );
1206  break;
1207  }
1208  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_READ_REPEATEDLY: {
1209  talk_function::do_read_repeatedly( *selected_npc );
1210  break;
1211  }
1212  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_MINING: {
1213  talk_function::do_mining( *selected_npc );
1214  break;
1215  }
1216  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_MOPPING: {
1217  talk_function::do_mopping( *selected_npc );
1218  break;
1219  }
1220  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION: {
1221  talk_function::do_vehicle_deconstruct( *selected_npc );
1222  break;
1223  }
1224  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_VEHICLE_REPAIR: {
1225  talk_function::do_vehicle_repair( *selected_npc );
1226  break;
1227  }
1228  case NPC_CHAT_ACTIVITIES_UNASSIGN: {
1229  talk_function::revert_activity( *selected_npc );
1230  break;
1231  }
1232  default:
1233  break;
1234  }
1235  }
1236  break;
1237  }
1238  default:
1239  return;
1240  }
1241 
1242  if( !yell_msg.empty() ) {
1243  message = string_format( _( "\"%s\"" ), yell_msg );
1244  }
1245  if( !message.empty() ) {
1246  add_msg( _( "You yell %s" ), message );
1247  u.shout( string_format( _( "%s yelling %s" ), u.disp_name(), message ), is_order );
1248  }
1249  if( !emote_msg.empty() ) {
1250  add_msg( emote_msg );
1251  }
1252 
1253  u.mod_moves( -u.get_speed() );
1254 }
1255 
1256 void npc::handle_sound( const sounds::sound_t spriority, const std::string &description,
1257  int heard_volume, const tripoint &spos )
1258 {
1259  const map &here = get_map();
1260  const tripoint_abs_ms s_abs_pos = here.getglobal( spos );
1261  const tripoint_abs_ms my_abs_pos = get_location();
1262 
1263  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_NPC,
1264  "%s heard '%s', priority %d at volume %d from %d:%d, my pos %d:%d",
1265  disp_name(), description, static_cast<int>( spriority ), heard_volume,
1266  s_abs_pos.x(), s_abs_pos.y(), my_abs_pos.x(), my_abs_pos.y() );
1267 
1268  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1269  bool player_ally = player_character.pos() == spos && is_player_ally();
1270  Character *const sound_source = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<Character>( spos );
1271  bool npc_ally = sound_source && sound_source->is_npc() && is_ally( *sound_source );
1272 
1273  if( ( player_ally || npc_ally ) && spriority == sounds::sound_t::order ) {
1274  say( chat_snippets().snip_acknowledged.translated() );
1275  }
1276 
1277  if( sees( spos ) || is_hallucination() ) {
1278  return;
1279  }
1280  // ignore low priority sounds if the NPC "knows" it came from a friend.
1281  // TODO: NPC will need to respond to talking noise eventually
1282  // but only for bantering purposes, not for investigating.
1283  if( spriority < sounds::sound_t::alarm ) {
1284  if( player_ally ) {
1285  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_NPC, "Allied NPC ignored same faction %s", get_name() );
1286  return;
1287  }
1288  if( npc_ally ) {
1289  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_NPC, "NPC ignored same faction %s", get_name() );
1290  return;
1291  }
1292  }
1293  // discount if sound source is player, or seen by player,
1294  // and listener is friendly and sound source is combat or alert only.
1295  if( spriority < sounds::sound_t::alarm && player_character.sees( spos ) ) {
1296  if( is_player_ally() ) {
1297  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_NPC, "NPC %s ignored low priority noise that player can see",
1298  get_name() );
1299  return;
1300  // discount if sound source is player, or seen by player,
1301  // listener is neutral and sound type is worth investigating.
1302  } else if( spriority < sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity &&
1303  get_attitude_group( get_attitude() ) != attitude_group::hostile ) {
1304  return;
1305  }
1306  }
1307  // patrolling guards will investigate more readily than stationary NPCS
1308  int investigate_dist = 10;
1309  if( mission == NPC_MISSION_GUARD_ALLY || mission == NPC_MISSION_GUARD_PATROL ) {
1310  investigate_dist = 50;
1311  }
1312  if( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::ignore_noise ) ) {
1313  investigate_dist = 0;
1314  }
1315  if( ai_cache.total_danger < 1.0f ) {
1316  if( spriority == sounds::sound_t::movement && !in_vehicle ) {
1317  warn_about( "movement_noise", rng( 1, 10 ) * 1_minutes, description );
1318  } else if( spriority > sounds::sound_t::movement ) {
1319  if( ( spriority == sounds::sound_t::speech || spriority == sounds::sound_t::alert ||
1320  spriority == sounds::sound_t::order ) && sound_source &&
1321  !has_faction_relationship( *sound_source, npc_factions::knows_your_voice ) ) {
1322  warn_about( "speech_noise", rng( 1, 10 ) * 1_minutes );
1323  } else if( spriority > sounds::sound_t::activity ) {
1324  warn_about( "combat_noise", rng( 1, 10 ) * 1_minutes );
1325  }
1326  bool should_check = rl_dist( pos(), spos ) < investigate_dist;
1327  if( should_check ) {
1328  const zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
1329  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(bugprone-branch-clone)
1330  if( mgr.has( zone_type_NPC_NO_INVESTIGATE, s_abs_pos, fac_id ) ) {
1331  should_check = false;
1332  } else if( mgr.has( zone_type_NPC_INVESTIGATE_ONLY, my_abs_pos, fac_id ) &&
1333  !mgr.has( zone_type_NPC_INVESTIGATE_ONLY, s_abs_pos, fac_id ) ) {
1334  should_check = false;
1335  }
1336  }
1337  if( should_check ) {
1338  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_NPC, "%s added noise at pos %d:%d", get_name(),
1339  s_abs_pos.x(), s_abs_pos.y() );
1340  dangerous_sound temp_sound;
1341  // TODO: fix point types
1342  temp_sound.abs_pos = s_abs_pos.raw();
1343  temp_sound.volume = heard_volume;
1344  temp_sound.type = spriority;
1345  if( !ai_cache.sound_alerts.empty() ) {
1346  // TODO: fix point types
1347  if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.back().abs_pos != s_abs_pos.raw() ) {
1348  ai_cache.sound_alerts.push_back( temp_sound );
1349  }
1350  } else {
1351  ai_cache.sound_alerts.push_back( temp_sound );
1352  }
1353  }
1354  }
1355  }
1356 }
1357 
1358 void avatar::talk_to( std::unique_ptr<talker> talk_with, bool radio_contact,
1359  bool is_computer, bool is_not_conversation )
1360 {
1361  const bool has_mind_control = has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL );
1362  if( !talk_with->will_talk_to_u( *this, has_mind_control ) ) {
1363  return;
1364  }
1365  dialogue d( get_talker_for( *this ), std::move( talk_with ), {} );
1366  d.by_radio = radio_contact;
1367  dialogue_by_radio = radio_contact;
1368  d.actor( true )->check_missions();
1369  for( mission *&mission : d.actor( true )->assigned_missions() ) {
1370  if( mission->get_assigned_player_id() == getID() ) {
1371  d.missions_assigned.push_back( mission );
1372  }
1373  }
1374  for( const std::string &topic_id : d.actor( true )->get_topics( radio_contact ) ) {
1375  d.add_topic( topic_id );
1376  }
1377  for( const std::string &topic_id : d.actor( true )->get_topics( radio_contact ) ) {
1378  d.add_topic( topic_id );
1379  }
1380  dialogue_window d_win;
1381  d_win.is_computer = is_computer;
1382  d_win.is_not_conversation = is_not_conversation;
1383  // Main dialogue loop
1384  do {
1385  d.actor( true )->update_missions( d.missions_assigned );
1386  const talk_topic next = d.opt( d_win, d.topic_stack.back() );
1387  if( next.id == "TALK_NONE" ) {
1388  int cat = topic_category( d.topic_stack.back() );
1389  do {
1390  d.topic_stack.pop_back();
1391  } while( cat != -1 && topic_category( d.topic_stack.back() ) == cat );
1392  }
1393  if( next.id == "TALK_DONE" || d.topic_stack.empty() ) {
1394  npc *npc_actor = d.actor( true )->get_npc();
1395  if( npc_actor ) {
1396  d.actor( true )->say( npc_actor->chat_snippets().snip_bye.translated() );
1397  }
1398  d.done = true;
1399  } else if( next.id != "TALK_NONE" ) {
1400  d.add_topic( next );
1401  }
1402  } while( !d.done );
1403 
1404  if( activity.id() == ACT_AIM && !has_weapon() ) {
1405  cancel_activity();
1406  // don't query certain activities that are started from dialogue
1407  } else if( activity.id() == ACT_TRAIN || activity.id() == ACT_WAIT_NPC ||
1408  activity.id() == ACT_SOCIALIZE || activity.index == d.actor( true )->getID().get_value() ) {
1409  return;
1410  }
1411 
1412  if( uistate.distraction_conversation &&
1413  !d.actor( true )->has_effect( effect_under_operation, bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) ) {
1414  g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::talked_to,
1415  string_format( _( "%s talked to you." ),
1416  d.actor( true )->disp_name() ) );
1417  }
1418 }
1419 
1420 std::string dialogue::dynamic_line( const talk_topic &the_topic )
1421 {
1422  if( !the_topic.item_type.is_null() ) {
1423  cur_item = the_topic.item_type;
1424  }
1425 
1426  // For compatibility
1427  const std::string &topic = the_topic.id;
1428  const auto iter = json_talk_topics.find( topic );
1429  if( iter != json_talk_topics.end() ) {
1430  std::string line = iter->second.get_dynamic_line( *this );
1431  if( !line.empty() ) {
1432  return line;
1433  }
1434  }
1435 
1436  if( topic == "TALK_NPC_NOFACE" ) {
1437  return string_format( _( "&%s stays silent." ), actor( true )->disp_name() );
1438  }
1439 
1440  if( topic == "TALK_NOFACE" ) {
1441  return _( "&You can't talk without your face." );
1442  } else if( topic == "TALK_DEAF" ) {
1443  return _( "&You are deaf and can't talk." );
1444 
1445  } else if( topic == "TALK_DEAF_ANGRY" ) {
1446  return string_format(
1447  _( "&You are deaf and can't talk. When you don't respond, %s becomes angry!" ),
1448  actor( true )->disp_name() );
1449  } else if( topic == "TALK_MUTE" ) {
1450  return _( "&You are mute and can't talk." );
1451 
1452  } else if( topic == "TALK_MUTE_ANGRY" ) {
1453  return string_format(
1454  _( "&You are mute and can't talk. When you don't respond, %s becomes angry!" ),
1455  actor( true )->disp_name() );
1456  } else if( topic == "TALK_CHURL" ) {
1457  return string_format(
1458  _( "&Thou art but a lowley churl and ye know not this newe tongue. %s seems unable to understand what you're saying." ),
1459  actor( true )->disp_name() );
1460 
1461  } else if( topic == "TALK_CHURL_ANGRY" ) {
1462  return string_format(
1463  _( "&Thou art but a lowley churl and ye know not this newe tongue. Unable to understand your dialect, %s becomes angry!" ),
1464  actor( true )->disp_name() );
1465  } else if( topic == "TALK_CHURL_TRADE" ) {
1466  return string_format(
1467  _( "&Thou art but a lowley churl wyth litel understonding of this newe langage, yet %s can understand you and seems willing to trade!" ),
1468  actor( true )->disp_name() );
1469  }
1470  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1471  if( topic == "TALK_SEDATED" ) {
1472  return string_format( _( "%1$s is sedated and can't be moved or woken up until the "
1473  "medication or sedation wears off.\nYou estimate it will wear "
1474  "off in %2$s." ),
1475  actor( true )->disp_name(),
1476  to_string_approx( player_character.estimate_effect_dur( skill_firstaid,
1477  effect_narcosis, 90_minutes, 60_minutes, 6,
1478  *actor( true )->get_npc() ) ) );
1479  }
1480 
1481  // Those topics are handled by the mission system, see there.
1482  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> mission_topics = { {
1483  "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE", "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE_URGENT",
1484  "TALK_MISSION_OFFER", "TALK_MISSION_ACCEPTED",
1485  "TALK_MISSION_REJECTED", "TALK_MISSION_ADVICE", "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE",
1486  "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS", "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS_LIE", "TALK_MISSION_FAILURE"
1487  }
1488  };
1489  if( mission_topics.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1490  mission *miss = actor( true )->selected_mission();
1491  if( miss == nullptr ) {
1492  return "mission_selected == nullptr; BUG! (npctalk.cpp:dynamic_line)";
1493  }
1494  const mission_type &type = miss->get_type();
1495  // TODO: make it a member of the mission class, maybe at mission instance specific data
1496  const std::string &ret = miss->dialogue_for_topic( topic );
1497  if( ret.empty() ) {
1498  debugmsg( "Bug in npctalk.cpp:dynamic_line. Wrong mission_id(%s) or topic(%s)",
1499  type.id.c_str(), topic.c_str() );
1500  return "";
1501  }
1502 
1503  if( topic == "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS" && miss->has_follow_up() ) {
1504  switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1505  case 1:
1506  return ret + _( " And I have more I'd like you to do." );
1507  case 2:
1508  return ret + _( " I could use a hand with something else if you are interested." );
1509  case 3:
1510  return ret + _( " If you are interested, I have another job for you." );
1511  }
1512  }
1513 
1514  return ret;
1515  }
1516 
1517  if( topic == "TALK_NONE" || topic == "TALK_DONE" ) {
1518  return actor( true )->get_npc()->chat_snippets().snip_bye.translated();
1519  } else if( topic == "TALK_TRAIN" ) {
1520  if( !player_character.backlog.empty() && player_character.backlog.front().id() == ACT_TRAIN ) {
1521  return _( "Shall we resume?" );
1522  } else if( actor( true )->skills_offered_to( *actor( false ) ).empty() &&
1523  actor( true )->styles_offered_to( *actor( false ) ).empty() &&
1524  actor( true )->spells_offered_to( *actor( false ) ).empty() &&
1525  actor( true )->proficiencies_offered_to( *actor( false ) ).empty() ) {
1526  return _( "Sorry, but it doesn't seem I have anything to teach you." );
1527  } else {
1528  return _( "Here's what I can teach you…" );
1529  }
1530  } else if( topic == "TALK_TRAIN_NPC" ) {
1531  if( actor( false )->skills_offered_to( *actor( true ) ).empty() &&
1532  actor( false )->styles_offered_to( *actor( true ) ).empty() &&
1533  actor( false )->spells_offered_to( *actor( true ) ).empty() &&
1534  actor( false )->proficiencies_offered_to( *actor( true ) ).empty() ) {
1535  return _( "Sorry, there's nothing I can learn from you." );
1536  } else {
1537  return _( "Sure, I'm all ears." );
1538  }
1539  } else if( topic == "TALK_TRAIN_SEMINAR" ) {
1540  return _( "What do you want me to teach?" );
1541  } else if( topic == "TALK_HOW_MUCH_FURTHER" ) {
1542  return actor( true )->distance_to_goal();
1543  } else if( topic == "TALK_DESCRIBE_MISSION" ) {
1544  return actor( true )->get_job_description();
1545  } else if( topic == "TALK_SHOUT" ) {
1546  actor( false )->shout();
1547  if( actor( false )->is_deaf() ) {
1548  return _( "&You yell, but can't hear yourself." );
1549  } else {
1550  if( actor( false )->is_mute() ) {
1551  return _( "&You yell, but can't form words." );
1552  } else {
1553  return _( "&You yell." );
1554  }
1555  }
1556  } else if( topic == "TALK_SIZE_UP" ) {
1557  return actor( true )->evaluation_by( *actor( false ) );
1558  } else if( topic == "TALK_ASSESS_PERSON" ) {
1559  return actor( true )->view_personality_traits();
1560  } else if( topic == "TALK_LOOK_AT" ) {
1561  if( actor( false )->can_see() ) {
1562  return "&" + actor( true )->short_description();
1563  } else {
1564  return string_format( _( "&You're blind and can't look at %s." ), actor( true )->disp_name() );
1565  }
1566  } else if( topic == "TALK_OPINION" ) {
1567  return "&" + actor( true )->opinion_text();
1568  } else if( topic == "TALK_MIND_CONTROL" ) {
1569  if( actor( true )->enslave_mind() ) {
1570  return _( "YES, MASTER!" );
1571  }
1572  }
1573 
1574  debugmsg( "I don't know what to say for %s. (BUG (npctalk.cpp:dynamic_line))", topic );
1575  return "";
1576 }
1577 
1578 void dialogue::apply_speaker_effects( const talk_topic &the_topic )
1579 {
1580  const std::string &topic = the_topic.id;
1581  const auto iter = json_talk_topics.find( topic );
1582  if( iter == json_talk_topics.end() ) {
1583  return;
1584  }
1585  for( json_dynamic_line_effect &npc_effect : iter->second.get_speaker_effects() ) {
1586  if( npc_effect.test_condition( *this ) ) {
1587  npc_effect.apply( *this );
1588  }
1589  }
1590 }
1591 
1592 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1593  const bool first )
1594 {
1595  talk_response result = talk_response();
1596  result.truetext = no_translation( text );
1597  result.truefalse_condition = []( const dialogue & ) {
1598  return true;
1599  };
1600  result.success.next_topic = talk_topic( r );
1601  if( first ) {
1602  responses.insert( responses.begin(), result );
1603  return responses.front();
1604  } else {
1605  responses.push_back( result );
1606  return responses.back();
1607  }
1608 }
1609 
1610 talk_response &dialogue::add_response_done( const std::string &text )
1611 {
1612  return add_response( text, "TALK_DONE" );
1613 }
1614 
1615 talk_response &dialogue::add_response_none( const std::string &text )
1616 {
1617  return add_response( text, "TALK_NONE" );
1618 }
1619 
1620 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1621  const talkfunction_ptr &effect_success, const bool first )
1622 {
1623  talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1624  result.success.set_effect( effect_success );
1625  return result;
1626 }
1627 
1628 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1629  const std::function<void( npc & )> &effect_success,
1630  dialogue_consequence consequence, const bool first )
1631 {
1632  talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1633  result.success.set_effect_consequence( effect_success, consequence );
1634  return result;
1635 }
1636 
1637 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1638  mission *miss, const bool first )
1639 {
1640  if( miss == nullptr ) {
1641  debugmsg( "tried to select null mission" );
1642  }
1643  talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1644  result.mission_selected = miss;
1645  return result;
1646 }
1647 
1648 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1649  const skill_id &skill, const bool first )
1650 {
1651  talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1652  result.skill = skill;
1653  return result;
1654 }
1655 
1656 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1657  const proficiency_id &proficiency, const bool first )
1658 {
1659  talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1660  result.proficiency = proficiency;
1661  return result;
1662 }
1663 
1664 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1665  const spell_id &sp, const bool first )
1666 {
1667  talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1668  result.dialogue_spell = sp;
1669  return result;
1670 }
1671 
1672 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1673  const martialart &style, const bool first )
1674 {
1675  talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1676  result.style = style.id;
1677  return result;
1678 }
1679 
1680 talk_response &dialogue::add_response( const std::string &text, const std::string &r,
1681  const itype_id &item_type, const bool first )
1682 {
1683  if( item_type.is_null() ) {
1684  debugmsg( "explicitly specified null item" );
1685  }
1686 
1687  talk_response &result = add_response( text, r, first );
1688  result.success.next_topic.item_type = item_type;
1689  return result;
1690 }
1691 
1692 void dialogue::gen_responses( const talk_topic &the_topic )
1693 {
1694  responses.clear();
1695  const auto iter = json_talk_topics.find( the_topic.id );
1696  if( iter != json_talk_topics.end() ) {
1697  json_talk_topic &jtt = iter->second;
1698  if( jtt.gen_responses( *this ) ) {
1699  return;
1700  }
1701  }
1702 
1703  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1704  if( the_topic.id == "TALK_MISSION_LIST" ) {
1705  if( actor( true )->available_missions().size() == 1 ) {
1706  add_response( _( "Tell me about it." ), "TALK_MISSION_OFFER",
1707  actor( true )->available_missions().front(), true );
1708  } else {
1709  for( mission *&mission : actor( true )->available_missions() ) {
1710  add_response( mission->get_type().tname(), "TALK_MISSION_OFFER", mission, true );
1711  }
1712  }
1713  } else if( the_topic.id == "TALK_MISSION_LIST_ASSIGNED" ) {
1714  if( missions_assigned.size() == 1 ) {
1715  add_response( _( "I have news." ), "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE", missions_assigned.front() );
1716  } else {
1717  for( mission *&miss_it : missions_assigned ) {
1718  add_response( miss_it->get_type().tname(), "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE", miss_it );
1719  }
1720  }
1721  } else if( the_topic.id == "TALK_TRAIN_NPC" ) {
1722  const std::vector<matype_id> &styles = actor( false )->styles_offered_to( *actor( true ) );
1723  const std::vector<skill_id> &skills = actor( false )->skills_offered_to( *actor( true ) );
1724  const std::vector<spell_id> &spells = actor( false )->spells_offered_to( *actor( true ) );
1725  const std::vector<proficiency_id> &profs =
1726  actor( false )->proficiencies_offered_to( *actor( true ) );
1727  if( skills.empty() && styles.empty() && spells.empty() && profs.empty() ) {
1728  add_response_none( _( "Oh, okay." ) );
1729  return;
1730  }
1731  for( const spell_id &sp : spells ) {
1732  const std::string &text =
1733  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Spell" ), actor( false )->spell_training_text( *actor( true ), sp ) );
1734  if( !text.empty() ) {
1735  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_NPC_START", sp );
1736  }
1737  }
1738  for( const matype_id &ma : styles ) {
1739  const std::string &text =
1740  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Style" ), actor( false )->style_training_text( *actor( true ), ma ) );
1741  if( !text.empty() ) {
1742  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_NPC_START", ma.obj() );
1743  }
1744  }
1745  for( const skill_id &sk : skills ) {
1746  const std::string &text =
1747  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Skill" ), actor( false )->skill_training_text( *actor( true ), sk ) );
1748  if( !text.empty() && !sk->obsolete() ) {
1749  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_NPC_START", sk );
1750  }
1751  }
1752  for( const proficiency_id &pr : profs ) {
1753  const std::string &text =
1754  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Proficiency" ),
1755  actor( false )->proficiency_training_text( *actor( true ), pr ) );
1756  if( !text.empty() ) {
1757  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_NPC_START", pr );
1758  }
1759  }
1760  add_response_none( _( "Eh, never mind." ) );
1761  } else if( the_topic.id == "TALK_TRAIN_SEMINAR" ) {
1762  const std::vector<skill_id> &sklist = actor( true )->skills_teacheable();
1763  const std::vector<proficiency_id> &prlist = actor( true )->proficiencies_teacheable();
1764  const std::vector<matype_id> &malist = actor( true )->styles_teacheable();
1765  const std::vector<spell_id> &splist = actor( true )->spells_teacheable();
1766  if( sklist.empty() && prlist.empty() && malist.empty() && splist.empty() ) {
1767  add_response_none( _( "Oh, okay." ) );
1768  return;
1769  }
1770  for( const skill_id &sk : sklist ) {
1771  if( sk->obsolete() ) {
1772  continue;
1773  }
1774  const std::string &text =
1775  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Skill" ), actor( true )->skill_seminar_text( sk ) );
1776  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_SEMINAR_START", sk );
1777  }
1778  for( const proficiency_id &pr : prlist ) {
1779  const std::string &text =
1780  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Proficiency" ), actor( true )->proficiency_seminar_text( pr ) );
1781  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_SEMINAR_START", pr );
1782  }
1783  for( const matype_id &ma : malist ) {
1784  const std::string &text =
1785  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Style" ), actor( true )->style_seminar_text( ma ) );
1786  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_SEMINAR_START", ma.obj() );
1787  }
1788  for( const spell_id &sp : splist ) {
1789  const std::string &text =
1790  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Spell" ), actor( true )->spell_seminar_text( sp ) );
1791  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_SEMINAR_START", sp );
1792  }
1793  add_response_none( _( "Eh, never mind." ) );
1794  } else if( the_topic.id == "TALK_TRAIN" ) {
1795  if( !player_character.backlog.empty() && player_character.backlog.front().id() == ACT_TRAIN &&
1796  player_character.backlog.front().index == actor( true )->getID().get_value() ) {
1797  player_activity &backlog = player_character.backlog.front();
1798  const skill_id skillt( backlog.name );
1799  // TODO: This is potentially dangerous. A skill and a martial art
1800  // could have the same ident!
1801  if( !skillt.is_valid() ) {
1802  const matype_id styleid = matype_id( backlog.name );
1803  if( !styleid.is_valid() ) {
1804  const proficiency_id profid = proficiency_id( backlog.name );
1805  if( !profid.is_valid() ) {
1806  const spell_id &sp_id = spell_id( backlog.name );
1807  if( actor( true )->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
1808  add_response( string_format( _( "Yes, let's resume training %s" ),
1809  sp_id->name ), "TALK_TRAIN_START", sp_id );
1810  }
1811  } else {
1812  add_response( string_format( _( "Yes, let's resume training %s" ),
1813  profid->name() ), "TALK_TRAIN_START", profid );
1814  }
1815  } else {
1816  const martialart &style = styleid.obj();
1817  add_response( string_format( _( "Yes, let's resume training %s" ),
1818  style.name ), "TALK_TRAIN_START", style );
1819  }
1820  } else {
1821  add_response( string_format( _( "Yes, let's resume training %s" ), skillt->name() ),
1822  "TALK_TRAIN_START", skillt );
1823  }
1824  }
1825  const std::vector<matype_id> &styles = actor( true )->styles_offered_to( *actor( false ) );
1826  const std::vector<skill_id> &trainable = actor( true )->skills_offered_to( *actor( false ) );
1827  const std::vector<spell_id> &teachable = actor( true )->spells_offered_to( *actor( false ) );
1828  const std::vector<proficiency_id> &proficiencies = actor( true )->proficiencies_offered_to( *actor(
1829  false ) );
1830  if( trainable.empty() && styles.empty() && teachable.empty() && proficiencies.empty() ) {
1831  add_response_none( _( "Oh, okay." ) );
1832  return;
1833  }
1834  for( const spell_id &sp : teachable ) {
1835  const std::string &text =
1836  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Spell" ), actor( true )->spell_training_text( *actor( false ), sp ) );
1837  if( !text.empty() ) {
1838  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_START", sp );
1839  }
1840  }
1841  for( const matype_id &style_id : styles ) {
1842  const std::string &text =
1843  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Style" ),
1844  actor( true )->style_training_text( *actor( false ), style_id ) );
1845  if( !text.empty() ) {
1846  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_START", style_id.obj() );
1847  }
1848  }
1849  for( const skill_id &trained : trainable ) {
1850  const std::string &text =
1851  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Skill" ),
1852  actor( true )->skill_training_text( *actor( false ), trained ) );
1853  if( !text.empty() && !trained->obsolete() ) {
1854  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_START", trained );
1855  }
1856  }
1857  for( const proficiency_id &trained : proficiencies ) {
1858  const std::string &text =
1859  string_format( "%s: %s", _( "Proficiency" ),
1860  actor( true )->proficiency_training_text( *actor( false ), trained ) );
1861  if( !text.empty() ) {
1862  add_response( text, "TALK_TRAIN_START", trained );
1863  }
1864  }
1865  add_response_none( _( "Eh, never mind." ) );
1866  } else if( the_topic.id == "TALK_HOW_MUCH_FURTHER" ) {
1867  add_response_none( _( "Okay, thanks." ) );
1868  add_response_done( _( "Let's keep moving." ) );
1869  }
1870 
1871  if( actor( false )->has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL ) && !actor( true )->is_player_ally() ) {
1872  add_response( _( "OBEY ME!" ), "TALK_MIND_CONTROL" );
1873  add_response_done( _( "Bye." ) );
1874  }
1875 
1876  if( player_character.has_trait( trait_PROF_CHURL ) && ( actor( true )->get_npc_trust() >= 0 ) &&
1877  ( actor( true )->get_npc_anger() <= 0 ) && ( actor( true )->int_cur() >= 9 ) &&
1878  !( the_topic.id == "TALK_CHURL_FRIENDLY" ) ) {
1879  add_response( _( "Ho there, otherwyrldly devyl! Have yow ware for to chaffare?" ),
1880  "TALK_CHURL_FRIENDLY" );
1881  add_response_done( _( "Farewell!" ) );
1882  }
1883 
1884  if( responses.empty() ) {
1885  add_response_done( _( "Bye." ) );
1886  }
1887 }
1888 
1889 static int parse_mod( const dialogue &d, const std::string &attribute, const int factor )
1890 {
1891  return d.actor( true )->parse_mod( attribute, factor ) + d.actor( false )->parse_mod( attribute,
1892  factor );
1893 }
1894 
1895 static int total_price( const talker &seller, const itype_id &item_type )
1896 {
1897  int price = 0;
1898  item tmp( item_type );
1899 
1900  if( tmp.count_by_charges() ) {
1901  tmp.charges = seller.charges_of( item_type );
1902  price = tmp.price( true );
1903  } else {
1904  std::vector<const item *> items = seller.const_items_with( [&item_type]( const item & e ) {
1905  return item_type == e.type->get_id();
1906  } );
1907  for( const item *it : items ) {
1908  price += it->price( true );
1909  }
1910  }
1911  return price;
1912 }
1913 
1914 int talk_trial::calc_chance( dialogue &d ) const
1915 {
1916  if( d.actor( false )->has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL ) ) {
1917  return 100;
1918  }
1919  int chance = difficulty;
1920  switch( type ) {
1921  case NUM_TALK_TRIALS:
1922  dbg( D_ERROR ) << "called calc_chance with invalid talk_trial value: " << type;
1923  break;
1924  case TALK_TRIAL_NONE:
1925  chance = 100;
1926  break;
1927  case TALK_TRIAL_SKILL_CHECK:
1928  chance = d.actor( false )->get_skill_level( skill_id( skill_required ) ) >= difficulty ? 100 : 0;
1929  break;
1930  case TALK_TRIAL_CONDITION:
1931  chance = condition( d ) ? 100 : 0;
1932  break;
1933  case TALK_TRIAL_LIE:
1934  chance += d.actor( false )->trial_chance_mod( "lie" ) + d.actor( true )->trial_chance_mod( "lie" );
1935  break;
1936  case TALK_TRIAL_PERSUADE:
1937  chance += d.actor( false )->trial_chance_mod( "persuade" ) +
1938  d.actor( true )->trial_chance_mod( "persuade" );
1939  break;
1940  case TALK_TRIAL_INTIMIDATE:
1941  chance += d.actor( false )->trial_chance_mod( "intimidate" ) +
1942  d.actor( true )->trial_chance_mod( "intimidate" );
1943  break;
1944  }
1945  for( const auto &this_mod : modifiers ) {
1946  chance += parse_mod( d, this_mod.first, this_mod.second );
1947  }
1948 
1949  return std::max( 0, std::min( 100, chance ) );
1950 }
1951 
1952 bool talk_trial::roll( dialogue &d ) const
1953 {
1954  if( type == TALK_TRIAL_NONE || d.actor( false )->has_trait( trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL ) ) {
1955  return true;
1956  }
1957  const int chance = calc_chance( d );
1958  const bool success = rng( 0, 99 ) < chance;
1959  const bool speech_trial = type == TALK_TRIAL_PERSUADE || type == TALK_TRIAL_INTIMIDATE ||
1960  type == TALK_TRIAL_LIE;
1961  if( speech_trial && d.actor( false )->get_character() ) {
1962  Character &u = *d.actor( false )->get_character();
1963  if( success ) {
1964  u.practice( skill_speech, ( 100 - chance ) / 10 );
1965  } else {
1966  u.practice( skill_speech, ( 100 - chance ) / 7 );
1967  }
1968  }
1969  return success;
1970 }
1971 
1972 int topic_category( const talk_topic &the_topic )
1973 {
1974  const std::string &topic = the_topic.id;
1975  // TODO: ideally, this would be a property of the topic itself.
1976  // How this works: each category has a set of topics that belong to it, each set is checked
1977  // for the given topic and if a set contains, the category number is returned.
1978  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_1 = { {
1979  "TALK_MISSION_START", "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE", "TALK_MISSION_OFFER",
1980  "TALK_MISSION_ACCEPTED", "TALK_MISSION_REJECTED", "TALK_MISSION_ADVICE",
1981  "TALK_MISSION_INQUIRE", "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS", "TALK_MISSION_SUCCESS_LIE",
1982  "TALK_MISSION_FAILURE", "TALK_MISSION_REWARD", "TALK_MISSION_END",
1983  "TALK_MISSION_DESCRIBE_URGENT"
1984  }
1985  };
1986  if( topic_1.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1987  return 1;
1988  }
1989  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_2 = { {
1990  "TALK_SHARE_EQUIPMENT", "TALK_GIVE_EQUIPMENT", "TALK_DENY_EQUIPMENT"
1991  }
1992  };
1993  if( topic_2.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
1994  return 2;
1995  }
1996  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_3 = { {
1997  "TALK_SUGGEST_FOLLOW", "TALK_AGREE_FOLLOW", "TALK_DENY_FOLLOW",
1998  }
1999  };
2000  if( topic_3.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
2001  return 3;
2002  }
2003  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_4 = { {
2004  "TALK_COMBAT_ENGAGEMENT",
2005  }
2006  };
2007  if( topic_4.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
2008  return 4;
2009  }
2010  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_5 = { {
2011  "TALK_COMBAT_COMMANDS",
2012  }
2013  };
2014  if( topic_5.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
2015  return 5;
2016  }
2017  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_6 = { {
2018  "TALK_TRAIN", "TALK_TRAIN_START", "TALK_TRAIN_FORCE",
2019  "TALK_TRAIN_NPC_START", "TALK_TRAIN_NPC_FORCE"
2020  }
2021  };
2022  if( topic_6.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
2023  return 6;
2024  }
2025  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_7 = { {
2026  "TALK_MISC_RULES",
2027  }
2028  };
2029  if( topic_7.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
2030  return 7;
2031  }
2032  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_8 = { {
2033  "TALK_AIM_RULES",
2034  }
2035  };
2036  if( topic_8.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
2037  return 8;
2038  }
2039  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_9 = { {
2040  "TALK_FRIEND", "TALK_GIVE_ITEM", "TALK_USE_ITEM",
2041  }
2042  };
2043  if( topic_9.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
2044  return 9;
2045  }
2046  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> topic_99 = { {
2047  "TALK_SIZE_UP", "TALK_ASSESS_PERSON", "TALK_LOOK_AT", "TALK_OPINION", "TALK_SHOUT"
2048  }
2049  };
2050  if( topic_99.count( topic ) > 0 ) {
2051  return 99;
2052  }
2053  return -1; // Not grouped with other topics
2054 }
2055 
2056 void parse_tags( std::string &phrase, const Character &u, const Character &me,
2057  const itype_id &item_type )
2058 {
2059  dialogue d( get_talker_for( u ), get_talker_for( me ) );
2060  parse_tags( phrase, u, me, d, item_type );
2061 }
2062 
2063 void parse_tags( std::string &phrase, const Character &u, const Character &me, const dialogue &d,
2064  const itype_id &item_type )
2065 {
2066  parse_tags( phrase, *get_talker_for( u ), *get_talker_for( me ), d, item_type );
2067 }
2068 
2069 void parse_tags( std::string &phrase, const talker &u, const talker &me, const dialogue &d,
2070  const itype_id &item_type )
2071 {
2072  phrase = SNIPPET.expand( phrase );
2073 
2074  const Character *u_chr = u.get_character();
2075  const Character *me_chr = me.get_character();
2076  size_t fa;
2077  size_t fb;
2078  size_t fa_;
2079  std::string tag;
2080  do {
2081  fa = phrase.find( '<' );
2082  fb = phrase.find( '>' );
2083  // Skip the <color_XXX> and </color> tag
2084  while( fa != std::string::npos && ( phrase.compare( fa + 1, 6, "color_" ) == 0 ||
2085  phrase.compare( fa + 1, 7, "/color>" ) == 0 ) ) {
2086  if( phrase.compare( fa + 1, 6, "color_" ) == 0 ) {
2087  fa = phrase.find( '<', fa + 7 );
2088  } else { // phrase.compare(fa + 1, 7, "/color>") == 0
2089  fa = phrase.find( '<', fa + 8 );
2090  }
2091  fb = phrase.find( '>', fa );
2092  }
2093  if( fa != std::string::npos ) {
2094  size_t nest = 0;
2095  fa_ = phrase.find( '<', fa + 1 );
2096  while( fa_ < fb && fa_ != std::string::npos ) {
2097  nest++;
2098  fa_ = phrase.find( '<', fa_ + 1 );
2099  }
2100  while( nest > 0 && fb != std::string::npos ) {
2101  nest--;
2102  fb = phrase.find( '>', fb + 1 );
2103  }
2104  }
2105  int l = fb - fa + 1;
2106  if( fa != std::string::npos && fb != std::string::npos ) {
2107  tag = phrase.substr( fa, fb - fa + 1 );
2108  } else {
2109  return;
2110  }
2111 
2112  const item_location u_weapon = u_chr ? u_chr->get_wielded_item() : item_location();
2113  const item_location me_weapon = me_chr ? me_chr->get_wielded_item() : item_location();
2114  // Special, dynamic tags go here
2115  if( tag == "<yrwp>" ) {
2116  phrase.replace( fa, l, remove_color_tags( u_weapon->tname() ) );
2117  } else if( tag == "<mywp>" ) {
2118  if( me_chr && !me_chr->is_armed() ) {
2119  phrase.replace( fa, l, _( "fists" ) );
2120  } else {
2121  phrase.replace( fa, l, remove_color_tags( me_weapon->tname() ) );
2122  }
2123  } else if( tag == "<u_name>" ) {
2124  phrase.replace( fa, l, u.get_name() );
2125  } else if( tag == "<npc_name>" ) {
2126  phrase.replace( fa, l, me.get_name() );
2127  } else if( tag == "<ammo>" ) {
2128  if( !me_weapon || !me_weapon->is_gun() ) {
2129  phrase.replace( fa, l, _( "BADAMMO" ) );
2130  } else {
2131  phrase.replace( fa, l, me_weapon->ammo_current()->nname( 1 ) );
2132  }
2133  } else if( tag == "<current_activity>" ) {
2134  std::string activity_name;
2135  const npc *guy = dynamic_cast<const npc *>( me_chr );
2136  if( guy && guy->current_activity_id ) {
2137  activity_name = guy->get_current_activity();
2138  } else {
2139  activity_name = _( "doing this and that" );
2140  }
2141  phrase.replace( fa, l, activity_name );
2142  } else if( tag == "<punc>" ) {
2143  switch( rng( 0, 2 ) ) {
2144  case 0:
2145  phrase.replace( fa, l, pgettext( "punctuation", "." ) );
2146  break;
2147  case 1:
2148  phrase.replace( fa, l, pgettext( "punctuation", "…" ) );
2149  break;
2150  case 2:
2151  phrase.replace( fa, l, pgettext( "punctuation", "!" ) );
2152  break;
2153  }
2154  } else if( tag == "<mypronoun>" ) {
2155  std::string npcstr = me.is_male() ? pgettext( "npc", "He" ) : pgettext( "npc", "She" );
2156  phrase.replace( fa, l, npcstr );
2157  } else if( tag == "<mypossesivepronoun>" ) {
2158  std::string npcstr = me.is_male() ? pgettext( "npc", "his" ) : pgettext( "npc", "her" );
2159  phrase.replace( fa, l, npcstr );
2160  } else if( tag == "<topic_item>" ) {
2161  phrase.replace( fa, l, item::nname( item_type, 2 ) );
2162  } else if( tag == "<topic_item_price>" ) {
2163  item tmp( item_type );
2164  phrase.replace( fa, l, format_money( tmp.price( true ) ) );
2165  } else if( tag == "<topic_item_my_total_price>" ) {
2166  int price = total_price( me, item_type );
2167  phrase.replace( fa, l, format_money( price ) );
2168  } else if( tag == "<topic_item_your_total_price>" ) {
2169  int price = total_price( u, item_type );
2170  phrase.replace( fa, l, format_money( price ) );
2171  } else if( tag == "<interval>" ) {
2172  const npc *guy = dynamic_cast<const npc *>( me_chr );
2173  std::string restock_interval = guy ? guy->get_restock_interval() : _( "a few days" );
2174  phrase.replace( fa, l, restock_interval );
2175  } else if( tag.find( "<u_val:" ) == 0 ) {
2176  //adding a user variable to the string
2177  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2178  // remove the trailing >
2179  var.pop_back();
2180  // resolve nest
2181  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2182  phrase.replace( fa, l, u.get_value( "npctalk_var_" + var ) );
2183  } else if( tag.find( "<npc_val:" ) == 0 ) {
2184  //adding a npc variable to the string
2185  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2186  // remove the trailing >
2187  var.pop_back();
2188  // resolve nest
2189  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2190  phrase.replace( fa, l, me.get_value( "npctalk_var_" + var ) );
2191  } else if( tag.find( "<global_val:" ) == 0 ) {
2192  //adding a global variable to the string
2193  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2194  // remove the trailing >
2195  var.pop_back();
2196  // resolve nest
2197  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2198  global_variables &globvars = get_globals();
2199  phrase.replace( fa, l, globvars.get_global_value( "npctalk_var_" + var ) );
2200  } else if( tag.find( "<context_val:" ) == 0 ) {
2201  //adding a context variable to the string requires dialogue to exist
2202  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2203  // remove the trailing >
2204  var.pop_back();
2205  // resolve nest
2206  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2207  phrase.replace( fa, l, d.get_value( "npctalk_var_" + var ) );
2208  } else if( tag.find( "<item_name:" ) == 0 ) {
2209  //embedding an items name in the string
2210  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2211  // remove the trailing >
2212  var.pop_back();
2213  // resolve nest
2214  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2215  // attempt to cast as an item
2216  phrase.replace( fa, l, itype_id( var )->nname( 1 ) );
2217  } else if( tag.find( "<item_description:" ) == 0 ) {
2218  //embedding an items name in the string
2219  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2220  // remove the trailing >
2221  var.pop_back();
2222  // resolve nest
2223  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2224  // attempt to cast as an item
2225  phrase.replace( fa, l, itype_id( var )->description.translated() );
2226  } else if( tag.find( "<trait_name:" ) == 0 ) {
2227  //embedding an items name in the string
2228  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2229  // remove the trailing >
2230  var.pop_back();
2231  // resolve nest
2232  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2233  // attempt to cast as an item
2234  phrase.replace( fa, l, trait_id( var )->name() );
2235  } else if( tag.find( "<trait_description:" ) == 0 ) {
2236  //embedding an items name in the string
2237  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2238  // remove the trailing >
2239  var.pop_back();
2240  // resolve nest
2241  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2242  // attempt to cast as an item
2243  phrase.replace( fa, l, trait_id( var )->desc() );
2244  } else if( tag.find( "<spell_name:" ) == 0 ) {
2245  //embedding an items name in the string
2246  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2247  // remove the trailing >
2248  var.pop_back();
2249  // resolve nest
2250  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2251  // attempt to cast as an item
2252  phrase.replace( fa, l, spell_id( var )->name.translated() );
2253  } else if( tag.find( "<spell_description:" ) == 0 ) {
2254  //embedding an items name in the string
2255  std::string var = tag.substr( tag.find( ':' ) + 1 );
2256  // remove the trailing >
2257  var.pop_back();
2258  // resolve nest
2259  parse_tags( var, u, me, d, item_type );
2260  // attempt to cast as an item
2261  phrase.replace( fa, l, spell_id( var )->description.translated() );
2262  } else if( tag.find( "<city>" ) == 0 ) {
2263  std::string cityname = "nowhere";
2264  tripoint_abs_sm abs_sub = get_map().get_abs_sub();
2265  const city *c = overmap_buffer.closest_city( abs_sub ).city;
2266  if( c != nullptr ) {
2267  cityname = c->name;
2268  }
2269  phrase.replace( fa, l, cityname );
2270  } else if( !tag.empty() ) {
2271  debugmsg( "Bad tag. '%s' (%d - %d)", tag.c_str(), fa, fb );
2272  phrase.replace( fa, fb - fa + 1, "????" );
2273  }
2274  } while( fa != std::string::npos && fb != std::string::npos );
2275 }
2276 
2277 void dialogue::add_topic( const std::string &topic_id )
2278 {
2279  if( actor( true )->get_npc() ) {
2280  topic_stack.emplace_back( actor( true )->get_npc()->get_specified_talk_topic( topic_id ) );
2281  } else {
2282  topic_stack.emplace_back( topic_id );
2283  }
2284 }
2285 
2286 void dialogue::add_topic( const talk_topic &topic )
2287 {
