2288  if( actor( true )->get_npc() ) {
2289  std::string const &newid = actor( true )->get_npc()->get_specified_talk_topic( topic.id );
2290  topic_stack.emplace_back( newid, topic.item_type, topic.reason );
2291  } else {
2292  topic_stack.push_back( topic );
2293  }
2294 }
2295 
2296 void dialogue::set_value( const std::string &key, const std::string &value )
2297 {
2298  context[key] = value;
2299 }
2300 
2301 void dialogue::remove_value( const std::string &key )
2302 {
2303  context->erase( key );
2304 }
2305 
2306 std::string dialogue::get_value( const std::string &key ) const
2307 {
2308  return maybe_get_value( key ).value_or( std::string{} );
2309 }
2310 
2311 std::optional<std::string> dialogue::maybe_get_value( const std::string &key ) const
2312 {
2313  auto it = context->find( key );
2314  return it == context->end() ? std::nullopt : std::optional<std::string> { it->second };
2315 }
2316 
2317 void dialogue::set_conditional( const std::string &key,
2318  const std::function<bool( dialogue & )> &value )
2319 {
2320  conditionals[key] = value;
2321 }
2322 
2323 bool dialogue::evaluate_conditional( const std::string &key, dialogue &d )
2324 {
2325  auto it = conditionals->find( key );
2326  return ( it == conditionals->end() ) ? false : it->second( d );
2327 }
2328 
2329 const std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> &dialogue::get_context() const
2330 {
2331  return context;
2332 }
2333 
2334 const std::unordered_map<std::string, std::function<bool( dialogue & )>>
2335  &dialogue::get_conditionals() const
2336 {
2337  return conditionals;
2338 }
2339 
2340 void dialogue::amend_callstack( const std::string &value )
2341 {
2342  if( !callstack.empty() ) {
2343  callstack += " \\ " + value;
2344  } else {
2345  callstack = value;
2346  }
2347 }
2348 
2349 std::string dialogue::get_callstack() const
2350 {
2351  if( !callstack.empty() ) {
2352  return "Callstack: " + callstack;
2353  }
2354  return "";
2355 }
2356 
2357 talker *dialogue::actor( const bool is_beta ) const
2358 {
2359  if( !has_beta && !has_alpha ) {
2360  debugmsg( "Attempted to use a dialogue with no actors! %s", get_callstack() );
2361  }
2362  if( is_beta && !has_beta ) {
2363  debugmsg( "Tried to use an invalid beta talker. %s", get_callstack() );
2364  // Try to avoid a crash by using the alpha if it exists
2365  if( has_alpha ) {
2366  return alpha.get();
2367  }
2368  }
2369  if( !is_beta && !has_alpha ) {
2370  debugmsg( "Tried to use an invalid alpha talker. %s", get_callstack() );
2371  // Try to avoid a crash by using the beta if it exists
2372  if( has_beta ) {
2373  return beta.get();
2374  }
2375  }
2376  return ( is_beta ? beta : alpha ).get();
2377 }
2378 
2379 dialogue::dialogue( const dialogue &d ) : has_beta( d.has_beta ), has_alpha( d.has_alpha )
2380 {
2381  if( has_alpha ) {
2382  alpha = d.actor( false )->clone();
2383  }
2384  if( has_beta ) {
2385  beta = d.actor( true )->clone();
2386  }
2387  if( !has_alpha && !has_beta ) {
2388  debugmsg( "Constructed a dialogue with no actors! %s", get_callstack() );
2389  }
2390  if( d.context.has_value() ) {
2391  context = *d.context;
2392  }
2393  if( d.conditionals.has_value() ) {
2394  conditionals = *d.conditionals;
2395  }
2396  callstack = d.callstack;
2397 }
2398 
2399 dialogue::dialogue( std::unique_ptr<talker> alpha_in,
2400  std::unique_ptr<talker> beta_in ) : alpha( std::move( alpha_in ) ), beta( std::move( beta_in ) )
2401 {
2402  has_alpha = alpha != nullptr;
2403  has_beta = beta != nullptr;
2404  if( !has_alpha && !has_beta ) {
2405  debugmsg( "Constructed a dialogue with no actors! %s", get_callstack() );
2406  }
2407 }
2408 
2409 dialogue::dialogue( std::unique_ptr<talker> alpha_in,
2410  std::unique_ptr<talker> beta_in,
2411  const std::unordered_map<std::string, std::function<bool( dialogue & )>> &cond ) : alpha( std::move(
2412  alpha_in ) ), beta( std::move( beta_in ) ), conditionals( cond )
2413 {
2414  has_alpha = alpha != nullptr;
2415  has_beta = beta != nullptr;
2416  if( !has_alpha && !has_beta ) {
2417  debugmsg( "Constructed a dialogue with no actors! %s", get_callstack() );
2418  }
2419 }
2420 
2421 dialogue::dialogue( std::unique_ptr<talker> alpha_in,
2422  std::unique_ptr<talker> beta_in,
2423  const std::unordered_map<std::string, std::function<bool( dialogue & )>> &cond,
2424  const std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> &ctx ) : alpha( std::move( alpha_in ) ),
2425  beta( std::move( beta_in ) ), context( ctx ), conditionals( cond )
2426 {
2427  has_alpha = alpha != nullptr;
2428  has_beta = beta != nullptr;
2429 
2430  if( !has_alpha && !has_beta ) {
2431  debugmsg( "Constructed a dialogue with no actors! %s", get_callstack() );
2432  }
2433 }
2434 
2435 talk_data talk_response::create_option_line( dialogue &d, const input_event &hotkey,
2436  const bool is_computer )
2437 {
2438  std::string ftext;
2439  text = ( truefalse_condition( d ) ? truetext : falsetext ).translated();
2440  if( trial.type == TALK_TRIAL_NONE || trial.type == TALK_TRIAL_CONDITION ) {
2441  // regular dialogue
2442  ftext = text;
2443  } else if( trial.type == TALK_TRIAL_SKILL_CHECK ) {
2444  const Skill &req_skill = skill_id( trial.skill_required ).obj();
2445  ftext = string_format( pgettext( "talk option", "[%1$s %2$d/%3$d] %4$s" ),
2446  req_skill.name(),
2447  std::min( d.actor( false )->get_skill_level( req_skill.ident() ),
2448  trial.difficulty ),
2449  trial.difficulty,
2450  text );
2451  } else {
2452  // dialogue w/ a % chance to work
2453  //~ %1$s is translated trial type, %2$d is a number, and %3$s is the translated response text
2454  ftext = string_format( pgettext( "talk option", "[%1$s %2$d%%] %3$s" ),
2455  trial.name(), trial.calc_chance( d ), text );
2456  }
2457  if( d.actor( true )->get_npc() ) {
2458  parse_tags( ftext, *d.actor( false )->get_character(), *d.actor( true )->get_npc(), d,
2459  success.next_topic.item_type );
2460  } else {
2461  parse_tags( ftext, *d.actor( false )->get_character(), *d.actor( false )->get_character(), d,
2462  success.next_topic.item_type );
2463  }
2464 
2465  nc_color color;
2466  std::set<dialogue_consequence> consequences = get_consequences( d );
2467  if( consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::hostile ) > 0 ) {
2468  color = c_red;
2469  } else if( text[0] == '*' || consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::helpless ) > 0 ) {
2470  color = c_light_red;
2471  } else if( text[0] == '&' || consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::action ) > 0 ||
2472  is_computer ) {
2473  color = c_green;
2474  } else {
2475  color = c_white;
2476  }
2477  talk_data results;
2478  results.color = color;
2479  results.hotkey_desc = right_justify( hotkey.short_description(), 2 );
2480  results.text = ftext;
2481  return results;
2482 }
2483 
2484 std::set<dialogue_consequence> talk_response::get_consequences( dialogue &d ) const
2485 {
2486  int chance = trial.calc_chance( d );
2487  if( chance >= 100 ) {
2488  return { success.get_consequence( d ) };
2489  } else if( chance <= 0 ) {
2490  return { failure.get_consequence( d ) };
2491  }
2492 
2493  return {{ success.get_consequence( d ), failure.get_consequence( d ) }};
2494 }
2495 
2496 dialogue_consequence talk_effect_t::get_consequence( dialogue const &d ) const
2497 {
2498  if( d.actor( true )->check_hostile_response( opinion.anger ) ) {
2499  return dialogue_consequence::hostile;
2500  }
2501  return guaranteed_consequence;
2502 }
2503 
2504 const talk_topic &special_talk( const std::string &action )
2505 {
2506  static const std::map<std::string, talk_topic> key_map = {{
2507  { "LOOK_AT", talk_topic( "TALK_LOOK_AT" ) },
2508  { "SIZE_UP_STATS", talk_topic( "TALK_SIZE_UP" ) },
2509  { "ASSESS_PERSONALITY", talk_topic( "TALK_ASSESS_PERSON" ) },
2510  { "CHECK_OPINION", talk_topic( "TALK_OPINION" ) },
2511  { "YELL", talk_topic( "TALK_SHOUT" ) },
2512  }
2513  };
2514 
2515  const auto iter = key_map.find( action );
2516  if( iter != key_map.end() ) {
2517  return iter->second;
2518  }
2519 
2520  static const talk_topic no_topic = talk_topic( "TALK_NONE" );
2521  return no_topic;
2522 }
2523 
2524 talk_topic dialogue::opt( dialogue_window &d_win, const talk_topic &topic )
2525 {
2526  d_win.add_history_separator();
2527 
2528  ui_adaptor ui;
2529  const auto resize_cb = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2530  d_win.resize( ui );
2531  };
2532  ui.on_screen_resize( resize_cb );
2533  resize_cb( ui );
2534 
2535  // Construct full line
2536  std::string challenge = dynamic_line( topic );
2537  gen_responses( topic );
2538  // Put quotes around challenge (unless it's an action)
2539  if( challenge[0] != '*' && challenge[0] != '&' ) {
2540  challenge = string_format( _( "\"%s\"" ), challenge );
2541  }
2542 
2543  // Parse any tags in challenge
2544  if( actor( true )->get_npc() ) {
2545  parse_tags( challenge, *actor( false )->get_character(), *actor( true )->get_npc(), *this,
2546  topic.item_type );
2547  } else {
2548  parse_tags( challenge, *actor( false )->get_character(), *actor( false )->get_character(), *this,
2549  topic.item_type );
2550  }
2551  challenge = uppercase_first_letter( challenge );
2552 
2553  d_win.clear_history_highlights();
2554  if( challenge[0] == '&' ) {
2555  // No name prepended!
2556  challenge = challenge.substr( 1 );
2557  d_win.add_to_history( challenge );
2558  } else if( challenge[0] == '*' ) {
2559  // Prepend name
2560  challenge = string_format( pgettext( "npc does something", "%s %s" ), actor( true )->disp_name(),
2561  challenge.substr( 1 ) );
2562  d_win.add_to_history( challenge );
2563  } else {
2564  npc *npc_actor = actor( true )->get_npc();
2565  d_win.add_to_history( challenge, d_win.is_not_conversation ? "" : actor( true )->disp_name(),
2566  npc_actor ? npc_actor->basic_symbol_color() : c_red );
2567  }
2568 
2569  apply_speaker_effects( topic );
2570 
2571  if( responses.empty() ) {
2572  debugmsg( "No dialogue responses" );
2573  return talk_topic( "TALK_NONE" );
2574  }
2575 
2576  input_context ctxt( "DIALOGUE_CHOOSE_RESPONSE" );
2577  d_win.set_up_scrolling( ctxt );
2578  ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
2579  ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
2580  ctxt.register_action( "ANY_INPUT" );
2581  ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
2582  std::vector<talk_data> response_lines;
2583  std::vector<input_event> response_hotkeys;
2584  const auto generate_response_lines = [&]() {
2585 #if defined(__ANDROID__)
2586  ctxt.get_registered_manual_keys().clear();
2587 #endif
2588  const hotkey_queue &queue = hotkey_queue::alphabets();
2589  response_lines.clear();
2590  response_hotkeys.clear();
2591  input_event evt = ctxt.first_unassigned_hotkey( queue );
2592  for( talk_response &response : responses ) {
2593  const talk_data &td = response.create_option_line( *this, evt, d_win.is_computer );
2594  response_lines.emplace_back( td );
2595  response_hotkeys.emplace_back( evt );
2596 #if defined(__ANDROID__)
2597  ctxt.register_manual_key( evt.get_first_input(), td.text );
2598 #endif
2599  evt = ctxt.next_unassigned_hotkey( queue, evt );
2600  }
2601  d_win.set_responses( response_lines );
2602  };
2603  generate_response_lines();
2604 
2605  ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
2606  d_win.draw( d_win.is_not_conversation ? "" : actor( true )->disp_name() );
2607  } );
2608 
2609  size_t response_ind = response_hotkeys.size();
2610  bool okay;
2611  do {
2612  std::string action;
2613  do {
2614  ui_manager::redraw();
2615  input_event evt;
2616  action = ctxt.handle_input();
2617  evt = ctxt.get_raw_input();
2618  d_win.handle_scrolling( action, ctxt );
2619  talk_topic st = special_talk( action );
2620  if( st.id != "TALK_NONE" ) {
2621  return st;
2622  }
2623  if( action == "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) {
2624  // Reallocate hotkeys as keybindings may have changed
2625  generate_response_lines();
2626  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
2627  response_ind = d_win.sel_response;
2628  } else if( action == "ANY_INPUT" ) {
2629  // Check real hotkeys
2630  const auto hotkey_it = std::find( response_hotkeys.begin(),
2631  response_hotkeys.end(), evt );
2632  response_ind = std::distance( response_hotkeys.begin(), hotkey_it );
2633  } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
2634  response_ind = get_best_quit_response();
2635  }
2636  } while( response_ind >= response_hotkeys.size() ||
2637  ( action != "ANY_INPUT" && action != "QUIT" && action != "CONFIRM" ) );
2638  okay = true;
2639  std::set<dialogue_consequence> consequences = responses[response_ind].get_consequences( *this );
2640  if( consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::hostile ) > 0 ) {
2641  okay = query_yn( _( "You may be attacked! Proceed?" ) );
2642  } else if( consequences.count( dialogue_consequence::helpless ) > 0 ) {
2643  okay = query_yn( _( "You'll be helpless! Proceed?" ) );
2644  }
2645  } while( !okay );
2646 
2647  d_win.add_history_separator();
2648  d_win.add_to_history( response_lines[response_ind].text, _( "You" ), c_light_blue );
2649 
2650  talk_response chosen = responses[response_ind];
2651  if( chosen.mission_selected != nullptr ) {
2652  actor( true )->select_mission( chosen.mission_selected );
2653  }
2654 
2655  // We can't set both skill and style or training will bug out
2656  // TODO: Allow setting both skill and style
2657  actor( true )->store_chosen_training( chosen.skill, chosen.style, chosen.dialogue_spell,
2658  chosen.proficiency );
2659  const bool success = chosen.trial.roll( *this );
2660  talk_effect_t const &effects = success ? chosen.success : chosen.failure;
2661  talk_topic ret_topic = effects.apply( *this );
2662  talk_effect_t::update_missions( *this );
2663  return ret_topic;
2664 }
2665 
2666 /**
2667  * Finds the best response to use when the player is trying to quit.
2668  *
2669  * Returns the index into the response list.
2670  */
2671 int dialogue::get_best_quit_response()
2672 {
2673  if( responses.size() == 1 ) {
2674  // Only one response. Use it. Consequences will be prompted for by the caller.
2675  return 0;
2676  }
2677 
2678  // Find relevant responses
2679  for( size_t i = 0; i < responses.size(); ++i ) {
2680  const talk_response &response = responses[i];
2681  if( response.trial.calc_chance( *this ) < 100 ) {
2682  // Don't pick anything with a chance to fail.
2683  continue;
2684  }
2685 
2686  if( !response.success.effects.empty() ) {
2687  // Don't pick anything with side effects
2688  continue;
2689  }
2690 
2691  // Unfortunately, while we'd like to be able to go "back" from nested dialogue trees, the
2692  // topic stack doesn't always shrink. Returning to the previous topic is sometimes done
2693  // with TALK_NONE, or sometimes by referencing the topic id directly. No solution really
2694  // gives us something that feels right in all cases, so we only support completely leaving
2695  // the conversation via the quit key.
2696 
2697  if( response.success.next_topic.id == "TALK_DONE" ) {
2698  return i;
2699  }
2700  }
2701 
2702  return responses.size(); // Didn't find a good option
2703 }
2704 
2705 talk_trial::talk_trial( const JsonObject &jo )
2706 {
2707  static const std::unordered_map<std::string, talk_trial_type> types_map = { {
2708 #define WRAP(value) { #value, TALK_TRIAL_##value }
2709  WRAP( NONE ),
2710  WRAP( LIE ),
2711  WRAP( PERSUADE ),
2712  WRAP( INTIMIDATE ),
2713  WRAP( SKILL_CHECK ),
2714  WRAP( CONDITION )
2715 #undef WRAP
2716  }
2717  };
2718  const auto iter = types_map.find( jo.get_string( "type", "NONE" ) );
2719  if( iter == types_map.end() ) {
2720  jo.throw_error_at( "type", "invalid talk trial type" );
2721  }
2722  type = iter->second;
2723  if( type != TALK_TRIAL_NONE && type != TALK_TRIAL_CONDITION ) {
2724  difficulty = jo.get_int( "difficulty" );
2725  }
2726  if( type == TALK_TRIAL_SKILL_CHECK ) {
2727  skill_required = jo.get_string( "skill_required" );
2728  }
2729 
2730  read_condition( jo, "condition", condition, false );
2731 
2732  if( jo.has_member( "mod" ) ) {
2733  for( JsonArray jmod : jo.get_array( "mod" ) ) {
2734  trial_mod this_modifier;
2735  this_modifier.first = jmod.next_string();
2736  this_modifier.second = jmod.next_int();
2737  modifiers.push_back( this_modifier );
2738  }
2739  }
2740 }
2741 
2742 static talk_topic load_inline_topic( const JsonObject &jo )
2743 {
2744  const std::string id = jo.get_string( "id" );
2745  json_talk_topics[id].load( jo );
2746  return talk_topic( id );
2747 }
2748 
2749 talk_effect_fun_t::talk_effect_fun_t( const talkfunction_ptr &ptr )
2750 {
2751  function = [ptr]( dialogue const & d ) {
2752  if( d.actor( true )->get_npc() ) {
2753  ptr( *d.actor( true )->get_npc() );
2754  }
2755  };
2756 }
2757 
2758 talk_effect_fun_t::talk_effect_fun_t( const std::function<void( npc &p )> &ptr )
2759 {
2760  function = [ptr]( dialogue const & d ) {
2761  if( d.actor( true )->get_npc() ) {
2762  ptr( *d.actor( true )->get_npc() );
2763  }
2764  };
2765 }
2766 
2767 talk_effect_fun_t::talk_effect_fun_t( func &&fun )
2768 {
2769  function = fun;
2770 }
2771 
2772 talk_effect_fun_t::likely_rewards_t &talk_effect_fun_t::get_likely_rewards()
2773 {
2774  return likely_rewards;
2775 }
2776 
2777 static Character *get_character_from_id( const std::string &id_str, game *g )
2778 {
2779  // Return the character with character_id, return nullptr if counldn't find the character with character_id
2780  Character *temp_guy = nullptr;
2781 
2782  character_id char_id;
2783  try {
2784  char_id = character_id( std::stoi( id_str ) );
2785  } catch( const std::exception & ) {
2786  return nullptr;
2787  }
2788 
2789  // Check Avatar
2790  if( char_id == get_avatar().getID() ) {
2791  return &get_avatar();
2792  }
2793 
2794  // Check visible NPC
2795  for( npc *guy : g->get_npcs_if( [char_id]( const npc & guy ) {
2796  return guy.getID() == char_id;
2797  } ) ) {
2798  temp_guy = guy;
2799  }
2800 
2801  // Check NPC in the OverMapBuffer
2802  if( temp_guy == nullptr ) {
2803  temp_guy = g->find_npc( char_id );
2804  }
2805  return temp_guy;
2806 }
2807 
2808 static void run_item_eocs( const dialogue &d, bool is_npc, const std::vector<item_location> &items,
2809  std::string_view option, const std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> &true_eocs,
2810  const std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> &false_eocs, const std::vector <item_search_data> &data,
2811  const item_menu &f, const item_menu_mul &f_mul )
2812 {
2813  Character *guy = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
2814  guy = guy ? guy : &get_player_character();
2815  std::vector<item_location> true_items;
2816  for( const item_location &loc : items ) {
2817  // Check if item matches any search_data.
2818  bool true_tgt = data.empty();
2819  for( item_search_data datum : data ) {
2820  if( datum.check( guy, loc ) ) {
2821  true_tgt = true;
2822  break;
2823  }
2824  }
2825  if( true_tgt ) {
2826  true_items.push_back( loc );
2827  }
2828  }
2829  const auto run_eoc = [&d, is_npc]( item_location & loc,
2830  const std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> &eocs ) {
2831  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : eocs ) {
2832  // Check if item is outdated.
2833  if( loc.get_item() ) {
2834  dialogue newDialog = dialogue( d.actor( is_npc )->clone(), get_talker_for( loc ),
2835  d.get_conditionals(), d.get_context() );
2836  eoc->activate( newDialog );
2837  }
2838  }
2839  };
2840  auto filter = [true_items]( const item_location & it ) {
2841  for( const item_location &true_it : true_items ) {
2842  if( true_it == it ) {
2843  return true;
2844  }
2845  }
2846  return false;
2847  };
2848  if( option == "all" ) {
2849  for( item_location target : true_items ) {
2850  run_eoc( target, true_eocs );
2851  }
2852  if( true_items.empty() ) {
2853  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
2854  }
2855  } else if( option == "random" ) {
2856  if( !true_items.empty() ) {
2857  std::shuffle( true_items.begin(), true_items.end(), rng_get_engine() );
2858  run_eoc( true_items.back(), true_eocs );
2859  true_items.pop_back();
2860  } else {
2861  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
2862  }
2863  } else if( option == "manual" ) {
2864  item_location selected = f( filter );
2865  run_eoc( selected, true_eocs );
2866  if( selected.get_item() == nullptr ) {
2867  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
2868  }
2869  } else if( option == "manual_mult" ) {
2870  const drop_locations &selected = f_mul( filter );
2871  for( item_location target : true_items ) {
2872  bool true_eoc = false;
2873  for( const drop_location &dloc : selected ) {
2874  if( target == dloc.first ) {
2875  true_eoc = true;
2876  break;
2877  }
2878  }
2879  if( true_eoc ) {
2880  run_eoc( target, true_eocs );
2881  }
2882  }
2883  if( true_items.empty() ) {
2884  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
2885  }
2886  }
2887 }
2888 namespace talk_effect_fun
2889 {
2890 namespace
2891 {
2892 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_companion_mission( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
2893 {
2894  str_or_var id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
2895  return [id]( dialogue const & d ) {
2896  std::string role_id = id.evaluate( d );
2897  d.actor( true )->set_companion_mission( role_id );
2898  };
2899 }
2900 
2901 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_effect( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
2902  bool is_npc )
2903 {
2904  str_or_var new_effect = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
2905  bool permanent = false;
2906  bool force = false;
2907  duration_or_var dov_duration;
2908  dbl_or_var dov_intensity;
2909  if( jo.has_string( "duration" ) ) {
2910  const std::string dur_string = jo.get_string( "duration" );
2911  if( dur_string == "PERMANENT" ) {
2912  permanent = true;
2913  dov_duration = get_duration_or_var( jo, "", false, 1_turns );
2914  } else {
2915  dov_duration = get_duration_or_var( jo, "duration", false, 1000_turns );
2916  }
2917  } else {
2918  dov_duration = get_duration_or_var( jo, "duration", true );
2919  }
2920  dov_intensity = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "intensity", false, 0 );
2921  if( jo.has_bool( "force" ) ) {
2922  force = jo.get_bool( "force" );
2923  }
2924  str_or_var target;
2925  if( jo.has_member( "target_part" ) ) {
2926  target = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "target_part" ), "target_part", false, "bp_null" );
2927  } else {
2928  target.str_val = "bp_null";
2929  }
2930  return [is_npc, new_effect, dov_duration, target, permanent, force,
2931  dov_intensity]( dialogue & d ) {
2932  d.actor( is_npc )->add_effect( efftype_id( new_effect.evaluate( d ) ),
2933  dov_duration.evaluate( d ),
2934  target.evaluate( d ), permanent, force,
2935  dov_intensity.evaluate( d ) );
2936  };
2937 }
2938 
2939 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_remove_effect( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
2940  bool is_npc )
2941 {
2942  str_or_var old_effect = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
2943 
2944  str_or_var target;
2945  if( jo.has_member( "target_part" ) ) {
2946  target = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "target_part" ), "target_part", false, "bp_null" );
2947  } else {
2948  target.str_val = "bp_null";
2949  }
2950 
2951  return [is_npc, old_effect, target]( dialogue const & d ) {
2952  d.actor( is_npc )->remove_effect( efftype_id( old_effect.evaluate( d ) ), target.evaluate( d ) );
2953  };
2954 }
2955 
2956 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_trait( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
2957  bool is_npc )
2958 {
2959  str_or_var new_trait = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
2960  str_or_var new_variant;
2961 
2962  if( jo.has_member( "variant" ) ) {
2963  new_variant = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "variant" ), "variant", true );
2964  } else {
2965  new_variant.str_val = "";
2966  }
2967 
2968  return [is_npc, new_trait, new_variant]( dialogue const & d ) {
2969  const trait_id trait = trait_id( new_trait.evaluate( d ) );
2970  const mutation_variant *variant = trait->variant( new_variant.evaluate( d ) );
2971 
2972  d.actor( is_npc )->set_mutation( trait, variant );
2973  };
2974 }
2975 
2976 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_activate_trait( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
2977  bool is_npc )
2978 {
2979  str_or_var new_trait = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
2980  return [is_npc, new_trait]( dialogue const & d ) {
2981  d.actor( is_npc )->activate_mutation( trait_id( new_trait.evaluate( d ) ) );
2982  };
2983 }

2985 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_deactivate_trait( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
2986  bool is_npc )
2987 {
2988  str_or_var new_trait = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
2989  return [is_npc, new_trait]( dialogue const & d ) {
2990  d.actor( is_npc )->deactivate_mutation( trait_id( new_trait.evaluate( d ) ) );
2991  };
2992 }

2994 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_remove_trait( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
2995  bool is_npc )
2996 {
2997  str_or_var old_trait = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
2998  return [is_npc, old_trait]( dialogue const & d ) {
2999  d.actor( is_npc )->unset_mutation( trait_id( old_trait.evaluate( d ) ) );
3000  };
3001 }

3021 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_mutate( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3022  bool is_npc )
3023 {

3025  const bool use_vitamins = jo.get_bool( "use_vitamins", true );
3026  return [is_npc, highest_cat, use_vitamins]( dialogue & d ) {
3027  d.actor( is_npc )->mutate( highest_cat.evaluate( d ), use_vitamins );
3028  };
3029 }

3031 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_mutate_category( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3032  bool is_npc )
3033 {
3034  str_or_var mut_cat = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true, "" );
3035  const bool use_vitamins = jo.get_bool( "use_vitamins", true );
3036  return [is_npc, mut_cat, use_vitamins]( dialogue const & d ) {
3037  d.actor( is_npc )->mutate_category( mutation_category_id( mut_cat.evaluate( d ) ), use_vitamins );
3038  };

3041 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_mutate_towards( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3042  bool is_npc )
3043 {
3044  str_or_var trait = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true, "" );
3045  str_or_var mut_cat;
3046  if( jo.has_member( "category" ) ) {
3047  mut_cat = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "category" ), "category", false, "" );
3048  } else {
3049  mut_cat.str_val = "";
3050  }
3051  const bool use_vitamins = jo.get_bool( "use_vitamins", true );
3052 
3053  return [is_npc, trait, mut_cat, use_vitamins]( dialogue const & d ) {
3054  d.actor( is_npc )->mutate_towards( trait_id( trait.evaluate( d ) ),
3055  mutation_category_id( mut_cat.evaluate( d ) ), use_vitamins );
3056  };
3057 }

3059 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_bionic( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3060  bool is_npc )
3061 {
3062  str_or_var new_bionic = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3063  return [is_npc, new_bionic]( dialogue const & d ) {
3064  d.actor( is_npc )->add_bionic( bionic_id( new_bionic.evaluate( d ) ) );
3065  };

3068 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_lose_bionic( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3069  bool is_npc )
3070 {
3071  str_or_var old_bionic = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3072  return [is_npc, old_bionic]( dialogue const & d ) {
3073  d.actor( is_npc )->remove_bionic( bionic_id( old_bionic.evaluate( d ) ) );

3076 
3077 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_var( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3078  bool is_npc )
3079 {
3080  dbl_or_var empty;
3081  const std::string var_name = get_talk_varname( jo, member, false, empty );
3082  const std::string var_base_name = get_talk_var_basename( jo, member, false );
3083  const bool time_check = jo.has_member( "time" ) && jo.get_bool( "time" );
3084  std::vector<std::string> possible_values = jo.get_string_array( "possible_values" );
3085  if( possible_values.empty() ) {
3086  const std::string value = time_check ? "" : jo.get_string( "value" );
3087  possible_values.push_back( value );
3088  }
3089  return [is_npc, var_name, possible_values, time_check, var_base_name]( dialogue const & d ) {
3090  talker *actor = d.actor( is_npc );
3091  if( time_check ) {
3092  actor->set_value( var_name, string_format( "%d", to_turn<int>( calendar::turn ) ) );
3093  } else {
3094  int index = rng( 0, possible_values.size() - 1 );
3095  actor->set_value( var_name, possible_values[index] );
3096  get_event_bus().send<event_type::u_var_changed>( var_base_name, possible_values[index] );
3097  }
3098  };
3099 }
3100 
3101 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_remove_var( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3102  bool is_npc )
3103 {
3104  dbl_or_var empty;
3105  const std::string var_name = get_talk_varname( jo, member, false, empty );
3106  return [is_npc, var_name]( dialogue const & d ) {
3107  d.actor( is_npc )->remove_value( var_name );
3108  };
3109 }
3110 
3111 void map_add_item( item &it, tripoint_abs_ms target_pos )
3112 {
3113  if( get_map().inbounds( target_pos ) ) {
3114  get_map().add_item_or_charges( get_map().getlocal( target_pos ), it );
3115  } else {
3116  tinymap target_bay;
3117  target_bay.load( project_to<coords::omt>( target_pos ), false );
3118  target_bay.add_item_or_charges( target_bay.getlocal( target_pos ), it );
3119  }
3120 }
3121 
3122 void receive_item( itype_id &item_name, int count, std::string_view container_name,
3123  const dialogue &d, bool use_item_group, bool suppress_message,
3124  const std::vector<std::string> &flags,
3125  bool add_talker = true,
3126  const tripoint_abs_ms &p = tripoint_abs_ms(), bool force_equip = false )
3127 {
3128  if( use_item_group ) {
3129  item_group::ItemList new_items;
3130  new_items = item_group::items_from( item_group_id( item_name.c_str() ), calendar::turn );
3131  std::string popup_message;
3132  for( item &new_item : new_items ) {
3133  for( const std::string &flag : flags ) {
3134  new_item.set_flag( flag_id( flag ) );
3135  }
3136  if( add_talker ) {
3137  d.actor( false )->i_add_or_drop( new_item, force_equip );
3138  } else {
3139  map_add_item( new_item, p );
3140  }
3141  if( add_talker && !suppress_message && d.has_beta && !d.actor( true )->disp_name().empty() ) {
3142  if( new_item.count() == 1 ) {
3143  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
3144  popup_message += string_format( _( "%1$s gives you a %2$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(),
3145  new_item.tname() ) + "\n";
3146  } else {
3147  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$d is a number of items, %3$s are items
3148  popup_message += string_format( _( "%1$s gives you %2$d %3$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(),
3149  new_item.count(), new_item.tname() ) + "\n";
3150  }
3151  }
3152  }
3153  if( !popup_message.empty() ) {
3154  popup( popup_message );
3155  }
3156  } else {
3157  item new_item = item( item_name, calendar::turn );
3158  for( const std::string &flag : flags ) {
3159  new_item.set_flag( flag_id( flag ) );
3160  }
3161  if( container_name.empty() ) {
3162  if( new_item.count_by_charges() ) {
3163  new_item.charges = count;
3164  if( add_talker ) {
3165  d.actor( false )->i_add_or_drop( new_item, force_equip );
3166  } else {
3167  map_add_item( new_item, p );
3168  }
3169  } else {
3170  for( int i_cnt = 0; i_cnt < count; i_cnt++ ) {
3171  if( !new_item.ammo_default().is_null() ) {
3172  new_item.ammo_set( new_item.ammo_default() );
3173  }
3174  if( add_talker ) {
3175  d.actor( false )->i_add_or_drop( new_item, force_equip );
3176  } else {
3177  map_add_item( new_item, p );
3178  }
3179  }
3180  }
3181  if( add_talker && !suppress_message && d.has_beta && !d.actor( true )->disp_name().empty() ) {
3182  if( count == 1 ) {
3183  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
3184  popup( _( "%1$s gives you a %2$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(), new_item.tname() );
3185  } else {
3186  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$d is a number of items, %3$s are items
3187  popup( _( "%1$s gives you %2$d %3$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(), count,
3188  new_item.tname() );
3189  }
3190  }
3191  } else {
3192  item container( std::string( container_name ), calendar::turn );
3193  new_item.charges = count;
3194  container.put_in( new_item,
3195  pocket_type::CONTAINER );
3196  if( add_talker ) {
3197  d.actor( false )->i_add_or_drop( container, force_equip );
3198  } else {
3199  map_add_item( container, p );
3200  }
3201  if( add_talker && !suppress_message && d.has_beta && !d.actor( true )->disp_name().empty() ) {
3202  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
3203  popup( _( "%1$s gives you a %2$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(), container.tname() );
3204  }
3205  }
3206  }
3207 }
3208 
3209 talk_effect_fun_t f_spawn_item( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3210 {
3211  str_or_var item_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3212  str_or_var container_name;
3213  if( jo.has_member( "container" ) ) {
3214  container_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "container" ), "container", true );
3215  } else {
3216  container_name.str_val = "";
3217  }
3218  bool use_item_group = jo.get_bool( "use_item_group", false );
3219  bool suppress_message = jo.get_bool( "suppress_message", false );
3220  dbl_or_var count;
3221  if( !jo.has_int( "charges" ) ) {
3222  count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 1 );
3223  } else {
3224  count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 0 );
3225  }
3226  bool add_talker = true;
3227  if( member == "u_spawn_item" ) {
3228  add_talker = true;
3229  } else if( member == "map_spawn_item" ) {
3230  add_talker = false;
3231  }
3232  std::optional<var_info> loc_var;
3233  if( jo.has_object( "loc" ) ) {
3234  loc_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "loc" ) );
3235  }
3236  bool force_equip = jo.get_bool( "force_equip", false );
3237 
3238  std::vector<str_or_var> flags;
3239  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( "flags" ) ) {
3240  flags.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jv, "flags" ) );
3241  }
3242  talk_effect_fun_t ret( [item_name, count, container_name, use_item_group, suppress_message,
3243  add_talker, loc_var, force_equip, flags]( dialogue & d ) {
3244  itype_id iname = itype_id( item_name.evaluate( d ) );
3245  const tripoint_abs_ms target_location = get_tripoint_from_var( loc_var, d );
3246  std::vector<std::string> flags_str;
3247  flags_str.reserve( flags.size() );
3248  for( const str_or_var &flat_sov : flags ) {
3249  flags_str.emplace_back( flat_sov.evaluate( d ) );
3250  }
3251  receive_item( iname, count.evaluate( d ), container_name.evaluate( d ), d, use_item_group,
3252  suppress_message, flags_str, add_talker, target_location, force_equip );
3253  } );
3254  ret.get_likely_rewards().emplace_back( count, item_name );
3255  return ret;
3256 }
3257 
3258 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_u_buy_item( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3259 {
3260  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
3261  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
3262  dbl_or_var cost = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "cost", false, 0 );
3263  dbl_or_var count;
3264  if( !jo.has_int( "charges" ) ) {
3265  count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 1 );
3266  } else {
3267  count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 0 );
3268  }
3269  bool use_item_group = jo.get_bool( "use_item_group", false );
3270  bool suppress_message = jo.get_bool( "suppress_message", false );
3271  str_or_var container_name;
3272  if( jo.has_member( "container" ) ) {
3273  container_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "container" ), "container", true );
3274  } else {
3275  container_name.str_val = "";
3276  }
3277 
3278  std::vector<str_or_var> flags;
3279  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( "flags" ) ) {
3280  flags.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jv, "flags" ) );
3281  }
3282  str_or_var item_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3283  return [item_name, cost, count, container_name, true_eocs, false_eocs,
3284  use_item_group, suppress_message, flags]( dialogue & d ) {
3285  if( !d.actor( true )->buy_from( cost.evaluate( d ) ) ) {
3286  popup( _( "You can't afford it!" ) );
3287  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
3288  return;
3289  }
3290  itype_id iname = itype_id( item_name.evaluate( d ) );
3291  std::vector<std::string> flags_str;
3292  flags_str.reserve( flags.size() );
3293  for( const str_or_var &flat_sov : flags ) {
3294  flags_str.emplace_back( flat_sov.evaluate( d ) );
3295  }
3296  receive_item( iname, count.evaluate( d ),
3297  container_name.evaluate( d ), d, use_item_group, suppress_message, flags_str );
3298  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
3299  };
3300 }
3301 
3302 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_u_sell_item( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3303 {
3304  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
3305  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
3306  dbl_or_var cost = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "cost", false, 0 );
3307  dbl_or_var count;
3308  if( !jo.has_int( "charges" ) ) {
3309  count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 1 );
3310  } else {
3311  count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 0 );
3312  }
3313  str_or_var item_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3314  return [item_name, cost, count, true_eocs, false_eocs]( dialogue & d ) {
3315  int current_count = count.evaluate( d );
3316  itype_id current_item_name = itype_id( item_name.evaluate( d ) );
3317  if( item::count_by_charges( current_item_name ) &&
3318  d.actor( false )->has_charges( current_item_name, current_count ) ) {
3319  for( item &it : d.actor( false )->use_charges( current_item_name, current_count ) ) {
3320  it.set_owner( d.actor( true )->get_faction()->id );
3321  d.actor( true )->i_add( it );
3322  }
3323  } else if( d.actor( false )->has_amount( current_item_name, current_count ) ) {
3324  for( item &it : d.actor( false )->use_amount( current_item_name, current_count ) ) {
3325  it.set_owner( d.actor( true )->get_faction()->id );
3326  d.actor( true )->i_add( it );
3327  }
3328  } else {
3329  //~ %1$s is a translated item name
3330  popup( _( "You don't have a %1$s!" ), item::nname( current_item_name ) );
3331  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
3332  return;
3333  }
3334  if( current_count == 1 ) {
3335  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
3336  popup( _( "You give %1$s a %2$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(),
3337  item::nname( current_item_name ) );
3338  } else {
3339  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$d is a number of items, %3$s are items
3340  popup( _( "You give %1$s %2$d %3$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(), current_count,
3341  item::nname( current_item_name, current_count ) );
3342  }
3343  d.actor( true )->add_debt( cost.evaluate( d ) );
3344  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
3345  };
3346 }
3347 
3348 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_consume_item( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3349  bool is_npc )
3350 {
3351  str_or_var item_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3352  dbl_or_var charges = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "charges", false, 0 );
3353  dbl_or_var count;
3354  if( !jo.has_int( "charges" ) ) {
3355  count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 1 );
3356  } else {
3357  count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 0 );
3358  }
3359  const bool do_popup = jo.get_bool( "popup", false );
3360  return [do_popup, is_npc, item_name, count, charges]( dialogue & d ) {
3361  // this is stupid, but I couldn't get the assignment to work
3362  int current_count = count.evaluate( d );
3363  int current_charges = charges.evaluate( d );
3364  itype_id current_item_name = itype_id( item_name.evaluate( d ) );
3365  const auto consume_item = [&]( talker & p, const itype_id & item_name, int current_count,
3366  int current_charges ) {
3367  if( current_charges == 0 && item::count_by_charges( item_name ) ) {
3368  current_charges = current_count;
3369  current_count = 0;
3370  }
3371 
3372  if( current_count == 0 && current_charges > 0 &&
3373  p.has_charges( item_name, current_charges, true ) ) {
3374  p.use_charges( item_name, current_charges, true );
3375  } else if( p.has_amount( item_name, current_count ) ) {
3376  if( current_charges > 0 && p.has_charges( item_name, current_charges, true ) ) {
3377  p.use_charges( item_name, current_charges, true );
3378  }
3379  p.use_amount( item_name, current_count );
3380  } else {
3381  item old_item( item_name );
3382  //~ %1%s is the "You" or the NPC name, %2$s are a translated item name
3383  popup( _( "%1$s doesn't have a %2$s!" ), p.disp_name(), old_item.tname() );
3384  }
3385  };
3386  if( is_npc ) {
3387  consume_item( *d.actor( true ), current_item_name, current_count, current_charges );
3388  } else {
3389  if( do_popup ) {
3390  if( current_count == 1 ) {
3391  popup( _( "You give %1$s a %2$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(),
3392  item::nname( current_item_name ) );
3393  } else {
3394  popup( _( "You give %1$s %2$d %3$s." ), d.actor( true )->disp_name(), current_count,
3395  item::nname( current_item_name ), current_count );
3396  }
3397  }
3398  consume_item( *d.actor( false ), current_item_name, current_count, current_charges );
3399  }
3400  };
3401 }
3402 
3403 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_remove_item_with( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3404  bool is_npc )
3405 {
3406  str_or_var item_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3407  return [is_npc, item_name]( dialogue const & d ) {
3408  itype_id item_id = itype_id( item_name.evaluate( d ) );
3409  d.actor( is_npc )->remove_items_with( [item_id]( const item & it ) {
3410  return it.typeId() == item_id;
3411  } );
3412  };
3413 }
3414 
3415 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_u_spend_cash( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3416 {
3417  dbl_or_var amount = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member );
3418  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
3419  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
3420  return [amount, true_eocs, false_eocs]( dialogue & d ) {
3421  if( d.actor( true )->buy_from( amount.evaluate( d ) ) ) {
3422  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
3423  } else {
3424  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
3425  }
3426  };
3427 }
3428

3434  };

3445 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_change_faction_rep( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )

3450  };

3452 
3453 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_debt( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3454 {
3455  std::vector<trial_mod> debt_modifiers;
3456  for( JsonArray jmod : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
3457  trial_mod this_modifier;
3458  this_modifier.first = jmod.next_string();
3459  this_modifier.second = jmod.next_int();
3460  debt_modifiers.push_back( this_modifier );
3461  }
3462  return [debt_modifiers]( dialogue const & d ) {
3463  int debt = 0;
3464  for( const trial_mod &this_mod : debt_modifiers ) {
3465  if( this_mod.first == "TOTAL" ) {
3466  debt *= this_mod.second;
3467  } else {
3468  debt += parse_mod( d, this_mod.first, this_mod.second );
3469  }
3470  }
3471  d.actor( true )->add_debt( debt );
3472  };
3473 }
3474 
3475 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_toggle_npc_rule( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3476 {
3477  str_or_var rule = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3478  return [rule]( dialogue const & d ) {
3479  d.actor( true )->toggle_ai_rule( "ally_rule", rule.evaluate( d ) );
3480  };
3481 }
3482

3531  };

3533 
3534 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_location_variable( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3535  bool is_npc )
3536 {
3537  dbl_or_var dov_min_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "min_radius", false, 0 );
3538  dbl_or_var dov_max_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "max_radius", false, 0 );
3539  dbl_or_var dov_z_adjust = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "z_adjust", false, 0 );
3540  dbl_or_var dov_x_adjust = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "x_adjust", false, 0 );
3541  dbl_or_var dov_y_adjust = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "y_adjust", false, 0 );
3542  bool z_override = jo.get_bool( "z_override", false );
3543  const bool outdoor_only = jo.get_bool( "outdoor_only", false );
3544  const bool passable_only = jo.get_bool( "passable_only", false );
3545  std::optional<mission_target_params> target_params;
3546  if( jo.has_object( "target_params" ) ) {
3547  JsonObject target_obj = jo.get_object( "target_params" );
3548  target_params = mission_util::parse_mission_om_target( target_obj );
3549  }
3550 
3551  std::optional<str_or_var> search_target;
3552  std::optional<std::string> search_type;
3553  dbl_or_var dov_target_min_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "target_min_radius", false, 0 );
3554  dbl_or_var dov_target_max_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "target_max_radius", false, 0 );
3555  int target_types = 0;
3556  if( jo.has_member( "terrain" ) ) {
3557  target_types++;
3558  search_type = "terrain";
3559  }
3560  if( jo.has_member( "furniture" ) ) {
3561  target_types++;
3562  search_type = "furniture";
3563  }
3564  if( jo.has_member( "monster" ) ) {
3565  target_types++;
3566  search_type = "monster";
3567  }
3568  if( jo.has_member( "npc" ) ) {
3569  target_types++;
3570  search_type = "npc";
3571  }
3572  if( jo.has_member( "trap" ) ) {
3573  target_types++;
3574  search_type = "trap";
3575  }
3576  if( jo.has_member( "zone" ) ) {
3577  target_types++;
3578  search_type = "zone";
3579  }
3580  if( target_types == 1 ) {
3581  search_target = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( search_type.value() ), search_type.value(), true );
3582  } else if( target_types > 1 ) {
3583  jo.throw_error( "Can only have one of terrain, furniture, monster, trap, zone, or npc." );
3584  }
3585 
3586  var_info var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( member ) );
3587  var_type type = var.type;
3588  std::string var_name = var.name;
3589 
3590  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
3591  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
3592 
3593  return [dov_min_radius, dov_max_radius, var_name, outdoor_only, passable_only, target_params,
3594  is_npc, type, dov_x_adjust, dov_y_adjust, dov_z_adjust, z_override, true_eocs, false_eocs,
3595  search_target, search_type, dov_target_min_radius, dov_target_max_radius]( dialogue & d ) {
3596  talker *target = d.actor( is_npc );
3597  tripoint talker_pos = get_map().getabs( target->pos() );
3598  tripoint target_pos = talker_pos;
3599  if( target_params.has_value() ) {
3600  const tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = mission_util::get_om_terrain_pos( target_params.value(), d );
3601  target_pos = tripoint( project_to<coords::ms>( omt_pos ).x(), project_to<coords::ms>( omt_pos ).y(),
3602  project_to<coords::ms>( omt_pos ).z() );
3603  }
3604  const tripoint_abs_ms abs_ms( target_pos );
3605  map *here_ptr = &get_map();
3606  std::unique_ptr<map> distant_map = std::make_unique<map>();
3607  if( !get_map().inbounds( abs_ms ) ) {
3608  distant_map->load( project_to<coords::sm>( abs_ms ), false );
3609  here_ptr = distant_map.get();
3610  }
3611  map &here = *here_ptr;
3612  if( search_target.has_value() ) {
3613  if( search_type.value() == "monster" && !get_map().inbounds( abs_ms ) ) {
3614  here.spawn_monsters( true, true );
3615  }
3616  int min_target_dist = dov_target_min_radius.evaluate( d );
3617  std::string cur_search_target = search_target.value().evaluate( d );
3618  bool found = false;
3619  tripoint_range<tripoint> points = here.points_in_radius( here.getlocal( abs_ms ),
3620  size_t( dov_target_max_radius.evaluate( d ) ), size_t( 0 ) );
3621  for( const tripoint &search_loc : points ) {
3622  if( rl_dist( here.getlocal( talker_pos ), search_loc ) <= min_target_dist ) {
3623  continue;
3624  }
3625  if( search_type.value() == "terrain" ) {
3626  if( here.ter( search_loc ).id().c_str() == cur_search_target ) {
3627  target_pos = here.getabs( search_loc );
3628  found = true;
3629  break;
3630  }
3631  } else if( search_type.value() == "furniture" ) {
3632  if( here.furn( search_loc ).id().c_str() == cur_search_target ||
3633  ( !here.furn( search_loc ).id().is_null() && cur_search_target.empty() ) ) {
3634  target_pos = here.getabs( search_loc );
3635  found = true;
3636  break;
3637  }
3638  } else if( search_type.value() == "trap" ) {
3639  if( here.tr_at( search_loc ).id.c_str() == cur_search_target ||
3640  ( !here.tr_at( search_loc ).is_null() &&
3641  cur_search_target.empty() ) ) {
3642  target_pos = here.getabs( search_loc );
3643  found = true;
3644  break;
3645  }
3646  } else if( search_type.value() == "monster" ) {
3647  Creature *tmp_critter = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( here.getglobal( search_loc ) );
3648  if( tmp_critter != nullptr && tmp_critter->is_monster() &&
3649  ( tmp_critter->as_monster()->type->id.c_str() == cur_search_target ||
3650  cur_search_target.empty() ) ) {
3651  target_pos = here.getabs( search_loc );
3652  found = true;
3653  g->despawn_nonlocal_monsters();
3654  break;
3655  }
3656  } else if( search_type.value() == "npc" ) {
3657  for( shared_ptr_fast<npc> &person : overmap_buffer.get_npcs_near( project_to<coords::sm>( abs_ms ),
3658  1 ) ) {
3659  if( person->pos() == search_loc && ( person->myclass.c_str() == cur_search_target ||
3660  cur_search_target.empty() ) ) {
3661  target_pos = here.getabs( search_loc );
3662  found = true;
3663  break;
3664  }
3665  }
3666  } else if( search_type.value() == "zone" ) {
3667  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
3668  if( mgr.get_zone_at( here.getglobal( search_loc ), zone_type_id( cur_search_target ) ) ) {
3669  target_pos = here.getabs( search_loc );
3670  found = true;
3671  break;
3672  }
3673  }
3674  }
3675  talker_pos = target_pos;
3676  if( search_type.value() == "monster" ) {
3677  g->despawn_nonlocal_monsters();
3678  }
3679  if( !found ) {
3680  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
3681  return;
3682  }
3683  }
3684 
3685  int max_radius = dov_max_radius.evaluate( d );
3686  if( max_radius > 0 ) {
3687  bool found = false;
3688  int min_radius = dov_min_radius.evaluate( d );
3689  for( int attempts = 0; attempts < 25; attempts++ ) {
3690  target_pos = talker_pos + tripoint( rng( -max_radius, max_radius ), rng( -max_radius, max_radius ),
3691  0 );
3692  if( ( !outdoor_only || here.is_outside( target_pos ) ) &&
3693  ( !passable_only || here.passable( here.getlocal( target_pos ) ) ) &&
3694  rl_dist( target_pos, talker_pos ) >= min_radius ) {
3695  found = true;
3696  break;
3697  }
3698  }
3699  if( !found ) {
3700  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
3701  return;
3702  }
3703  }
3704 
3705  // move the found value by the adjusts
3706  target_pos = target_pos + tripoint( dov_x_adjust.evaluate( d ), dov_y_adjust.evaluate( d ), 0 );
3707 
3708  if( z_override ) {
3709  target_pos = tripoint( target_pos.xy(),
3710  dov_z_adjust.evaluate( d ) );
3711  } else {
3712  target_pos = target_pos + tripoint( 0, 0,
3713  dov_z_adjust.evaluate( d ) );
3714  }
3715  write_var_value( type, var_name, &d, target_pos.to_string() );
3716  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
3717  };
3718 }
3719 
3720 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_location_variable_adjust( const JsonObject &jo,
3721  std::string_view member )
3722 {
3723  dbl_or_var dov_z_adjust = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "z_adjust", false, 0 );
3724  dbl_or_var dov_x_adjust = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "x_adjust", false, 0 );
3725  dbl_or_var dov_y_adjust = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "y_adjust", false, 0 );
3726  bool z_override = jo.get_bool( "z_override", false );
3727  bool overmap_tile = jo.get_bool( "overmap_tile", false );
3728 
3729  std::optional<var_info> input_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( member ) );
3730 
3731  std::optional<var_info> output_var;
3732  if( jo.has_member( "output_var" ) ) {
3733  output_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "output_var" ) );
3734  }
3735  return [input_var, dov_x_adjust, dov_y_adjust, dov_z_adjust, z_override,
3736  output_var, overmap_tile ]( dialogue & d ) {
3737  tripoint_abs_ms target_pos = get_tripoint_from_var( input_var, d );
3738 
3739  if( overmap_tile ) {
3740  target_pos = target_pos + tripoint( dov_x_adjust.evaluate( d ) * coords::map_squares_per(
3741  coords::omt ), dov_y_adjust.evaluate( d ) * coords::map_squares_per( coords::omt ), 0 );
3742  } else {
3743  target_pos = target_pos + tripoint( dov_x_adjust.evaluate( d ), dov_y_adjust.evaluate( d ), 0 );
3744  }
3745 
3746  if( z_override ) {
3747  target_pos = tripoint_abs_ms( target_pos.xy(), dov_z_adjust.evaluate( d ) );
3748  } else {
3749  target_pos = target_pos + tripoint( 0, 0, dov_z_adjust.evaluate( d ) );
3750  }
3751  if( output_var.has_value() ) {
3752  write_var_value( output_var.value().type, output_var.value().name, &d, target_pos.to_string() );
3753  } else {
3754  write_var_value( input_var.value().type, input_var.value().name, &d, target_pos.to_string() );
3755  }
3756  };
3757 }
3758 
3759 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_transform_radius( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3760  bool is_npc )
3761 {
3762  str_or_var transform = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "ter_furn_transform" ),
3763  "ter_furn_transform", true );
3764  dbl_or_var dov = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member );
3765  duration_or_var dov_time_in_future = get_duration_or_var( jo, "time_in_future", false,
3766  0_seconds );
3767  std::optional<var_info> target_var;
3768  if( jo.has_member( "target_var" ) ) {
3769  target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "target_var" ) );
3770  }
3771  str_or_var key;
3772  if( jo.has_member( "key" ) ) {
3773  key = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "key" ), "key", false, "" );
3774  } else {
3775  key.str_val = "";
3776  }
3777  return [dov, transform, target_var, dov_time_in_future, key, is_npc]( dialogue & d ) {
3778  tripoint_abs_ms target_pos = d.actor( is_npc )->global_pos();
3779  if( target_var.has_value() ) {
3780  target_pos = get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d );
3781  }
3782 
3783  int radius = dov.evaluate( d );
3784  time_duration future = dov_time_in_future.evaluate( d );
3785  if( future > 0_seconds ) {
3786  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::TRANSFORM_RADIUS,
3787  calendar::turn + future + 1_seconds,
3788  //Timed events happen before the player turn and eocs are during so we add a second here to sync them up using the same variable
3789  -1, target_pos, radius, transform.evaluate( d ), key.evaluate( d ) );
3790  } else {
3791  // Use the main map when possible to reduce performance overhead.
3792  if( get_map().inbounds( target_pos - point{ radius, radius} ) &&
3793  get_map().inbounds( target_pos + point{ radius, radius} ) ) {
3794  get_map().transform_radius( ter_furn_transform_id( transform.evaluate( d ) ), radius, target_pos );
3795  } else {
3796  map tm;
3797  tm.load( project_to<coords::sm>( target_pos - point{ radius, radius} ), false );
3798  tm.transform_radius( ter_furn_transform_id( transform.evaluate( d ) ), radius, target_pos );
3799  }
3800 
3801  }
3802  };
3803 }
3804 
3805 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_transform_line( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3806 {
3807  str_or_var transform = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3808  var_info first = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "first" ) );
3809  var_info second = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "second" ) );
3810 
3811  return [transform, first, second]( dialogue const & d ) {
3812  tripoint_abs_ms const t_first = get_tripoint_from_var( first, d );
3813  tripoint_abs_ms const t_second = get_tripoint_from_var( second, d );
3814  tripoint_abs_ms const orig = coord_min( t_first, t_second );
3815  map tm;
3816  tm.load( project_to<coords::sm>( orig ), false );
3817  tm.transform_line( ter_furn_transform_id( transform.evaluate( d ) ), t_first, t_second );
3818  };
3819 }
3820 
3821 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_place_override( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3822 {
3823  translation_or_var new_place = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member );
3824  duration_or_var dov_length = get_duration_or_var( jo, "length", true );
3825  str_or_var key;
3826  if( jo.has_member( "key" ) ) {
3827  key = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "key" ), "key", false, "" );
3828  } else {
3829  key.str_val = "";
3830  }
3831  return [new_place, dov_length, key]( dialogue & d ) {
3832  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::OVERRIDE_PLACE,
3833  calendar::turn + dov_length.evaluate( d ) + 1_seconds,
3834  //Timed events happen before the player turn and eocs are during so we add a second here to sync them up using the same variable
3835  -1, tripoint_abs_ms( tripoint_zero ), -1, new_place.evaluate( d ), key.evaluate( d ) );
3836  };
3837 }
3838 
3839 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_mapgen_update( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3840 {
3841  mission_target_params target_params = mission_util::parse_mission_om_target( jo );
3842  std::vector<str_or_var> update_ids;
3843  duration_or_var dov_time_in_future = get_duration_or_var( jo, "time_in_future", false,
3844  0_seconds );
3845  if( jo.has_string( member ) ) {
3846  update_ids.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member ) );
3847  } else if( jo.has_array( member ) ) {
3848  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
3849  update_ids.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jv, member ) );
3850  }
3851  }
3852  std::optional<var_info> target_var;
3853  if( jo.has_member( "target_var" ) ) {
3854  target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "target_var" ) );
3855  }
3856  str_or_var key;
3857  if( jo.has_member( "key" ) ) {
3858  key = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "key" ), "key", false, "" );
3859  } else {
3860  key.str_val = "";
3861  }
3862  return [target_params, update_ids, target_var, dov_time_in_future, key]( dialogue & d ) {
3863  tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos;
3864  if( target_var.has_value() ) {
3865  const tripoint_abs_ms abs_ms( get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d ) );
3866  omt_pos = project_to<coords::omt>( abs_ms );
3867  } else {
3868  mission_target_params update_params = target_params;
3869  if( d.has_beta ) {
3870  update_params.guy = d.actor( true )->get_npc();
3871  }
3872  omt_pos = mission_util::get_om_terrain_pos( update_params, d );
3873  }
3874  time_duration future = dov_time_in_future.evaluate( d );
3875  if( future > 0_seconds ) {
3876  time_point tif = calendar::turn + future + 1_seconds;
3877  //Timed events happen before the player turn and eocs are during so we add a second here to sync them up using the same variable
3878  for( const str_or_var &mapgen_update_id : update_ids ) {
3879  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::UPDATE_MAPGEN, tif, -1, project_to<coords::ms>( omt_pos ),
3880  0, mapgen_update_id.evaluate( d ), key.evaluate( d ) );
3881  }
3882 
3883  } else {
3884  for( const str_or_var &mapgen_update_id : update_ids ) {
3885  run_mapgen_update_func( update_mapgen_id( mapgen_update_id.evaluate( d ) ), omt_pos, {},
3886  d.actor( d.has_beta )->selected_mission() );
3887  set_queued_points();
3888  }
3889  get_map().invalidate_map_cache( omt_pos.z() );
3890  }
3891  };
3892 }
3893 
3894 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_alter_timed_events( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3895 {
3896  str_or_var key = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
3897  duration_or_var time_in_future = get_duration_or_var( jo, "time_in_future", false,
3898  0_seconds );
3899  return [key, time_in_future]( dialogue & d ) {
3900  get_timed_events().set_all( key.evaluate( d ), time_in_future.evaluate( d ) );
3901  };
3902 }
3903 
3904 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_revert_location( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
3905 {
3906  duration_or_var dov_time_in_future = get_duration_or_var( jo, "time_in_future", true );
3907  str_or_var key;
3908  if( jo.has_member( "key" ) ) {
3909  key = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "key" ), "key", false, "" );
3910  } else {
3911  key.str_val = "";
3912  }
3913  std::optional<var_info> target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( member ) );
3914  return [target_var, dov_time_in_future, key]( dialogue & d ) {
3915  const tripoint_abs_ms abs_ms( get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d ) );
3916  tripoint_abs_omt omt_pos = project_to<coords::omt>( abs_ms );
3917  time_point tif = calendar::turn + dov_time_in_future.evaluate( d ) + 1_seconds;
3918  // Timed events happen before the player turn and eocs are during so we add a second here to sync them up using the same variable
3919  // maptile is 4 submaps so queue up 4 submap reverts
3920  const tripoint_abs_sm revert_sm_base = project_to<coords::sm>( omt_pos );
3921 
3922  for( int x = 0; x < 2; x++ ) {
3923  for( int y = 0; y < 2; y++ ) {
3924  const tripoint_abs_sm revert_sm = revert_sm_base + point( x, y );
3925  submap *sm = MAPBUFFER.lookup_submap( revert_sm );
3926  if( sm == nullptr ) {
3927  tinymap tm;
3928  // This creates the submaps if they didn't already exist.
3929  // Note that all four submaps are loaded/created by this
3930  // call, so the submap lookup can fail at most once.
3931  tm.load( omt_pos, true );
3932  sm = MAPBUFFER.lookup_submap( revert_sm );
3933  }
3934  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::REVERT_SUBMAP, tif, -1,
3935  project_to<coords::ms>( revert_sm ), 0, "",
3936  sm->get_revert_submap(), key.evaluate( d ) );
3937  }
3938  }
3939 
3940  get_map().invalidate_map_cache( omt_pos.z() );
3941  };
3942 }
3943 
3944 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_npc_goal( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3945  bool is_npc )
3946 {
3947  mission_target_params dest_params = mission_util::parse_mission_om_target( jo.get_object(
3948  member ) );
3949  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
3950  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
3951  return [dest_params, true_eocs, false_eocs, is_npc]( dialogue & d ) {
3952  npc *guy = d.actor( is_npc )->get_npc();
3953  if( guy ) {
3954  tripoint_abs_omt destination = mission_util::get_om_terrain_pos( dest_params, d );
3955  guy->goal = destination;
3956  guy->omt_path = overmap_buffer.get_travel_path( guy->global_omt_location(), guy->goal,
3957  overmap_path_params::for_npc() );
3958  if( destination == tripoint_abs_omt() || destination == overmap::invalid_tripoint ||
3959  guy->omt_path.empty() ) {
3960  guy->goal = npc::no_goal_point;
3961  guy->omt_path.clear();
3962  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
3963  return;
3964  }
3965  guy->set_mission( NPC_MISSION_TRAVELLING );
3966  guy->guard_pos = std::nullopt;
3967  guy->set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
3968  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
3969  return;
3970  }
3971  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
3972  };
3973 }
3974 
3975 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_guard_pos( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3976  bool is_npc )
3977 {
3978  std::optional<var_info> target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( member ) );
3979  bool unique_id = jo.get_bool( "unique_id", false );
3980  return [target_var, unique_id, is_npc]( dialogue const & d ) {
3981  npc *guy = d.actor( is_npc )->get_npc();
3982  if( guy ) {
3983  var_info cur_var = target_var.value();
3984  if( unique_id ) {
3985  //12 since it should start with npctalk_var
3986  cur_var.name.insert( 12, guy->get_unique_id() );
3987  }
3988  tripoint_abs_ms target_location = get_tripoint_from_var( cur_var, d );
3989  guy->set_guard_pos( target_location );
3990  }
3991  };
3992 }
3993 
3994 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_bulk_trade_accept( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
3995  bool is_npc )
3996 {
3997  dbl_or_var dov_quantity;
3998  if( jo.has_member( member ) ) {
3999  dov_quantity = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member, false, -1 );
4000  } else {
4001  dov_quantity.min.dbl_val = -1;
4002  }
4003  bool is_trade = member == "u_bulk_trade_accept" || member == "npc_bulk_trade_accept";
4004  return [is_trade, is_npc, dov_quantity]( dialogue & d ) {
4005  talker *seller = d.actor( is_npc );
4006  talker *buyer = d.actor( !is_npc );
4007  item tmp( d.cur_item );
4008  int quantity = dov_quantity.evaluate( d );
4009  int seller_has = 0;
4010  int seller_has_loose = 0;
4011  std::vector<item> seller_cans;
4012  auto is_canned_item = [&tmp]( const item & e ) {
4013  std::vector<const item_pocket *> pockets = e.get_all_contained_pockets();
4014  return pockets.size() == 1 &&
4015  pockets[0]->size() == 1 &&
4016  pockets[0]->sealed() &&
4017  pockets[0]->front().type == tmp.type;
4018  };
4019  if( tmp.count_by_charges() ) {
4020  seller_has = seller->charges_of( d.cur_item );
4021  } else {
4022  std::vector<item *> cans_tmp = seller->items_with( is_canned_item );
4023  for( item *it : cans_tmp ) {
4024  seller_cans.emplace_back( *it );
4025  }
4026  seller_has_loose = seller->items_with( [&tmp,
4027  &cans_tmp]( const item & e ) {
4028  return tmp.type == e.type &&
4029  !std::any_of( cans_tmp.begin(), cans_tmp.end(), [&e]( const item * n ) {
4030  return &n->get_all_contained_pockets()[0]->front() == &e;
4031  } );
4032  } ).size();
4033  seller_has = cans_tmp.size() + seller_has_loose;
4034 
4035  }
4036  seller_has = ( quantity == -1 ) ? seller_has : std::min( seller_has, quantity );
4037  tmp.charges = seller_has;
4038  if( is_trade ) {
4039  const int npc_debt = d.actor( true )->debt();
4040  int price = total_price( *seller, d.cur_item ) * ( is_npc ? -1 : 1 ) + npc_debt;
4041  if( d.actor( true )->get_faction() && !d.actor( true )->get_faction()->currency.is_empty() ) {
4042  const itype_id &pay_in = d.actor( true )->get_faction()->currency;
4043  item pay( pay_in );
4044  const int value = d.actor( true )->value( pay );
4045  if( value > 0 ) {
4046  int required = price / value;
4047  int buyer_has = required;
4048  if( is_npc ) {
4049  buyer_has = std::min( buyer_has, buyer->charges_of( pay_in ) );
4050  buyer->use_charges( pay_in, buyer_has );
4051  } else {
4052  if( buyer_has == 1 ) {
4053  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$s is an item
4054  popup( _( "%1$s gives you a %2$s." ), buyer->disp_name(),
4055  pay.tname() );
4056  } else if( buyer_has > 1 ) {
4057  //~ %1%s is the NPC name, %2$d is a number of items, %3$s are items
4058  popup( _( "%1$s gives you %2$d %3$s." ), buyer->disp_name(), buyer_has,
4059  pay.tname() );
4060  }
4061  }
4062  for( int i = 0; i < buyer_has; i++ ) {
4063  seller->i_add( pay );
4064  price -= value;
4065  }
4066  } else {
4067  debugmsg( "%s pays in bulk_trade_accept with faction currency worth 0!",
4068  d.actor( true )->disp_name() );
4069  }
4070  } else {
4071  debugmsg( "%s has no faction currency to pay with in bulk_trade_accept!",
4072  d.actor( true )->disp_name() );
4073  }
4074  d.actor( true )->add_debt( -npc_debt );
4075  d.actor( true )->add_debt( price );
4076  }
4077  if( tmp.count_by_charges() ) {
4078  seller->use_charges( d.cur_item, seller_has );
4079  } else {
4080  seller->use_amount( d.cur_item, seller_has_loose );
4081  seller->remove_items_with( is_canned_item );
4082  }
4083  if( seller_cans.size() != size_t( seller_has ) ) {
4084  buyer->i_add( tmp );
4085  }
4086  for( const item &it : seller_cans ) {
4087  buyer->i_add( it );
4088  }
4089  };
4090 }
4091 
4092 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_npc_gets_item( bool to_use )
4093 {
4094  return [to_use]( dialogue const & d ) {
4095  d.reason = d.actor( true )->give_item_to( to_use );
4096  };
4097 }
4098 
4099 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_mission( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4100 {
4101  str_or_var mission_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4102  return [mission_id]( dialogue const & d ) {
4103  d.actor( true )->add_mission( mission_type_id( mission_id.evaluate( d ) ) );
4104  };
4105 }
4106 
4107 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_u_buy_monster( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4108 {
4109  str_or_var monster_type_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4110  dbl_or_var cost = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "cost", false, 0 );
4111  dbl_or_var count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "count", false, 1 );
4112  const bool pacified = jo.get_bool( "pacified", false );
4113  translation_or_var name;
4114  if( jo.has_member( "name" ) ) {
4115  name = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( "name" ), "name", true );
4116  } else {
4117  name.str_val = translation();
4118  }
4119  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
4120  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
4121  return [monster_type_id, cost, count, pacified, name, true_eocs,
4122  false_eocs]( dialogue & d ) {
4123  const mtype_id mtype( monster_type_id.evaluate( d ) );
4124  translation translated_name = no_translation( name.evaluate( d ) );
4125  if( d.actor( false )->buy_monster( *d.actor( true ), mtype, cost.evaluate( d ), count.evaluate( d ),
4126  pacified, translated_name ) ) {
4127  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
4128  } else {
4129  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
4130  }
4131  };
4132 }
4133 
4134 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_learn_recipe( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4135  bool is_npc )
4136 {
4137  str_or_var learned_recipe_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4138  return [learned_recipe_id, is_npc]( dialogue const & d ) {
4139  const recipe_id &r = recipe_id( learned_recipe_id.evaluate( d ) );
4140  d.actor( is_npc )->learn_recipe( r );
4141  };
4142 }
4143 
4144 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_forget_recipe( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4145  bool is_npc )
4146 {
4147  str_or_var forgotten_recipe_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4148  return [forgotten_recipe_id, is_npc]( dialogue const & d ) {
4149  const recipe_id &r = recipe_id( forgotten_recipe_id.evaluate( d ) );
4150  d.actor( is_npc )->forget_recipe( r );
4151  };
4152 }
4153 
4154 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_turn_cost( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4155 {
4156  duration_or_var cost = get_duration_or_var( jo, member, true );
4157  return [cost]( dialogue & d ) {
4158  Character *target = d.actor( false )->get_character();
4159  if( target ) {
4160  target->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( cost.evaluate( d ) ) );
4161  }
4162  };
4163 }
4164 
4165 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_npc_first_topic( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4166 {
4167  str_or_var chat_topic = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4168  return [chat_topic]( dialogue const & d ) {
4169  d.actor( true )->set_first_topic( chat_topic.evaluate( d ) );
4170  };
4171 }
4172 
4173 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_message( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4174  bool is_npc )
4175 {
4176  const bool snippet = jo.get_bool( "snippet", false );
4177  str_or_var snip_id;
4178  translation_or_var message;
4179  if( snippet ) {
4180  snip_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member );
4181  } else {
4182  message = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member );
4183  }
4184  const bool same_snippet = jo.get_bool( "same_snippet", false );
4185  const bool outdoor_only = jo.get_bool( "outdoor_only", false );
4186  const bool sound = jo.get_bool( "sound", false );
4187  const bool popup_msg = jo.get_bool( "popup", false );
4188  const bool popup_w_interrupt_query_msg = jo.get_bool( "popup_w_interrupt_query", false );
4189  str_or_var interrupt_type;
4190  if( jo.has_member( "interrupt_type" ) ) {
4191  interrupt_type = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "interrupt_type" ), "interrupt_type", true );
4192  } else {
4193  interrupt_type.str_val = "default";
4194  }
4195  const bool global = member == "message";
4196  str_or_var type_string;
4197  if( jo.has_member( "type" ) ) {
4198  type_string = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "type" ), "type", true );
4199  } else {
4200  type_string.str_val = "neutral";
4201  }
4202  return [snip_id, message, outdoor_only, sound, snippet, same_snippet, type_string,
4203  popup_msg, popup_w_interrupt_query_msg, interrupt_type, global, is_npc]
4204  ( dialogue const & d ) {
4205  Character *target = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
4206  if( global ) {
4207  target = &get_player_character();
4208  }
4209  if( !target || target->is_npc() ) {
4210  return;
4211  }
4212  game_message_type type = m_neutral;
4213  if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "good" ) {
4214  type = m_good;
4215  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "neutral" ) {
4216  type = m_neutral;
4217  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "bad" ) {
4218  type = m_bad;
4219  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "mixed" ) {
4220  type = m_mixed;
4221  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "warning" ) {
4222  type = m_warning;
4223  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "info" ) {
4224  type = m_info;
4225  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "debug" ) {
4226  type = m_debug;
4227  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "headshot" ) {
4228  type = m_headshot;
4229  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "critical" ) {
4230  type = m_critical;
4231  } else if( type_string.evaluate( d ) == "grazing" ) {
4232  type = m_grazing;
4233  } else {
4234  debugmsg( "Invalid message type." );
4235  }
4236  std::string translated_message;
4237  if( snippet ) {
4238  if( same_snippet ) {
4239  talker *target = d.actor( !is_npc );
4240  std::string sid = target->get_value( snip_id.evaluate( d ) + "_snippet_id" );
4241  if( sid.empty() ) {
4242  sid = SNIPPET.random_id_from_category( snip_id.evaluate( d ) ).c_str();
4243  target->set_value( snip_id.evaluate( d ) + "_snippet_id", sid );
4244  }
4245  translated_message = SNIPPET.expand( SNIPPET.get_snippet_by_id( snippet_id( sid ) ).value_or(
4246  translation() ).translated() );
4247  } else {
4248  translated_message = SNIPPET.expand( SNIPPET.random_from_category( snip_id.evaluate( d ) ).value_or(
4249  translation() ).translated() );
4250  }
4251  } else {
4252  translated_message = message.evaluate( d );
4253  }
4254  std::unique_ptr<talker> default_talker = get_talker_for( get_player_character() );
4255  talker &alpha = d.has_alpha ? *d.actor( false ) : *default_talker;
4256  talker &beta = d.has_beta ? *d.actor( true ) : *default_talker;
4257  parse_tags( translated_message, alpha, beta, d );
4258  if( sound ) {
4259  bool display = false;
4260  map &here = get_map();
4261  if( !target->has_effect( effect_sleep ) && !target->is_deaf() ) {
4262  if( !outdoor_only || here.get_abs_sub().z() >= 0 ||
4263  one_in( std::max( roll_remainder( 2.0f * here.get_abs_sub().z() / target->hearing_ability() ),
4264  1 ) ) ) {
4265  display = true;
4266  }
4267  }
4268  if( !display ) {
4269  return;
4270  }
4271  }
4272  if( popup_msg ) {
4273  popup( translated_message );
4274  g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::eoc, "" );
4275  }
4276  if( popup_w_interrupt_query_msg ) {
4277  if( interrupt_type.evaluate( d ) == "portal_storm_popup" ) {
4278  g->portal_storm_query( distraction_type::portal_storm_popup,
4279  translated_message );
4280  } else if( interrupt_type.evaluate( d ) == "default" ) {
4281  debugmsg( "Interrupt query called in json without proper interrupt type." );
4282  }
4283  // Would probably need an else-if for every possible distraction type, like this:
4284  //else if (interrupt_type == "hostile_spotted_near"){
4285  // g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query(distraction_type::hostile_spotted_near, "sample message");
4286  //}
4287  // I leave this to contributors who might actually wish to implement such interrupts,
4288  // so as to not overcomplicate the code.
4289  } else {
4290  target->add_msg_if_player( type, translated_message );
4291  }
4292 
4293  };
4294 }
4295 
4296 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_assign_activity( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4297  bool is_npc )
4298 {
4299  duration_or_var dov = get_duration_or_var( jo, "duration", true );
4300  str_or_var act = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4301  return [is_npc, dov, act]( dialogue & d ) {
4302  Character *target = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
4303  if( target ) {
4304  target->assign_activity( activity_id( act.evaluate( d ) ), to_moves<int>( dov.evaluate( d ) ) );
4305  }
4306  };
4307 }
4308 
4309 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_wet( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4310  bool is_npc )
4311 {
4312  dbl_or_var dov = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member );
4313  return [is_npc, dov]( dialogue & d ) {
4314  Character *target = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
4315  if( target ) {
4316  wet_character( *target, dov.evaluate( d ) );
4317  }
4318  };
4319 }
4320 
4321 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_open_dialogue( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4322 {
4323  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs;
4324  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs;
4325  str_or_var topic;
4326  bool has_member = false;
4327  if( jo.has_object( member ) ) {
4328  has_member = true;
4329  JsonObject innerJo = jo.get_object( member );
4330  true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( innerJo, "true_eocs" );
4331  false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( innerJo, "false_eocs" );
4332  topic = get_str_or_var( innerJo.get_member( "topic" ), "topic" );
4333  }
4334  return [true_eocs, false_eocs, topic, has_member]( dialogue const & d ) {
4335  std::string actual_topic;
4336  if( has_member ) {
4337  actual_topic = topic.evaluate( d );
4338  }
4339  if( !d.actor( false )->get_character()->is_avatar() ) { //only open a dialog if the avatar is alpha
4340  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
4341  return;
4342  } else if( !actual_topic.empty() ) {
4343  get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( std::vector<std::string> { actual_topic } ), false, false,
4344  true );
4345  } else if( d.actor( true )->get_character() != nullptr ) {
4346  get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( d.actor( true )->get_character() ) );
4347  } else if( d.actor( true )->get_creature() != nullptr ) {
4348  get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( d.actor( true )->get_creature() ) );
4349  } else if( d.actor( true )->get_monster() != nullptr ) {
4350  get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( d.actor( true )->get_monster() ) );
4351  } else if( d.actor( true )->get_item() != nullptr ) {
4352  get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( d.actor( true )->get_item() ) );
4353  } else if( d.actor( true )->get_computer() != nullptr ) {
4354  get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( d.actor( true )->get_computer() ), false, true );
4355  }
4356  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
4357  };
4358 }
4359 
4360 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_take_control( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view )
4361 {
4362  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
4363  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
4364  return [true_eocs, false_eocs]( dialogue const & d ) {
4365  if( !d.actor( false )->get_character()->is_avatar() ) { //only take control if the avatar is alpha
4366  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
4367  return;
4368  } else if( d.actor( true )->get_npc() != nullptr ) {
4369  get_avatar().control_npc( *d.actor( true )->get_npc() );
4370  }
4371  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
4372  };
4373 }
4374 
4375 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_take_control_menu()
4376 {
4377  return []( dialogue const &/* d */ ) {
4378  get_avatar().control_npc_menu();
4379  };
4380 }
4381 
4382 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_sound_effect( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4383 {
4384  str_or_var variant = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4385  str_or_var id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "id" ), "id", true );
4386  const bool outdoor_event = jo.get_bool( "outdoor_event", false );
4387  dbl_or_var volume;
4388  if( jo.has_member( "volume" ) ) {
4389  volume = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "volume", false, -1 );
4390  } else {
4391  volume.min.dbl_val = -1;
4392  }
4393  return [variant, id, outdoor_event, volume]( dialogue & d ) {
4394  map &here = get_map();
4395  int local_volume = volume.evaluate( d );
4396  Character *target = &get_player_character(); //Only the player can hear sound effects.
4397  if( target && !target->has_effect( effect_sleep ) && !target->is_deaf() ) {
4398  if( !outdoor_event || here.get_abs_sub().z() >= 0 ) {
4399  if( local_volume == -1 ) {
4400  local_volume = 80;
4401  }
4402  sfx::play_variant_sound( id.evaluate( d ), variant.evaluate( d ), local_volume,
4403  random_direction() );
