4404  } else if( one_in( std::max( roll_remainder( 2.0f * here.get_abs_sub().z() /
4405  target->hearing_ability() ), 1 ) ) ) {
4406  if( local_volume == -1 ) {
4407  local_volume = 80 * target->hearing_ability();
4408  }
4409  sfx::play_variant_sound( id.evaluate( d ), variant.evaluate( d ), local_volume,
4410  random_direction() );
4411  }
4412  }
4413  };
4414 }
4415 
4416 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_give_achievment( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4417 {
4418  str_or_var achieve = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4419  return [achieve]( dialogue const & d ) {
4420  const achievement_id achievement_to_give( achieve.evaluate( d ) );
4421  // make sure the achievement is being tracked and that it is currently pending
4422  std::vector<const achievement *> all_achievements = get_achievements().valid_achievements();
4423  if( std::find_if( all_achievements.begin(),
4424  all_achievements.end(), [&achievement_to_give]( const achievement * ach ) {
4425  return ach->id == achievement_to_give;
4426  } ) != all_achievements.end() ) {
4427  if( get_achievements().is_completed( achievement_to_give ) == achievement_completion::pending ) {
4428  get_achievements().report_achievement( &achievement_to_give.obj(),
4429  achievement_completion::completed );
4430  }
4431  }
4432  };
4433 }
4434 
4435 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_mod_healthy( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4436  bool is_npc )
4437 {
4438  dbl_or_var dov_amount = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member );
4439  dbl_or_var dov_cap = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "cap" );
4440 
4441  return [is_npc, dov_amount, dov_cap]( dialogue & d ) {
4442  d.actor( is_npc )->mod_daily_health( dov_amount.evaluate( d ),
4443  dov_cap.evaluate( d ) );
4444  };
4445 }
4446 
4447 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_cast_spell( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4448  bool is_npc )
4449 {
4450  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
4451  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
4452  bool targeted = jo.get_bool( "targeted", false );
4453 
4454  std::optional<var_info> loc_var;
4455  if( jo.has_object( "loc" ) ) {
4456  loc_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "loc" ) );
4457  }
4458  JsonObject spell_jo = jo.get_object( member );
4459  str_or_var id = get_str_or_var( spell_jo.get_member( "id" ), "id" );
4460  bool hit_self = spell_jo.get_bool( "hit_self", false );
4461 
4462  int trigger_once_in = spell_jo.get_int( "once_in", 1 );
4463  translation_or_var trigger_message;
4464  if( spell_jo.has_member( "message" ) ) {
4465  trigger_message = get_translation_or_var( spell_jo.get_member( "message" ), "message", true );
4466  } else {
4467  trigger_message.str_val = translation();
4468  }
4469  translation_or_var npc_trigger_message;
4470  if( spell_jo.has_member( "npc_message" ) ) {
4471  npc_trigger_message = get_translation_or_var( spell_jo.get_member( "npc_message" ), "npc_message",
4472  true );
4473  } else {
4474  npc_trigger_message.str_val = translation();
4475  }
4476 
4477  dbl_or_var dov_max_level = get_dbl_or_var( spell_jo, "max_level", false, -1 );
4478  dbl_or_var level = get_dbl_or_var( spell_jo, "min_level", false );
4479  if( spell_jo.has_string( "level" ) ) {
4480  debugmsg( "level member for fake_spell was renamed to min_level. id: %s",
4481  id.str_val.value_or( "" ) );
4482  }
4483 
4484  return [is_npc, id, hit_self, dov_max_level, trigger_once_in, level, trigger_message,
4485  npc_trigger_message, targeted, loc_var, true_eocs,
4486  false_eocs]( dialogue & d ) {
4487  std::optional<int> max_level;
4488  int max_level_int = dov_max_level.evaluate( d );
4489  if( max_level_int == -1 ) {
4490  max_level = std::nullopt;
4491  } else {
4492  max_level = max_level_int;
4493  }
4494  fake_spell fake( spell_id( id.evaluate( d ) ), hit_self, max_level );
4495  fake.trigger_once_in = trigger_once_in;
4496  fake.level = level.evaluate( d );
4497  fake.trigger_message = no_translation( trigger_message.evaluate( d ) );
4498  fake.npc_trigger_message = no_translation( npc_trigger_message.evaluate( d ) );
4499  Creature *caster = d.actor( is_npc )->get_creature();
4500  if( !caster ) {
4501  debugmsg( "No valid caster for spell. %s", d.get_callstack() );
4502  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
4503  return;
4504  } else {
4505  if( !fake.is_valid() ) {
4506  debugmsg( "%s is not a valid spell. %s", fake.id.c_str(), d.get_callstack() );
4507  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
4508  return;
4509  }
4510  spell sp = fake.get_spell( *caster, 0 );
4511  if( targeted ) {
4512  if( std::optional<tripoint> target = sp.select_target( caster ) ) {
4513  sp.cast_all_effects( *caster, *target );
4514  caster->add_msg_player_or_npc( fake.trigger_message, fake.npc_trigger_message );
4515  }
4516  } else {
4517  const tripoint target_pos = loc_var ?
4518  get_map().getlocal( get_tripoint_from_var( loc_var, d ) ) : caster->pos();
4519  sp.cast_all_effects( *caster, target_pos );
4520  caster->add_msg_player_or_npc( fake.trigger_message, fake.npc_trigger_message );
4521  }
4522  }
4523  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
4524  };
4525 }
4526 
4527 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_attack( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4528  bool is_npc )
4529 {
4530  str_or_var force_technique = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4531  bool allow_special = jo.get_bool( "allow_special", true );
4532  bool allow_unarmed = jo.get_bool( "allow_unarmed", true );;
4533  dbl_or_var forced_movecost = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "forced_movecost", false, -1.0 );
4534 
4535  return [is_npc, allow_special, force_technique, allow_unarmed,
4536  forced_movecost]( dialogue & d ) {
4537  // if beta is attacking then target is the alpha
4538  talker *target = d.actor( !is_npc );
4539  talker *attacker = d.actor( is_npc );
4540  Creature *c = target->get_creature();
4541 
4542  if( c ) {
4543  matec_id m( force_technique.evaluate( d ) );
4544  attacker->attack_target( *c, allow_special, m, allow_unarmed, forced_movecost.evaluate( d ) );
4545  }
4546  };
4547 }
4548 
4549 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_die( bool is_npc )
4550 {
4551  return [is_npc]( dialogue const & d ) {
4552  d.actor( is_npc )->die();
4553  };
4554 }
4555 
4556 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_prevent_death( bool is_npc )
4557 {
4558  return [is_npc]( dialogue const & d ) {
4559  Character *ch = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
4560  if( ch ) {
4561  ch->prevent_death();
4562  }
4563  };
4564 }
4565 
4566 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_lightning()
4567 {
4568  return []( dialogue const &/* d */ ) {
4569  if( get_player_character().posz() >= 0 ) {
4570  get_weather().lightning_active = true;
4571  }
4572  };
4573 }
4574 
4575 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_next_weather()
4576 {
4577  return []( dialogue const &/* d */ ) {
4578  get_weather().set_nextweather( calendar::turn );
4579  };
4580 }
4581 
4582 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_set_string_var( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4583 {
4584  const bool i18n = jo.get_bool( "i18n", false );
4585  std::vector<str_or_var> str_vals;
4586  std::vector<translation_or_var> i18n_vals;
4587  if( jo.has_array( member ) ) {
4588  for( JsonValue value : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
4589  if( i18n ) {
4590  i18n_vals.emplace_back( get_translation_or_var( value, member ) );
4591  } else {
4592  str_vals.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( value, member ) );
4593  }
4594  }
4595  } else {
4596  if( i18n ) {
4597  i18n_vals.emplace_back( get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member ) );
4598  } else {
4599  str_vals.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member ) );
4600  }
4601  }
4602  bool parse = jo.get_bool( "parse_tags", false );
4603  var_info var = read_var_info( jo.get_member( "target_var" ) );
4604  return [i18n, str_vals, i18n_vals, var, parse]( dialogue & d ) {
4605  int index = rng( 0, ( i18n ? i18n_vals.size() : str_vals.size() ) - 1 );
4606  std::string str = i18n ? i18n_vals[index].evaluate( d ) : str_vals[index].evaluate( d );
4607  if( parse ) {
4608  std::unique_ptr<talker> default_talker = get_talker_for( get_player_character() );
4609  talker &alpha = d.has_alpha ? *d.actor( false ) : *default_talker;
4610  talker &beta = d.has_beta ? *d.actor( true ) : *default_talker;
4611  parse_tags( str, alpha, beta, d );
4612  }
4613  write_var_value( var.type, var.name, &d, str );
4614  };
4615 }
4616 
4617 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_set_condition( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4618 {
4619  str_or_var value;
4620  value = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member );
4621 
4622  std::function<bool( dialogue & )> cond;
4623  read_condition( jo, "condition", cond, false );
4624  return [value, cond]( dialogue & d ) {
4625  d.set_conditional( value.evaluate( d ), cond );
4626  };
4627 }
4628 
4629 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_assign_mission( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4630 {
4631  str_or_var mission_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4632  return [mission_name]( dialogue const & d ) {
4633  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4634 
4635  const mission_type_id &mission_type = mission_type_id( mission_name.evaluate( d ) );
4636  mission *new_mission = mission::reserve_new( mission_type, character_id() );
4637  new_mission->assign( player_character );
4638  };
4639 }
4640 
4641 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_finish_mission( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4642 {
4643  str_or_var mission_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4644  bool success = false;
4645  std::optional<int> step;
4646  if( jo.has_int( "step" ) ) {
4647  step = jo.get_int( "step" );
4648  } else {
4649  success = jo.get_bool( "success" );
4650  }
4651  return [mission_name, success, step]( dialogue const & d ) {
4652  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4653  const mission_type_id &mission_type = mission_type_id( mission_name.evaluate( d ) );
4654  std::vector<mission *> missions = player_character.get_active_missions();
4655 
4656  for( mission *mission : missions ) {
4657  if( mission->mission_id() == mission_type ) {
4658  if( step.has_value() ) {
4659  mission->step_complete( step.value() );
4660  } else if( success ) {
4661  mission->wrap_up();
4662  } else {
4663  mission->fail();
4664  }
4665  break;
4666  }
4667  }
4668  };
4669 }
4670 
4671 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_remove_active_mission( const JsonObject &jo,
4672  std::string_view member )
4673 {
4674  str_or_var mission_name = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4675  return [mission_name]( dialogue const & d ) {
4676  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4677  const mission_type_id &mission_type = mission_type_id( mission_name.evaluate( d ) );
4678  std::vector<mission *> missions = player_character.get_active_missions();
4679  for( mission *mission : missions ) {
4680  if( mission->mission_id() == mission_type ) {
4681  player_character.remove_active_mission( *mission );
4682  break;
4683  }
4684  }
4685  };
4686 }
4687 
4688 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_offer_mission( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4689 {
4690  std::vector<std::string> mission_names;
4691 
4692  if( jo.has_array( member ) ) {
4693  for( const std::string mission_name : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
4694  mission_names.push_back( mission_name );
4695  }
4696  } else if( jo.has_string( member ) ) {
4697  mission_names.push_back( jo.get_string( std::string( member ) ) );
4698  } else {
4699  jo.throw_error( "Invalid input for set_offer_mission" );
4700  }
4701 
4702  return [mission_names]( dialogue const & d ) {
4703  // assume that the alpha is the npc if there isn't a beta
4704  npc *p = d.actor( d.has_beta )->get_npc();
4705 
4706  if( p ) {
4707  for( const std::string &mission_name : mission_names ) {
4708  p->add_new_mission( mission::reserve_new( mission_type_id( mission_name ), p->getID() ) );
4709  }
4710  }
4711  };
4712 }
4713 
4714 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_set_flag( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4715  bool is_npc )
4716 {
4717  str_or_var flag = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4718 
4719  return [is_npc, flag]( dialogue & d ) {
4720  item_location *it = d.actor( is_npc )->get_item();
4721 
4722  if( it && it->get_item() ) {
4723  flag_id f_id( flag.evaluate( d ) );
4724  it->get_item()->set_flag( f_id );
4725  } else {
4726  debugmsg( "No valid %s talker.", is_npc ? "beta" : "alpha" );
4727  }
4728  };
4729 }
4730 
4731 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_unset_flag( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4732  bool is_npc )
4733 {
4734  str_or_var flag = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4735 
4736  return [is_npc, flag]( dialogue & d ) {
4737  item_location *it = d.actor( is_npc )->get_item();
4738 
4739  if( it && it->get_item() ) {
4740  flag_id f_id( flag.evaluate( d ) );
4741  it->get_item()->unset_flag( f_id );
4742  } else {
4743  debugmsg( "No valid %s talker.", is_npc ? "beta" : "alpha" );
4744  }
4745  };
4746 }
4747 
4748 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_activate( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4749  bool is_npc )
4750 {
4751  str_or_var method = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4752  std::optional<var_info> target_var;
4753  if( jo.has_member( "target_var" ) ) {
4754  target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "target_var" ) );
4755  }
4756 
4757  return [is_npc, method, target_var]( dialogue & d ) {
4758  Character *guy = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
4759  item_location *it = d.actor( !is_npc )->get_item();
4760 
4761  if( guy ) {
4762  const std::string method_str = method.evaluate( d );
4763  if( it && it->get_item() ) {
4764  if( !it->get_item()->get_usable_item( method_str ) ) {
4765  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_NPC, "Invalid use action. %s", method_str );
4766  return;
4767  }
4768  if( target_var.has_value() ) {
4769  tripoint_abs_ms target_pos = get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d );
4770  if( get_map().inbounds( target_pos ) ) {
4771  guy->invoke_item( it->get_item(), method_str, get_map().getlocal( target_pos ) );
4772  return;
4773  }
4774  }
4775  guy->invoke_item( it->get_item(), method.evaluate( d ) );
4776 
4777  } else {
4778  debugmsg( "%s talker must be Item.", is_npc ? "alpha" : "beta" );
4779  }
4780  } else {
4781  debugmsg( "%s talker must be Character.", is_npc ? "beta" : "alpha" );
4782  }
4783  };
4784 }
4785 
4786 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_math( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4787 {
4788  eoc_math math;
4789  math.from_json( jo, member, eoc_math::type_t::assign );
4790  return [math = std::move( math )]( dialogue & d ) {
4791  return math.act( d );
4792  };
4793 }
4794 
4795 
4796 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_transform_item( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4797 {
4798  str_or_var target_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4799  bool activate = jo.get_bool( "active", false );
4800 
4801  return [target_id, activate]( dialogue & d ) {
4802  item_location *it = d.actor( true )->get_item();
4803 
4804  if( it && it->get_item() ) {
4805  const std::string target_str = target_id.evaluate( d );
4806  ( *it )->convert( itype_id( target_str ), it->carrier() );
4807  ( *it )->active = activate || ( *it )->has_temperature();
4808  } else {
4809  debugmsg( "beta talker must be Item." );
4810  }
4811  };
4812 }
4813 
4814 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_make_sound( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
4815  bool is_npc )
4816 {
4817  dbl_or_var volume = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "volume", true );
4818  bool ambient = jo.get_bool( "ambient", false );
4819  bool snippet = jo.get_bool( "snippet", false );
4820  bool same_snippet = jo.get_bool( "same_snippet", false );
4821  str_or_var snip_id;
4822  translation_or_var message;
4823  if( snippet ) {
4824  snip_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4825  } else {
4826  message = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
4827  }
4828  sounds::sound_t type = sounds::sound_t::background;
4829  std::string type_string = jo.get_string( "type", "background" );
4830  if( type_string == "background" ) {
4831  type = sounds::sound_t::background;
4832  } else if( type_string == "weather" ) {
4833  type = sounds::sound_t::weather;
4834  } else if( type_string == "music" ) {
4835  type = sounds::sound_t::music;
4836  } else if( type_string == "movement" ) {
4837  type = sounds::sound_t::movement;
4838  } else if( type_string == "speech" ) {
4839  type = sounds::sound_t::speech;
4840  } else if( type_string == "electronic_speech" ) {
4841  type = sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech;
4842  } else if( type_string == "activity" ) {
4843  type = sounds::sound_t::activity;
4844  } else if( type_string == "destructive_activity" ) {
4845  type = sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity;
4846  } else if( type_string == "alarm" ) {
4847  type = sounds::sound_t::alarm;
4848  } else if( type_string == "combat" ) {
4849  type = sounds::sound_t::combat;
4850  } else if( type_string == "alert" ) {
4851  type = sounds::sound_t::alert;
4852  } else if( type_string == "order" ) {
4853  type = sounds::sound_t::order;
4854  } else {
4855  jo.throw_error( "Invalid message type." );
4856  }
4857  std::optional<var_info> target_var;
4858  if( jo.has_member( "target_var" ) ) {
4859  target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "target_var" ) );
4860  }
4861  return [is_npc, snip_id, message, volume, ambient, type, target_var, snippet,
4862  same_snippet]( dialogue & d ) {
4863  tripoint_abs_ms target_pos = get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d );
4864  std::string translated_message;
4865  if( snippet ) {
4866  if( same_snippet ) {
4867  talker *target = d.actor( !is_npc );
4868  std::string sid = target->get_value( snip_id.evaluate( d ) + "_snippet_id" );
4869  if( sid.empty() ) {
4870  sid = SNIPPET.random_id_from_category( snip_id.evaluate( d ) ).c_str();
4871  target->set_value( snip_id.evaluate( d ) + "_snippet_id", sid );
4872  }
4873  translated_message = SNIPPET.expand( SNIPPET.get_snippet_by_id( snippet_id( sid ) ).value_or(
4874  translation() ).translated() );
4875  } else {
4876  translated_message = SNIPPET.expand( SNIPPET.random_from_category( snip_id.evaluate( d ) ).value_or(
4877  translation() ).translated() );
4878  }
4879  } else {
4880  translated_message = message.evaluate( d );
4881  }
4882  sounds::sound( get_map().getlocal( target_pos ), volume.evaluate( d ), type, translated_message,
4883  ambient );
4884  };
4885 }
4886 
4887 
4888 
4889 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_run_eocs( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4890 {
4891  std::vector<eoc_entry> eocs_entries = load_eoc_vector_id_and_var( jo, member );
4892 
4893  if( eocs_entries.empty() ) {
4894  jo.throw_error( "Invalid input for run_eocs" );
4895  }
4896  return [eocs_entries]( dialogue const & d ) {
4897  for( const eoc_entry &entry : eocs_entries ) {
4898  effect_on_condition_id eoc_id =
4899  entry.var ? effect_on_condition_id( entry.var->evaluate( d ) ) : entry.id;
4900  dialogue newDialog( d );
4901  eoc_id->activate( newDialog );
4902  };
4903  };
4904 }
4905 
4906 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_run_eoc_until( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4907 {
4908  effect_on_condition_id eoc = effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jo.get_member( member ), "" );
4909  std::function<bool( dialogue & )> cond;
4910  read_condition( jo, "condition", cond, true ); // The default result of this condition is true
4911 
4912  dbl_or_var iteration_count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "iteration", false, 100 );
4913 
4914  return [eoc, cond, iteration_count]( dialogue & d ) {
4915  int max_iteration = iteration_count.evaluate( d );
4916 
4917  int curr_iteration = 0;
4918  // Amend the eoc to the callstack before the iteration.
4919  // In the interation, the eoc doesn't need to be amended repeatedly in activate().
4920  d.amend_callstack( "EOC: " + eoc->id.str() );
4921  while( cond( d ) ) {
4922  curr_iteration++;
4923  if( curr_iteration > max_iteration ) {
4924  break;
4925  }
4926  eoc->activate( d, false );
4927  }
4928  };
4929 }
4930 
4931 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_run_eoc_selector( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
4932 {
4933 
4934  std::vector<eoc_entry> eocs = load_eoc_vector_id_and_var( jo, member );
4935  if( eocs.empty() ) {
4936  jo.throw_error( "Invalid input for run_eocs" );
4937  }
4938 
4939  std::vector<translation_or_var> eoc_names;
4940  if( jo.has_array( "names" ) ) {
4941  for( const JsonValue &jv : jo.get_array( "names" ) ) {
4942  eoc_names.emplace_back( get_translation_or_var( jv, "names", true ) );
4943  }
4944  }
4945 
4946  std::vector<translation_or_var> eoc_descriptions;
4947  if( jo.has_array( "descriptions" ) ) {
4948  for( const JsonValue &jv : jo.get_array( "descriptions" ) ) {
4949  eoc_descriptions.emplace_back( get_translation_or_var( jv, "descriptions", true ) );
4950  }
4951  }
4952 
4953  std::vector<char> eoc_keys;
4954  if( jo.has_array( "keys" ) ) {
4955  for( const JsonValue &jv : jo.get_array( "keys" ) ) {
4956  std::string val = jv.get_string();
4957  if( val.size() != 1 ) {
4958  jo.throw_error( "Invalid input for run_eoc_selector, key strings must be exactly 1 character." );
4959  } else {
4960  eoc_keys.push_back( val[0] );
4961  }
4962  }
4963  }
4964 
4965  if( !eoc_names.empty() && eoc_names.size() != eocs.size() ) {
4966  jo.throw_error( "Invalid input for run_eoc_selector, size of eocs and names needs to be identical, or names need to be empty" );
4967  }
4968 
4969  if( !eoc_descriptions.empty() && eoc_descriptions.size() != eocs.size() ) {
4970  jo.throw_error( "Invalid input for run_eoc_selector, size of eocs and descriptions needs to be identical, or descriptions need to be empty" );
4971  }
4972 
4973  if( !eoc_keys.empty() && eoc_keys.size() != eocs.size() ) {
4974  jo.throw_error( "Invalid input for run_eoc_selector, size of eocs and keys needs to be identical, or keys need to be empty." );
4975  }
4976 
4977  std::vector<std::unordered_map<std::string, str_translation_or_var>> context;
4978  if( jo.has_array( "variables" ) ) {
4979  for( const JsonValue &member : jo.get_array( "variables" ) ) {
4980  const JsonObject &variables = member.get_object();
4981  std::unordered_map<std::string, str_translation_or_var> temp_context;
4982  for( const JsonMember &jv : variables ) {
4983  temp_context["npctalk_var_" + jv.name()] = get_str_translation_or_var( jv, jv.name(), true );
4984  }
4985  context.emplace_back( temp_context );
4986  }
4987  }
4988 
4989  if( !context.empty() && context.size() != 1 && context.size() != eocs.size() ) {
4990  jo.throw_error(
4991  string_format( "Invalid input for run_eoc_selector, size of vars needs to be 0 (no vars), 1 (all have the same vars), or the same size as the eocs (each has their own vars). Current size is: %d",
4992  context.size() ) );
4993  }
4994 
4995  bool hide_failing = false;
4996  if( jo.has_bool( "hide_failing" ) ) {
4997  hide_failing = jo.get_bool( "hide_failing" );
4998  }
4999 
5000  bool allow_cancel = false;
5001  if( jo.has_bool( "allow_cancel" ) ) {
5002  allow_cancel = jo.get_bool( "allow_cancel" );
5003  }
5004 
5005  translation title = to_translation( "Select an option." );
5006  jo.read( "title", title );
5007 
5008  return [eocs, context, title, eoc_names, eoc_keys, eoc_descriptions,
5009  hide_failing, allow_cancel]( dialogue & d ) {
5010  uilist eoc_list;
5011 
5012  std::unique_ptr<talker> default_talker = get_talker_for( get_player_character() );
5013  talker &alpha = d.has_alpha ? *d.actor( false ) : *default_talker;
5014  talker &beta = d.has_beta ? *d.actor( true ) : *default_talker;
5015 
5016 
5017  eoc_list.text = title.translated();
5018  eoc_list.allow_cancel = allow_cancel;
5019  eoc_list.desc_enabled = !eoc_descriptions.empty();
5020  parse_tags( eoc_list.text, alpha, beta, d );
5021 
5022  for( size_t i = 0; i < eocs.size(); i++ ) {
5023 
5024  effect_on_condition_id eoc_id =
5025  eocs[i].var ? effect_on_condition_id( eocs[i].var->evaluate( d ) ) : eocs[i].id;
5026  // check and set condition
5027  bool display = false;
5028  if( eoc_id->has_condition ) {
5029  // if it has a condition check that it is true
5030  display = eoc_id->test_condition( d );
5031  } else {
5032  display = true;
5033  }
5034 
5035  if( hide_failing && !display ) {
5036  // skip hidden entries
5037  continue;
5038  }
5039 
5040  std::string name;
5041  std::string description;
5042  if( eoc_names.empty() ) {
5043  name = eoc_id.str();
5044  } else {
5045  name = eoc_names[i].evaluate( d );
5046  parse_tags( name, alpha, beta, d );
5047  }
5048  if( !eoc_descriptions.empty() ) {
5049  description = eoc_descriptions[i].evaluate( d );
5050  parse_tags( description, alpha, beta, d );
5051  }
5052 
5053  if( eoc_keys.empty() ) {
5054  eoc_list.entries.emplace_back( static_cast<int>( i ), display, std::nullopt, name, description );
5055  } else {
5056  eoc_list.entries.emplace_back( static_cast<int>( i ), display, eoc_keys[i], name, description );
5057  }
5058  }
5059 
5060  if( eoc_list.entries.empty() ) {
5061  // if we have no entries should exit with error
5062  debugmsg( "No options for EOC_LIST" );
5063  return;
5064  }
5065 
5066  eoc_list.query();
5067  if( eoc_list.ret < 0 ) {
5068  return;
5069  }
5070 
5071  // add context variables
5072  dialogue newDialog( d );
5073  int contextIndex = 0;
5074  if( context.size() > 1 ) {
5075  contextIndex = eoc_list.ret;
5076  }
5077  if( !context.empty() ) {
5078  for( const auto &val : context[contextIndex] ) {
5079  newDialog.set_value( val.first, val.second.evaluate( d ) );
5080  }
5081  }
5082 
5083  effect_on_condition_id chosen_eoc_id =
5084  eocs[eoc_list.ret].var ? effect_on_condition_id( eocs[eoc_list.ret].var->evaluate(
5085  d ) ) : eocs[eoc_list.ret].id;
5086  chosen_eoc_id->activate( newDialog );
5087  };
5088 }
5089 
5090 
5091 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_run_eoc_with( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
5092 {
5093  effect_on_condition_id eoc = effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jo.get_member( member ), "" );
5094 
5095  std::unordered_map<std::string, str_translation_or_var> context;
5096  if( jo.has_object( "variables" ) ) {
5097  const JsonObject &variables = jo.get_object( "variables" );
5098  for( const JsonMember &jv : variables ) {
5099  context["npctalk_var_" + jv.name()] = get_str_translation_or_var( jv, jv.name(), true );
5100  }
5101  }
5102 
5103  str_or_var alpha_var;
5104  str_or_var beta_var;
5105  bool is_alpha_loc = false;
5106  bool is_beta_loc = false;
5107  bool has_alpha_var = true;
5108  bool has_beta_var = true;
5109 
5110  if( jo.has_member( "beta_loc" ) ) {
5111  beta_var = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "beta_loc" ), "beta_loc", false, "npc" );
5112  is_beta_loc = true;
5113  } else if( jo.has_member( "beta_talker" ) ) {
5114  beta_var = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "beta_talker" ), "beta_talker", false, "npc" );
5115  } else {
5116  beta_var.str_val = "npc";
5117  has_beta_var = false;
5118  }
5119 
5120  if( jo.has_member( "alpha_loc" ) ) {
5121  alpha_var = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "alpha_loc" ), "alpha_loc", has_beta_var,
5122  "u" ); // alpha_talker is mandatory if beta_talker exists
5123  is_alpha_loc = true;
5124  } else if( jo.has_member( "alpha_talker" ) ) {
5125  alpha_var = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "alpha_talker" ), "alpha_talker", false, "u" );
5126  } else {
5127  alpha_var.str_val = "u";
5128  has_alpha_var = false;
5129  }
5130 
5131  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
5132 
5133  return [eoc, context, alpha_var, beta_var, is_alpha_loc, is_beta_loc, has_alpha_var,
5134  has_beta_var, false_eocs]( dialogue const & d ) {
5135  dialogue newDialog( d );
5136 
5137  if( has_alpha_var || has_beta_var ) {
5138  bool alpha_invalid = false;// whether alpha talker exists in the game
5139  bool beta_invalid = false;// whether beta talker exists in the game
5140  auto get_talker = [&d]( const str_or_var & var, bool is_loc, bool & invalid ) {
5141  Creature *guy;
5142  std::string str = var.evaluate( d );
5143  if( is_loc ) {
5144  tripoint_abs_ms pos = tripoint_abs_ms( tripoint::from_string( str ) );
5145  guy = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( pos );
5146  if( guy == nullptr ) {
5147  invalid = true;
5148  }
5149  } else if( str.empty() ) {
5150  guy = nullptr;
5151  } else if( str == "u" ) {
5152  guy = d.has_alpha ? d.actor( false )->get_creature() : nullptr;
5153  } else if( str == "npc" ) {
5154  guy = d.has_beta ? d.actor( true )->get_creature() : nullptr;
5155  } else if( str == "avatar" ) {
5156  guy = &get_avatar();
5157  } else {
5158  guy = get_character_from_id( str, g.get() );
5159  if( guy == nullptr ) {
5160  invalid = true;
5161  }
5162  }
5163  return guy;
5164  };
5165 
5166  Creature *alpha_guy = get_talker( alpha_var, is_alpha_loc, alpha_invalid );
5167  Creature *beta_guy = get_talker( beta_var, is_beta_loc, beta_invalid );
5168  if( alpha_invalid || beta_invalid || ( alpha_guy == nullptr && beta_guy == nullptr ) ) {
5169  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
5170  return;
5171  } else {
5172  newDialog = dialogue(
5173  ( alpha_guy == nullptr ) ? nullptr : get_talker_for( alpha_guy ),
5174  ( beta_guy == nullptr ) ? nullptr : get_talker_for( beta_guy ),
5175  d.get_conditionals(),
5176  d.get_context()
5177  );
5178  }
5179  }
5180  for( const auto &val : context ) {
5181  newDialog.set_value( val.first, val.second.evaluate( d ) );
5182  }
5183 
5184  eoc->activate( newDialog );
5185  };
5186 }
5187 
5188 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_run_npc_eocs( const JsonObject &jo,
5189  std::string_view member, bool is_npc )
5190 {
5191  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, member );
5192  std::vector<str_or_var> unique_ids;
5193  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( "unique_ids" ) ) {
5194  unique_ids.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jv, "unique_ids" ) );
5195  }
5196 
5197  bool local = jo.get_bool( "local", false );
5198  std::optional<int> npc_range;
5199  if( jo.has_int( "npc_range" ) ) {
5200  npc_range = jo.get_int( "npc_range" );
5201  }
5202  bool npc_must_see = jo.get_bool( "npc_must_see", false );
5203  if( local ) {
5204  return [eocs, unique_ids, npc_must_see, npc_range, is_npc]( dialogue const & d ) {
5205  tripoint actor_pos = d.actor( is_npc )->pos();
5206  std::vector<std::string> ids;
5207  ids.reserve( unique_ids.size() );
5208  for( const str_or_var &id : unique_ids ) {
5209  ids.emplace_back( id.evaluate( d ) );
5210  }
5211  const std::vector<npc *> available = g->get_npcs_if( [npc_must_see, npc_range, actor_pos,
5212  ids]( const npc & guy ) {
5213  bool id_valid = ids.empty();
5214  for( const std::string &id : ids ) {
5215  if( id == guy.get_unique_id() ) {
5216  id_valid = true;
5217  break;
5218  }
5219  }
5220  return id_valid && ( !npc_range.has_value() || actor_pos.z == guy.posz() ) && ( !npc_must_see ||
5221  guy.sees( actor_pos ) ) &&
5222  ( !npc_range.has_value() || rl_dist( actor_pos, guy.pos() ) <= npc_range.value() );
5223  } );
5224  for( npc *target : available ) {
5225  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : eocs ) {
5226  dialogue newDialog( get_talker_for( target ), nullptr, d.get_conditionals(), d.get_context() );
5227  eoc->activate( newDialog );
5228  }
5229  }
5230  };
5231  } else {
5232  return [eocs, unique_ids]( dialogue const & d ) {
5233  for( const str_or_var &target : unique_ids ) {
5234  if( g->unique_npc_exists( target.evaluate( d ) ) ) {
5235  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : eocs ) {
5236  npc *npc = g->find_npc_by_unique_id( target.evaluate( d ) );
5237  if( npc ) {
5238  dialogue newDialog( get_talker_for( npc ), nullptr, d.get_conditionals(), d.get_context() );
5239  eoc->activate( newDialog );
5240  } else {
5241  debugmsg( "Tried to use invalid npc: %s. %s", target.evaluate( d ), d.get_callstack() );
5242  }
5243  }
5244  }
5245  }
5246  };
5247  }
5248 }
5249 
5250 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_run_monster_eocs( const JsonObject &jo,
5251  std::string_view member, bool is_npc )
5252 {
5253  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, member );
5254  std::vector<str_or_var> mtype_ids;
5255  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( "mtype_ids" ) ) {
5256  mtype_ids.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jv, "mtype_ids" ) );
5257  }
5258  std::optional<int> monster_range;
5259  if( jo.has_int( "monster_range" ) ) {
5260  monster_range = jo.get_int( "monster_range" );
5261  }
5262  bool monster_must_see = jo.get_bool( "monster_must_see", false );
5263  return [eocs, mtype_ids, monster_must_see, monster_range, is_npc]( dialogue const & d ) {
5264  std::vector<mtype_id> ids;
5265  ids.reserve( mtype_ids.size() );
5266  for( const str_or_var &id : mtype_ids ) {
5267  ids.emplace_back( id.evaluate( d ) );
5268  }
5269  tripoint actor_pos = d.actor( is_npc )->pos();
5270  const std::vector<Creature *> available = g->get_creatures_if( [ ids, monster_must_see,
5271  monster_range, actor_pos ]( const Creature & critter ) {
5272  bool id_valid = ids.empty();
5273  bool creature_is_monster = critter.is_monster();
5274  if( creature_is_monster ) {
5275  for( const mtype_id &id : ids ) {
5276  if( id == critter.as_monster()->type->id ) {
5277  id_valid = true;
5278  break;
5279  }
5280  }
5281  }
5282  return creature_is_monster && id_valid && ( !monster_range.has_value() ||
5283  actor_pos.z == critter.posz() ) &&
5284  ( !monster_must_see ||
5285  critter.sees( actor_pos ) ) &&
5286  ( !monster_range.has_value() || rl_dist( actor_pos, critter.pos() ) <= monster_range.value() );
5287  } );
5288  for( Creature *target : available ) {
5289  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : eocs ) {
5290  dialogue newDialog( get_talker_for( target ), nullptr, d.get_conditionals(), d.get_context() );
5291  eoc->activate( newDialog );
5292  }
5293  }
5294  };
5295 }
5296 
5297 
5298 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_run_inv_eocs( const JsonObject &jo,
5299  std::string_view member, bool is_npc )
5300 {
5301  str_or_var option = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member );
5302  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
5303  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
5304  std::vector <item_search_data> data;
5305  for( const JsonValue &search_data_jo : jo.get_array( "search_data" ) ) {
5306  data.emplace_back( search_data_jo );
5307  }
5308  translation_or_var title;
5309  if( jo.has_member( "title" ) ) {
5310  title = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( "title" ), "title", true );
5311  } else {
5312  title.str_val = translation();
5313  }
5314 
5315  return [option, true_eocs, false_eocs, data, is_npc, title]( dialogue & d ) {
5316  Character *guy = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
5317  if( guy ) {
5318  const auto f = [d, guy, title]( const item_location_filter & filter ) {
5319  return game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *guy, title.evaluate( d ) );
5320  };
5321  const auto f_mul = [d, guy, title]( const item_location_filter & filter ) {
5322  return game_menus::inv::titled_multi_filter_menu( filter, *guy, title.evaluate( d ) );
5323  };
5324  run_item_eocs( d, is_npc, guy->all_items_loc(), option.evaluate( d ), true_eocs, false_eocs, data,
5325  f, f_mul );
5326  }
5327  };
5328 }
5329 
5330 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_map_run_item_eocs( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
5331  bool is_npc )
5332 {
5333  str_or_var option = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member );
5334  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
5335  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
5336  std::vector <item_search_data> data;
5337  for( const JsonValue &search_data_jo : jo.get_array( "search_data" ) ) {
5338  data.emplace_back( search_data_jo );
5339  }
5340  translation_or_var title;
5341  if( jo.has_member( "title" ) ) {
5342  title = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( "title" ), "title", true );
5343  } else {
5344  title.str_val = translation();
5345  }
5346  std::optional<var_info> loc_var;
5347  if( jo.has_object( "loc" ) ) {
5348  loc_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "loc" ) );
5349  }
5350  dbl_or_var dov_min_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "min_radius", false, 0 );
5351  dbl_or_var dov_max_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "max_radius", false, 0 );
5352 
5353  return [is_npc, option, true_eocs, false_eocs, data, loc_var, dov_min_radius, dov_max_radius,
5354  title]( dialogue & d ) {
5355  tripoint_abs_ms target_location = get_tripoint_from_var( loc_var, d );
5356  std::vector<item_location> items;
5357  map &here = get_map();
5358  tripoint center = here.getlocal( target_location );
5359  int max_radius = dov_max_radius.evaluate( d );
5360  int min_radius = dov_min_radius.evaluate( d );
5361  for( const tripoint &pos : here.points_in_radius( center, max_radius ) ) {
5362  if( rl_dist( center, pos ) >= min_radius && here.inbounds( pos ) ) {
5363  for( item &it : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
5364  items.emplace_back( map_cursor( pos ), &it );
5365  }
5366  }
5367  }
5368  Character *guy = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
5369  guy = guy ? guy : &get_player_character();
5370  const auto f = [d, guy, title, center, min_radius,
5371  max_radius]( const item_location_filter & filter ) {
5372  inventory_filter_preset preset( filter );
5373  inventory_pick_selector inv_s( *guy, preset );
5374  inv_s.set_title( title.evaluate( d ) );
5375  inv_s.set_display_stats( false );
5376  inv_s.clear_items();
5377  for( const tripoint &pos : get_map().points_in_radius( center, max_radius ) ) {
5378  if( rl_dist( center, pos ) >= min_radius ) {
5379  inv_s.add_map_items( pos );
5380  }
5381  }
5382  if( inv_s.empty() ) {
5383  popup( _( "You don't have the necessary item at hand." ), PF_GET_KEY );
5384  return item_location();
5385  }
5386  return inv_s.execute();
5387  };
5388  const item_menu_mul f_mul = [d, guy, title, center, min_radius,
5389  max_radius]( const item_location_filter & filter ) {
5390  inventory_filter_preset preset( filter );
5391  inventory_multiselector inv_s( *guy, preset );
5392  inv_s.set_title( title.evaluate( d ) );
5393  inv_s.set_display_stats( false );
5394  inv_s.clear_items();
5395  for( const tripoint &pos : get_map().points_in_radius( center, max_radius ) ) {
5396  if( rl_dist( center, pos ) >= min_radius ) {
5397  inv_s.add_map_items( pos );
5398  }
5399  }
5400  if( inv_s.empty() ) {
5401  popup( _( "You don't have the necessary item at hand." ), PF_GET_KEY );
5402  return drop_locations();
5403  }
5404  return inv_s.execute();
5405  };
5406  run_item_eocs( d, is_npc, items, option.evaluate( d ), true_eocs, false_eocs, data,
5407  f, f_mul );
5408  };
5409 }
5410 
5411 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_set_talker( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member, bool is_npc )
5412 {
5413  var_info var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( member ) );
5414  var_type type = var.type;
5415  std::string var_name = var.name;
5416  return [is_npc, var, type, var_name]( dialogue & d ) {
5417  int id = d.actor( is_npc )->getID().get_value();
5418  write_var_value( type, var_name, &d, id );
5419  };
5420 }
5421 
5422 void process_eoc( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc, dialogue &d,
5423  time_duration time_in_future )
5424 {
5425  if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
5426  Character *alpha = d.has_alpha ? d.actor( false )->get_character() : nullptr;
5427  if( alpha ) {
5428  effect_on_conditions::queue_effect_on_condition( time_in_future, eoc, *alpha, d.get_context() );
5429  } else if( eoc->global ) {
5430  effect_on_conditions::queue_effect_on_condition( time_in_future, eoc, get_player_character(),
5431  d.get_context() );
5432  }
5433  // If the target is a monster or item and the eoc is non global it won't be queued and will silently "fail"
5434  // this is so monster attacks against other monsters won't give error messages.
5435  } else {
5436  debugmsg( "Cannot queue a non activation effect_on_condition. %s", d.get_callstack() );
5437  }
5438 }
5439 
5440 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_queue_eocs( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
5441 {
5442  std::vector<eoc_entry> eocs_entries = load_eoc_vector_id_and_var( jo, member );
5443  if( eocs_entries.empty() ) {
5444  jo.throw_error( "Invalid input for queue_eocs" );
5445  }
5446 
5447  duration_or_var dov_time_in_future = get_duration_or_var( jo, "time_in_future", false,
5448  0_seconds );
5449  return [dov_time_in_future, eocs_entries]( dialogue & d ) {
5450  time_duration time_in_future = dov_time_in_future.evaluate( d );
5451  for( const eoc_entry &entry : eocs_entries ) {
5452  effect_on_condition_id eoc_id =
5453  entry.var ? effect_on_condition_id( entry.var->evaluate( d ) ) : entry.id;
5454  process_eoc( eoc_id, d, time_in_future );
5455  };
5456  };
5457 }
5458 
5459 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_queue_eoc_with( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
5460 {
5461  effect_on_condition_id eoc = effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jo.get_member( member ), "" );
5462 
5463  std::unordered_map<std::string, str_translation_or_var> context;
5464  if( jo.has_object( "variables" ) ) {
5465  const JsonObject &variables = jo.get_object( "variables" );
5466  for( const JsonMember &jv : variables ) {
5467  context["npctalk_var_" + jv.name()] = get_str_translation_or_var( jv, jv.name(), true );
5468  }
5469  }
5470 
5471  duration_or_var dov_time_in_future = get_duration_or_var( jo, "time_in_future", false,
5472  0_seconds );
5473  return [dov_time_in_future, eoc, context]( dialogue & d ) {
5474  time_duration time_in_future = dov_time_in_future.evaluate( d );
5475  if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
5476 
5477  std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> passed_variables;
5478  for( const auto &val : context ) {
5479  passed_variables[val.first] = val.second.evaluate( d );
5480  }
5481 
5482  Character *alpha = d.has_alpha ? d.actor( false )->get_character() : nullptr;
5483  if( alpha ) {
5484  effect_on_conditions::queue_effect_on_condition( time_in_future, eoc, *alpha, passed_variables );
5485  } else if( eoc->global ) {
5486  effect_on_conditions::queue_effect_on_condition( time_in_future, eoc, get_player_character(),
5487  passed_variables );
5488  }
5489  // If the target is a monster or item and the eoc is non global it won't be queued and will silently "fail"
5490  // this is so monster attacks against other monsters won't give error messages.
5491  } else {
5492  debugmsg( "Cannot queue a non activation effect_on_condition. %s", d.get_callstack() );
5493  }
5494  };
5495 }
5496 
5497 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_weighted_list_eocs( const JsonObject &jo,
5498  std::string_view member )
5499 {
5500  std::vector<std::pair<effect_on_condition_id, dbl_or_var>> eoc_pairs;
5501  for( JsonArray ja : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
5502  JsonValue eoc = ja.next_value();
5503  dbl_or_var eoc_weight;
5504  if( ja.test_int() ) {
5505  eoc_weight.min = dbl_or_var_part{ ja.next_int() };
5506  } else {
5507  eoc_weight.min = get_dbl_or_var_part( ja.next_value(), member );
5508  }
5509  eoc_pairs.emplace_back( effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( eoc, "" ),
5510  eoc_weight );
5511  }
5512  return [eoc_pairs]( dialogue & d ) {
5513  weighted_int_list<effect_on_condition_id> eocs;
5514  for( const std::pair<effect_on_condition_id, dbl_or_var> &eoc_pair :
5515  eoc_pairs ) {
5516  eocs.add( eoc_pair.first, eoc_pair.second.evaluate( d ) );
5517  }
5518  effect_on_condition_id picked_eoc = *eocs.pick();
5519  dialogue newDialog( d );
5520  picked_eoc->activate( newDialog );
5521  };
5522 }
5523 
5524 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_if( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
5525 {
5526  std::function<bool( dialogue & )> cond;
5527  talk_effect_t then_effect;
5528  talk_effect_t else_effect;
5529  read_condition( jo, std::string( member ), cond, false );
5530  then_effect.load_effect( jo, "then" );
5531  if( jo.has_member( "else" ) || jo.has_array( "else" ) ) {
5532  else_effect.load_effect( jo, "else" );
5533  }
5534 
5535  return [cond, then_effect, else_effect]( dialogue & d ) {
5536  if( cond( d ) ) {
5537  then_effect.apply( d );
5538  } else {
5539  else_effect.apply( d );
5540  }
5541  };
5542 }
5543 
5544 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_switch( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
5545 {
5546  dbl_or_var eoc_switch = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member );
5547  std::vector<std::pair<dbl_or_var, talk_effect_t>> case_pairs;
5548  for( const JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( "cases" ) ) {
5549  JsonObject array_case = jv.get_object();
5550  talk_effect_t case_effect;
5551  case_effect.load_effect( array_case, "effect" );
5552  case_pairs.emplace_back( get_dbl_or_var( array_case, "case" ), case_effect );
5553  }
5554  return [eoc_switch, case_pairs]( dialogue & d ) {
5555  const double switch_int = eoc_switch.evaluate( d );
5556  talk_effect_t case_effect;
5557  for( const std::pair<dbl_or_var, talk_effect_t> &case_pair :
5558  case_pairs ) {
5559  if( switch_int >= case_pair.first.evaluate( d ) ) {
5560  case_effect = case_pair.second;
5561  }
5562  }
5563  case_effect.apply( d );
5564  };
5565 }
5566 
5567 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_foreach( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
5568 {
5569  std::string type = jo.get_string( member.data() );
5570  var_info itr = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "var" ) );
5571  talk_effect_t effect;
5572  effect.load_effect( jo, "effect" );
5573  std::string target;
5574  std::vector<str_or_var> array;
5575  if( jo.has_string( "target" ) ) {
5576  target = jo.get_string( "target" );
5577  } else if( jo.has_array( "target" ) ) {
5578  for( const JsonValue &jv : jo.get_array( "target" ) ) {
5579  array.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jv, "target" ) );
5580  }
5581  }
5582  return [type, itr, effect, target, array]( dialogue & d ) {
5583  std::vector<std::string> list;
5584 
5585  if( type == "ids" ) {
5586  if( target == "bodypart" ) {
5587  for( const body_part_type &bp : body_part_type::get_all() ) {
5588  list.push_back( bp.id.str() );
5589  }
5590  } else if( target == "flag" ) {
5591  for( const json_flag &f : json_flag::get_all() ) {
5592  list.push_back( f.id.str() );
5593  }
5594  } else if( target == "trait" ) {
5595  for( const mutation_branch &m : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
5596  list.push_back( m.id.str() );
5597  }
5598  } else if( target == "vitamin" ) {
5599  for( const std::pair<const vitamin_id, vitamin> &v : vitamin::all() ) {
5600  list.push_back( v.first.str() );
5601  }
5602  }
5603  } else if( type == "item_group" ) {
5604  item_group_id ig( target );
5605  for( const itype *type : item_group::every_possible_item_from( ig ) ) {
5606  list.push_back( type->get_id().str() );
5607  }
5608  } else if( type == "monstergroup" ) {
5609  mongroup_id mg( target );
5610  for( const auto &m : MonsterGroupManager::GetMonstersFromGroup( mg, true ) ) {
5611  list.push_back( m.str() );
5612  }
5613  } else if( type == "array" ) {
5614  for( const str_or_var &v : array ) {
5615  list.emplace_back( v.evaluate( d ) );
5616  }
5617  }
5618 
5619  for( std::string_view str : list ) {
5620  write_var_value( itr.type, itr.name, &d, str.data() );
5621  effect.apply( d );
5622  }
5623  };
5624 }
5625 
5626 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_roll_remainder( const JsonObject &jo,
5627  std::string_view member, bool is_npc )
5628 {
5629  std::vector<str_or_var> list;
5630  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( member ) ) {
5631  list.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jv, member ) );
5632  }
5633  str_or_var type = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "type" ), "type", true );
5634  translation_or_var message;
5635  if( jo.has_member( "message" ) ) {
5636  message = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( "message" ), "message", true );
5637  } else {
5638  message.str_val = translation();
5639  }
5640  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
5641  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
5642 
5643  return [list, type, is_npc, true_eocs, false_eocs, message]( dialogue const & d ) {
5644  std::vector<std::string> not_had;
5645  for( const str_or_var &cur_string : list ) {
5646  if( type.evaluate( d ) == "bionic" ) {
5647  if( !d.actor( is_npc )->has_bionic( bionic_id( cur_string.evaluate( d ) ) ) ) {
5648  not_had.push_back( cur_string.evaluate( d ) );
5649  }
5650  } else if( type.evaluate( d ) == "mutation" ) {
5651  if( !d.actor( is_npc )->has_trait( trait_id( cur_string.evaluate( d ) ) ) ) {
5652  not_had.push_back( cur_string.evaluate( d ) );
5653  }
5654  } else if( type.evaluate( d ) == "spell" ) {
5655  if( d.actor( is_npc )->get_spell_level( spell_id( cur_string.evaluate( d ) ) ) == - 1 ) {
5656  not_had.push_back( cur_string.evaluate( d ) );
5657  }
5658  } else if( type.evaluate( d ) == "recipe" ) {
5659  if( !d.actor( is_npc )->has_recipe( recipe_id( cur_string.evaluate( d ) ) ) ) {
5660  not_had.push_back( cur_string.evaluate( d ) );
5661  }
5662  } else {
5663  debugmsg( "Invalid roll remainder type. %s", d.get_callstack() );
5664  }
5665  }
5666  if( !not_had.empty() ) {
5667  int index = rng( 0, not_had.size() - 1 );
5668  std::string cur_choice = not_had[index];
5669  std::string name;
5670  if( type.evaluate( d ) == "bionic" ) {
5671  bionic_id bionic( cur_choice );
5672  d.actor( is_npc )->add_bionic( bionic );
5673  name = bionic->name.translated();
5674  } else if( type.evaluate( d ) == "mutation" ) {
5675  trait_id trait( cur_choice );
5676  d.actor( is_npc )->set_mutation( trait );
5677  name = trait->name();
5678  } else if( type.evaluate( d ) == "spell" ) {
5679  spell_id spell( cur_choice );
5680  d.actor( is_npc )->set_spell_level( spell, 1 );
5681  name = spell->name.translated();
5682  } else if( type.evaluate( d ) == "recipe" ) {
5683  recipe_id recipe( cur_choice );
5684  d.actor( is_npc )->learn_recipe( recipe );
5685  name = recipe->result_name();
5686  } else {
5687  debugmsg( "Invalid roll remainder type. %s", d.get_callstack() );
5688  }
5689  std::string cur_message = message.evaluate( d );
5690  if( !cur_message.empty() ) {
5691  Character *target = d.actor( is_npc )->get_character();
5692  if( target ) {
5693  target->add_msg_if_player( cur_message, name );
5694  }
5695  }
5696  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
5697  } else {
5698  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
5699  }
5700  };
5701 }
5702 
5703 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_morale( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
5704  bool is_npc )
5705 {
5706  str_or_var new_type = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
5707  dbl_or_var dov_bonus = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "bonus" );
5708  dbl_or_var dov_max_bonus = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "max_bonus" );
5709  duration_or_var dov_duration = get_duration_or_var( jo, "duration", false, 1_hours );
5710  duration_or_var dov_decay_start = get_duration_or_var( jo, "decay_start", false, 30_minutes );
5711  const bool capped = jo.get_bool( "capped", false );
5712  return [is_npc, new_type, dov_bonus, dov_max_bonus, dov_duration, dov_decay_start,
5713  capped]( dialogue & d ) {
5714  d.actor( is_npc )->add_morale( morale_type( new_type.evaluate( d ) ),
5715  dov_bonus.evaluate( d ),
5716  dov_max_bonus.evaluate( d ),
5717  dov_duration.evaluate( d ),
5718  dov_decay_start.evaluate( d ),
5719  capped );
5720  };
5721 }
5722 
5723 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_lose_morale( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
5724  bool is_npc )
5725 {
5726  str_or_var old_morale = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
5727  return [is_npc, old_morale]( dialogue const & d ) {
5728  d.actor( is_npc )->remove_morale( morale_type( old_morale.evaluate( d ) ) );
5729  };
5730 }
5731 
5732 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_add_faction_trust( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
5733 {
5734  dbl_or_var dov = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member );
5735  return [dov]( dialogue & d ) {
5736  d.actor( true )->get_faction()->trusts_u += dov.evaluate( d );
5737  };
5738 }
5739 
5740 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_lose_faction_trust( const JsonObject &jo,
5741  std::string_view member )
5742 {
5743  dbl_or_var dov = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member );
5744  return [dov]( dialogue & d ) {
5745  d.actor( true )->get_faction()->trusts_u -= dov.evaluate( d );
5746  };
5747 }
5748 
5749 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_custom_light_level( const JsonObject &jo,
5750  std::string_view member )
5751 {
5752  dbl_or_var dov = get_dbl_or_var( jo, member, true );
5753  duration_or_var dov_length = get_duration_or_var( jo, "length", false, 0_seconds );
5754  str_or_var key;
5755  if( jo.has_member( "key" ) ) {
5756  key = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "key" ), "key", false, "" );
5757  } else {
5758  key.str_val = "";
5759  }
5760  return [dov_length, dov, key]( dialogue & d ) {
5761  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::CUSTOM_LIGHT_LEVEL,
5762  calendar::turn + dov_length.evaluate( d ) +
5763  1_seconds/*We add a second here because this will get ticked on the turn its applied before it has an effect*/,
5764  -1, dov.evaluate( d ), key.evaluate( d ) );
5765  };
5766 }
5767 
5768 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_give_equipment( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
5769 {
5770  JsonObject jobj = jo.get_object( member );
5771  int allowance = 0;
5772  std::vector<trial_mod> debt_modifiers;
5773  if( jobj.has_int( "allowance" ) ) {
5774  allowance = jobj.get_int( "allowance" );
5775  } else if( jobj.has_array( "allowance" ) ) {
5776  for( JsonArray jmod : jobj.get_array( "allowance" ) ) {
5777  trial_mod this_modifier;
5778  this_modifier.first = jmod.next_string();
5779  this_modifier.second = jmod.next_int();
5780  debt_modifiers.push_back( this_modifier );
5781  }
5782  }
5783  return [debt_modifiers, allowance]( dialogue const & d ) {
5784  int debt = allowance;
5785  for( const trial_mod &this_mod : debt_modifiers ) {
5786  if( this_mod.first == "TOTAL" ) {
5787  debt *= this_mod.second;
5788  } else {
5789  debt += parse_mod( d, this_mod.first, this_mod.second );
5790  }
5791  }
5792  if( npc *p = d.actor( true )->get_npc() ) {
5793  talk_function::give_equipment_allowance( *p, debt );
5794  }
5795  };
5796 }
5797 
5798 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_spawn_monster( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
5799  bool is_npc )
5800 {
5801  bool group = jo.get_bool( "group", false );
5802  bool single_target = jo.get_bool( "single_target", false );
5803  str_or_var monster_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member );
5804  dbl_or_var dov_target_range = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "target_range", false, 0 );
5805  dbl_or_var dov_hallucination_count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "hallucination_count", false, 0 );
5806  dbl_or_var dov_real_count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "real_count", false, 0 );
5807  dbl_or_var dov_min_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "min_radius", false, 1 );
5808  dbl_or_var dov_max_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "max_radius", false, 10 );
5809 
5810  const bool outdoor_only = jo.get_bool( "outdoor_only", false );
5811  const bool indoor_only = jo.get_bool( "indoor_only", false );
5812  if( indoor_only && outdoor_only ) {
5813  jo.throw_error( "Cannot be outdoor_only and indoor_only at the same time." );
5814  }
5815  const bool open_air_allowed = jo.get_bool( "open_air_allowed", false );
5816  const bool temporary_drop_items = jo.get_bool( "temporary_drop_items", false );
5817  const bool friendly = jo.get_bool( "friendly", false );
5818 
5819  duration_or_var dov_lifespan = get_duration_or_var( jo, "lifespan", false, 0_seconds );
5820  std::optional<var_info> target_var;
5821  if( jo.has_member( "target_var" ) ) {
5822  target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "target_var" ) );
5823  }
5824  translation spawn_message;
5825  jo.read( "spawn_message", spawn_message );
5826  translation spawn_message_plural;
5827  jo.read( "spawn_message_plural", spawn_message_plural );
5828  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
5829  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
5830  return [monster_id, dov_target_range, dov_hallucination_count, dov_real_count, dov_min_radius,
5831  dov_max_radius, outdoor_only, indoor_only, group, single_target, dov_lifespan, target_var,
5832  spawn_message, spawn_message_plural, true_eocs, false_eocs, open_air_allowed, temporary_drop_items,
5833  friendly, is_npc]( dialogue & d ) {
5834  monster target_monster;
5835  std::vector<Creature *> target_monsters;
5836  mongroup_id target_mongroup;
5837  bool use_target_monster = single_target;
5838 
5839  if( group ) {
5840  if( monster_id.evaluate( d ).empty() ) {
5841  debugmsg( "Cannot use group without a valid monstergroup. %s", d.get_callstack() );
5842  }
5843  if( single_target ) {
5844  target_monster = monster( MonsterGroupManager::GetRandomMonsterFromGroup( mongroup_id(
5845  monster_id.evaluate( d ) ) ) );
5846  } else {
5847  target_mongroup = mongroup_id( monster_id.evaluate( d ) );
5848  }
5849  } else if( monster_id.evaluate( d ).empty() ) {
5850  int target_range = dov_target_range.evaluate( d );
5851  if( single_target ) {
5852  // Find a hostile creature in range to be used to create a hallucination or a copy of
5853  Creature *copy = g->get_creature_if( [target_range]( const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
5854  bool not_self = get_player_character().pos() != critter.pos();
5855  bool in_range = std::round( rl_dist_exact( get_player_character().pos(), critter.pos() ) ) <= target_range;
5856  bool valid_target = get_player_character().attitude_to( critter ) == Creature::Attitude::HOSTILE;
5857  return not_self && in_range && valid_target;
5858  } );
5859  if( copy == nullptr ) {
5860  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
5861  return;
5862  }
5863  target_monster = *copy->as_monster();
5864  } else {
5865  // Find all hostile creatures in range to be used to create hallucinations or copies of
5866  std::vector<Creature *> monsters_in_range = g->get_creatures_if( [target_range](
5867  const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
5868  bool not_self = get_player_character().pos() != critter.pos();
5869  bool in_range = std::round( rl_dist_exact( get_player_character().pos(), critter.pos() ) ) <= target_range;
5870  bool valid_target = get_player_character().attitude_to( critter ) == Creature::Attitude::HOSTILE;
5871  return not_self && in_range && valid_target;
5872  } );
5873  int valid_monsters = monsters_in_range.size();
5874  if( valid_monsters == 0 ) {
5875  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
5876  return;
5877  } else if( valid_monsters == 1 ) {
5878  Creature *copy = monsters_in_range[0];
5879  target_monster = *copy->as_monster();
5880  use_target_monster = true;
5881  } else {
5882  target_monsters = monsters_in_range;
5883  }
5884  }
5885  } else {
5886  if( single_target ) {
5887  debugmsg( "single_target doesn't need to be defined for a singlular monster_id. %s",
5888  d.get_callstack() );
5889  }
5890  target_monster = monster( mtype_id( monster_id.evaluate( d ) ) );
5891  use_target_monster = true;
5892  }
5893  int min_radius = dov_min_radius.evaluate( d );
5894  int max_radius = dov_max_radius.evaluate( d );
5895  int real_count = dov_real_count.evaluate( d );
5896  int hallucination_count = dov_hallucination_count.evaluate( d );
5897  std::optional<time_duration> lifespan;
5898  tripoint target_pos = d.actor( is_npc )->pos();
5899  if( target_var.has_value() ) {
5900  target_pos = get_map().getlocal( get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d ) );
5901  }
5902  int visible_spawns = 0;
5903  int spawns = 0;
5904  for( int i = 0; i < hallucination_count; i++ ) {
5905  tripoint spawn_point;
5906  if( !use_target_monster ) {
5907  if( group ) {
5908  target_monster = monster( MonsterGroupManager::GetRandomMonsterFromGroup( target_mongroup ) );
5909  } else {
5910  Creature *copy = target_monsters[ rng( 0, target_monsters.size() - 1 ) ];
5911  target_monster = *copy->as_monster();
5912  }
5913  }
5914  if( g->find_nearby_spawn_point( target_pos, target_monster.type->id, min_radius,
5915  max_radius, spawn_point, outdoor_only, indoor_only, open_air_allowed ) ) {
5916  lifespan = dov_lifespan.evaluate( d );
5917  if( lifespan.value() == 0_seconds ) {
5918  lifespan.reset();
5919  }
5920  if( g->spawn_hallucination( spawn_point, target_monster.type->id, lifespan ) ) {
5921  Creature *critter = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( spawn_point );
5922  if( critter ) {
5923  if( friendly ) {
5924  critter->as_monster()->friendly = -1;
5925  }
5926  spawns++;
5927  if( get_avatar().sees( *critter ) ) {
5928  visible_spawns++;
5929  }
5930  }
5931  }
5932  }
5933  }
5934  for( int i = 0; i < real_count; i++ ) {
5935  tripoint spawn_point;
5936  if( !use_target_monster ) {
5937  if( group ) {
5938  target_monster = monster( MonsterGroupManager::GetRandomMonsterFromGroup( target_mongroup ) );
5939  } else {
5940  Creature *copy = target_monsters[ rng( 0, target_monsters.size() - 1 ) ];
5941  target_monster = *copy->as_monster();
5942  }
5943  }
5944  if( g->find_nearby_spawn_point( target_pos, target_monster.type->id, min_radius,
5945  max_radius, spawn_point, outdoor_only, indoor_only, open_air_allowed ) ) {
5946  monster *spawned = g->place_critter_at( target_monster.type->id, spawn_point );
5947  if( spawned ) {
5948  if( friendly ) {
5949  spawned->friendly = -1;
5950  }
5951  spawns++;
5952  if( get_avatar().sees( *spawned ) ) {
5953  visible_spawns++;
5954  }
5955  lifespan = dov_lifespan.evaluate( d );
5956  if( lifespan.value() > 0_seconds ) {
5957  spawned->set_summon_time( lifespan.value() );
5958  // Temporary monsters shouldn't drop items unless told to
5959  spawned->no_extra_death_drops = !temporary_drop_items;
5960  spawned->no_corpse_quiet = !temporary_drop_items;
5961  }
5962  }
5963  }
5964  }
5965  if( visible_spawns > 1 && !spawn_message_plural.empty() ) {
5966  get_avatar().add_msg_if_player( m_bad, spawn_message_plural );
5967  } else if( visible_spawns > 0 && !spawn_message.empty() ) {
5968  get_avatar().add_msg_if_player( m_bad, spawn_message );
5969  }
5970  if( spawns > 0 ) {
5971  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
5972  } else {
5973  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
5974  }
5975  };
5976 }
5977 
5978 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_spawn_npc( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
5979  bool is_npc )
5980 {
5981  str_or_var sov_npc_class = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member );
5982  str_or_var unique_id;
5983  if( jo.has_member( "unique_id" ) ) {
5984  unique_id = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( "unique_id" ), "unique_id" );
5985  } else {
5986  unique_id.str_val = "";
5987  }
5988  std::vector<str_or_var> traits;
5989  for( JsonValue jv : jo.get_array( "traits" ) ) {
5990  str_or_var entry = get_str_or_var( jv, "traits" );
5991  traits.emplace_back( entry );
5992  }
5993 
5994  dbl_or_var dov_hallucination_count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "hallucination_count", false, 0 );
5995  dbl_or_var dov_real_count = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "real_count", false, 0 );
5996  dbl_or_var dov_min_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "min_radius", false, 1 );
5997  dbl_or_var dov_max_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "max_radius", false, 10 );
5998 
5999  const bool open_air_allowed = jo.get_bool( "open_air_allowed", false );
6000  const bool outdoor_only = jo.get_bool( "outdoor_only", false );
6001  const bool indoor_only = jo.get_bool( "indoor_only", false );
6002  if( indoor_only && outdoor_only ) {
6003  jo.throw_error( "Cannot be outdoor_only and indoor_only at the same time." );
6004  }
6005 
6006  duration_or_var dov_lifespan = get_duration_or_var( jo, "lifespan", false, 0_seconds );
6007  std::optional<var_info> target_var;
6008  if( jo.has_member( "target_var" ) ) {
6009  target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "target_var" ) );
6010  }
6011  translation spawn_message;
6012  jo.read( "spawn_message", spawn_message );
6013  translation spawn_message_plural;
6014  jo.read( "spawn_message_plural", spawn_message_plural );
6015  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> true_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "true_eocs" );
6016  std::vector<effect_on_condition_id> false_eocs = load_eoc_vector( jo, "false_eocs" );
6017  return [sov_npc_class, unique_id, traits, dov_hallucination_count, dov_real_count,
6018  dov_min_radius,
6019  dov_max_radius, outdoor_only, indoor_only, dov_lifespan, target_var, spawn_message,
6020  spawn_message_plural, true_eocs, false_eocs, open_air_allowed, is_npc]( dialogue & d ) {
6021  int min_radius = dov_min_radius.evaluate( d );
6022  int max_radius = dov_max_radius.evaluate( d );
6023  int real_count = dov_real_count.evaluate( d );
6024  int hallucination_count = dov_hallucination_count.evaluate( d );
6025  string_id<npc_template> cur_npc_class( sov_npc_class.evaluate( d ) );
6026  std::string cur_unique_id = unique_id.evaluate( d );
6027  std::vector<trait_id> cur_traits;
6028  cur_traits.reserve( traits.size() ); // Reserve space for all elements in traits
6029  for( const str_or_var &cur_trait : traits ) {
6030  cur_traits.emplace_back( cur_trait.evaluate( d ) );
6031  }
6032  std::optional<time_duration> lifespan;
6033  tripoint target_pos = d.actor( is_npc )->pos();
6034  if( target_var.has_value() ) {
6035  target_pos = get_map().getlocal( get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d ) );
6036  }
6037  int visible_spawns = 0;
6038  int spawns = 0;
6039  for( int i = 0; i < real_count; i++ ) {
6040  tripoint spawn_point;
6041  if( g->find_nearby_spawn_point( target_pos, min_radius,
6042  max_radius, spawn_point, outdoor_only, indoor_only, open_air_allowed ) ) {
6043  lifespan = dov_lifespan.evaluate( d );
6044  if( lifespan.value() == 0_seconds ) {
6045  lifespan.reset();
6046  }
6047  if( g->spawn_npc( spawn_point, cur_npc_class, cur_unique_id, cur_traits, lifespan ) ) {
6048  Creature *guy = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( spawn_point );
6049  if( guy ) {
6050  spawns++;
6051  if( get_avatar().sees( *guy ) ) {
6052  visible_spawns++;
6053  }
6054  }
6055  }
6056  }
6057  }
6058  cur_traits.emplace_back( trait_HALLUCINATION );
6059  for( int i = 0; i < hallucination_count; i++ ) {
6060  tripoint spawn_point;
6061  if( g->find_nearby_spawn_point( target_pos, min_radius,
6062  max_radius, spawn_point, outdoor_only, indoor_only, open_air_allowed ) ) {
6063  lifespan = dov_lifespan.evaluate( d );
6064  if( lifespan.value() == 0_seconds ) {
6065  lifespan.reset();
6066  }
6067  std::string empty;
6068  if( g->spawn_npc( spawn_point, cur_npc_class, empty, cur_traits, lifespan ) ) {
6069  Creature *guy = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( spawn_point );
6070  if( guy ) {
6071  spawns++;
6072  if( get_avatar().sees( *guy ) ) {
6073  visible_spawns++;
6074  }
6075  }
6076  }
6077  }
6078  }
6079  if( visible_spawns > 1 && !spawn_message_plural.empty() ) {
6080  get_avatar().add_msg_if_player( m_bad, spawn_message_plural );
6081  } else if( visible_spawns > 0 && !spawn_message.empty() ) {
6082  get_avatar().add_msg_if_player( m_bad, spawn_message );
6083  }
6084  if( spawns > 0 ) {
6085  run_eoc_vector( true_eocs, d );
6086  } else {
6087  run_eoc_vector( false_eocs, d );
6088  }
6089  };
6090 }
6091 
6092 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_field( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
6093  bool is_npc )
6094 {
6095  str_or_var new_field = get_str_or_var( jo.get_member( member ), member, true );
6096  dbl_or_var dov_intensity = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "intensity", false, 1 );
6097  duration_or_var dov_age = get_duration_or_var( jo, "age", false, 1_turns );
6098  dbl_or_var dov_radius = get_dbl_or_var( jo, "radius", false, 10000000 );
6099 
6100  const bool outdoor_only = jo.get_bool( "outdoor_only", false );
6101  const bool indoor_only = jo.get_bool( "indoor_only", false );
6102  const bool hit_player = jo.get_bool( "hit_player", true );
6103 
6104  std::optional<var_info> target_var;
6105  if( jo.has_member( "target_var" ) ) {
6106  target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( "target_var" ) );
6107  }
6108  return [new_field, dov_intensity, dov_age, dov_radius, outdoor_only,
6109  hit_player, target_var, is_npc, indoor_only]( dialogue & d ) {
6110  int radius = dov_radius.evaluate( d );
6111  int intensity = dov_intensity.evaluate( d );
6112 
6113  tripoint_abs_ms target_pos = d.actor( is_npc )->global_pos();
6114  if( target_var.has_value() ) {
6115  target_pos = get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d );
6116  }
6117  for( const tripoint &dest : get_map().points_in_radius( get_map().getlocal( target_pos ),
6118  radius ) ) {
6119  if( ( !outdoor_only || get_map().is_outside( dest ) ) && ( !indoor_only ||
6120  !get_map().is_outside( dest ) ) ) {
6121  get_map().add_field( dest, field_type_str_id( new_field.evaluate( d ) ), intensity,
6122  dov_age.evaluate( d ),
6123  hit_player );
6124  }
6125  }
6126  };
6127 }
6128 
6129 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_teleport( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member,
6130  bool is_npc )
6131 {
6132  std::optional<var_info> target_var = read_var_info( jo.get_object( member ) );
6133  translation_or_var fail_message;
6134  if( jo.has_member( "fail_message" ) ) {
6135  fail_message = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( "fail_message" ), "fail_message",
6136  false, translation() );
6137  } else {
6138  fail_message.str_val = translation();
6139  }
6140  translation_or_var success_message;
6141  if( jo.has_member( "success_message" ) ) {
6142  success_message = get_translation_or_var( jo.get_member( "success_message" ), "success_message",
6143  false, translation() );
6144  } else {
6145  success_message.str_val = translation();
6146  }
6147  bool force = jo.get_bool( "force", false );
6148  return [is_npc, target_var, fail_message, success_message, force]( dialogue const & d ) {
6149  tripoint_abs_ms target_pos = get_tripoint_from_var( target_var, d );
6150  Creature *teleporter = d.actor( is_npc )->get_creature();
6151  if( teleporter ) {
6152  if( teleport::teleport_to_point( *teleporter, get_map().getlocal( target_pos ), true, false,
6153  false, force ) ) {
6154  teleporter->add_msg_if_player( success_message.evaluate( d ) );
6155  } else {
6156  teleporter->add_msg_if_player( fail_message.evaluate( d ) );
6157  }
6158  }
6159  item_location *it = d.actor( is_npc )->get_item();
6160  if( it && it->get_item() ) {
6161  map_add_item( *it->get_item(), target_pos );
6162  add_msg( success_message.evaluate( d ) );
6163  it->remove_item();
6164  }
6165  };
6166 }
6167 
6168 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_wants_to_talk( bool is_npc )
6169 {
6170  return [is_npc]( dialogue const & d ) {
6171  npc *p = d.actor( is_npc )->get_npc();
6172  if( p ) {
6173  if( p->get_attitude() == NPCATT_TALK ) {
6174  return;
6175  }
6176  if( p->sees( get_player_character() ) ) {
6177  add_msg( _( "%s wants to talk to you." ), p->get_name() );
6178  }
6179  p->set_attitude( NPCATT_TALK );
6180  }
6181  };
6182 }
6183 
6184 talk_effect_fun_t::func f_trigger_event( const JsonObject &jo, std::string_view member )
6185 {
6186  std::string const type_str = jo.get_string( member.data() );
6187  JsonArray const &jargs = jo.get_array( "args" );
6188 
6189  event_type type = io::string_to_enum<event_type>( type_str );
6190  std::vector<str_or_var> args;
6191  args.reserve( jargs.size() );
6192  for( JsonValue const &jv : jargs ) {
6193  args.emplace_back( get_str_or_var( jv, "args" ) );
6194  }
6195 
6196  return [type, args]( dialogue & d ) {
6197  std::vector<std::string> args_str;
6198  args_str.reserve( args.size() );
6199  std::transform( args.cbegin(), args.cend(),
6200  std::back_inserter( args_str ), [&d]( str_or_var const & sov ) {
6201  return sov.evaluate( d );
6202  } );
6203  get_event_bus().send( cata::event::make_dyn( type, args_str ) );
6204  };
6205 }
6206 
6207 } // namespace
6208 } // namespace talk_effect_fun
6209 
6210 void talk_effect_t::set_effect_consequence( const talk_effect_fun_t &fun,
6211  dialogue_consequence con )
6212 {
6213  effects.push_back( fun );
6214  guaranteed_consequence = std::max( guaranteed_consequence, con );
6215 }
6216 
6217 void talk_effect_t::set_effect_consequence( const std::function<void( npc &p )> &ptr,
6218  dialogue_consequence con )
6219 {
6220  talk_effect_fun_t npctalk_setter( ptr );
6221  set_effect_consequence( npctalk_setter, con );
6222 }
6223 
6224 void talk_effect_t::set_effect( const talk_effect_fun_t &fun )
6225 {
6226  effects.push_back( fun );
6227  guaranteed_consequence = std::max( guaranteed_consequence, dialogue_consequence::none );
6228 }
6229 
6230 void talk_effect_t::set_effect( talkfunction_ptr ptr )
6231 {
6232  talk_effect_fun_t npctalk_setter( ptr );
6233  dialogue_consequence response;
6234  if( ptr == &talk_function::hostile ) {
6235  response = dialogue_consequence::hostile;
6236  } else if( ptr == &talk_function::player_weapon_drop ||
6237  ptr == &talk_function::player_weapon_away ||
6238  ptr == &talk_function::start_mugging ) {
6239  response = dialogue_consequence::helpless;
6240  } else {
6241  response = dialogue_consequence::none;
6242  }
6243  set_effect_consequence( npctalk_setter, response );
6244 }
6245 
6246 talk_topic talk_effect_t::apply( dialogue &d ) const
6247 {
6248  if( d.has_beta ) {
6249  // Need to get a reference to the mission before effects are applied, because effects can remove the mission
6250  const mission *miss = d.actor( true )->selected_mission();
6251  for( const talk_effect_fun_t &effect : effects ) {
6252  effect( d );
6253  }
6254  d.actor( true )->add_opinion( opinion );
6255  if( miss && ( mission_opinion.trust || mission_opinion.fear ||
6256  mission_opinion.value || mission_opinion.anger ) ) {
6257  const int m_value = d.actor( true )->cash_to_favor( miss->get_value() );
6258  npc_opinion op;
6259  op.trust = mission_opinion.trust ? m_value / mission_opinion.trust : 0;
6260  op.fear = mission_opinion.fear ? m_value / mission_opinion.fear : 0;
6261  op.value = mission_opinion.value ? m_value / mission_opinion.value : 0;
6262  op.anger = mission_opinion.anger ? m_value / mission_opinion.anger : 0;
6263  d.actor( true )->add_opinion( op );
6264  }
6265  if( d.actor( true )->turned_hostile() ) {
6266  d.actor( true )->make_angry();
6267  return talk_topic( "TALK_DONE" );
6268  }
6269  } else {
6270  for( const talk_effect_fun_t &effect : effects ) {
6271  effect( d );
6272  }
6273  }
6274 
6275  return next_topic;
6276 }
6277 
6278 void talk_effect_t::update_missions( dialogue &d )
6279 {
6280  auto &ma = d.missions_assigned;
6281  ma.clear();
6282  if( d.has_beta ) {
6283  // Update the missions we can talk about (must only be current, non-complete ones)
6284  for( mission *&mission : d.actor( true )->assigned_missions() ) {
6285  if( mission->get_assigned_player_id() == d.actor( false )->getID() ) {
6286  ma.push_back( mission );
6287  }
6288  }
6289  }
6290 }
6291 
6292 talk_effect_t::talk_effect_t( const JsonObject &jo, const std::string &member_name )
6293 {
6294  load_effect( jo, member_name );
6295  if( jo.has_object( "topic" ) ) {
6296  next_topic = load_inline_topic( jo.get_object( "topic" ) );
6297  } else if( jo.has_string( "topic" ) ) {
6298  next_topic = talk_topic( jo.get_string( "topic" ) );
6299  }
6300 }
6301 
6302 static const
6303 std::vector<sub_effect_parser>
6304 parsers = {
6305  { "u_add_effect", "npc_add_effect", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_add_effect },
6306  { "u_lose_effect", "npc_lose_effect", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_remove_effect },
6307  { "u_add_var", "npc_add_var", jarg::string, &talk_effect_fun::f_add_var },
6308  { "u_lose_var", "npc_lose_var", jarg::string, &talk_effect_fun::f_remove_var },
6309  { "u_add_trait", "npc_add_trait", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_add_trait },
6310  { "u_lose_trait", "npc_lose_trait", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_remove_trait },
6311  { "u_deactivate_trait", "npc_deactivate_trait", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_deactivate_trait },
6312  { "u_activate_trait", "npc_activate_trait", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_activate_trait },

6329  { "u_run_npc_eocs", "npc_run_npc_eocs", jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_run_npc_eocs },
6330  { "u_run_monster_eocs", "npc_run_monster_eocs", jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_run_monster_eocs },
6331  { "u_run_inv_eocs", "npc_run_inv_eocs", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_run_inv_eocs },

6348  { "u_bulk_trade_accept", "npc_bulk_trade_accept", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_bulk_trade_accept },
6349  { "u_bulk_donate", "npc_bulk_donate", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_bulk_trade_accept },

6366  { "set_npc_cbm_reserve_rule", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_npc_cbm_reserve_rule },
6367  { "set_npc_cbm_recharge_rule", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_npc_cbm_recharge_rule },
