6373  { "transform_line", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_transform_line },
6374  { "location_variable_adjust", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_location_variable_adjust },
6375  { "u_buy_monster", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_u_buy_monster },
6376  { "u_add_faction_trust", jarg::member | jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_add_faction_trust },
6377  { "u_lose_faction_trust", jarg::member | jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_lose_faction_trust },
6378  { "npc_first_topic", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_npc_first_topic },
6379  { "sound_effect", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_sound_effect },
6380  { "give_achievement", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_give_achievment },
6381  { "assign_mission", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_assign_mission },
6382  { "finish_mission", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_finish_mission },
6383  { "remove_active_mission", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_remove_active_mission },
6384  { "offer_mission", jarg::array | jarg::string, &talk_effect_fun::f_offer_mission },
6385  { "run_eocs", jarg::member | jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_run_eocs },
6386  { "run_eoc_until", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_run_eoc_until },
6387  { "run_eoc_with", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_run_eoc_with },
6388  { "run_eoc_selector", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_run_eoc_selector },
6389  { "queue_eocs", jarg::member | jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_queue_eocs },
6390  { "queue_eoc_with", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_queue_eoc_with },
6391  { "weighted_list_eocs", jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_weighted_list_eocs },
6392  { "if", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_if },
6393  { "switch", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_switch },
6394  { "foreach", jarg::string, &talk_effect_fun::f_foreach },
6395  { "math", jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_math },
6396  { "custom_light_level", jarg::member | jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_custom_light_level },
6397  { "give_equipment", jarg::object, &talk_effect_fun::f_give_equipment },
6398  { "set_string_var", jarg::member | jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_set_string_var },
6399  { "set_condition", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_set_condition },
6400  { "open_dialogue", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_open_dialogue },
6401  { "take_control", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_take_control },
6402  { "trigger_event", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_trigger_event },
6403  { "add_debt", jarg::array, &talk_effect_fun::f_add_debt },
6404  { "u_set_talker", "npc_set_talker", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_set_talker },
6405  { "turn_cost", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_turn_cost },
6406  { "transform_item", jarg::member, &talk_effect_fun::f_transform_item },
6407 };
6408 
6409 void talk_effect_t::parse_sub_effect( const JsonObject &jo )
6410 {
6411  for( const sub_effect_parser &p : parsers ) {
6412  if( p.has_beta ) {
6413  if( p.check( jo ) ) {
6414  set_effect( p.f( jo, p.key_alpha, false ) );
6415  return;
6416  } else if( p.check( jo, true ) ) {
6417  set_effect( p.f( jo, p.key_beta, true ) );
6418  return;
6419  }
6420  } else if( p.check( jo ) ) {
6421  set_effect( p.f( jo, p.key_alpha, false ) );
6422  return;
6423  }
6424  }
6425  jo.throw_error( "invalid sub effect syntax: " + jo.str() );
6426 }
6427 
6428 void talk_effect_t::parse_string_effect( const std::string &effect_id, const JsonObject &jo )
6429 {
6430  static const std::unordered_map<std::string, void( * )( npc & )> static_functions_map = {
6431  {
6432 #define WRAP( function ) { #function, &talk_function::function }
6433  WRAP( assign_mission ),
6434  WRAP( mission_success ),
6435  WRAP( mission_failure ),
6436  WRAP( clear_mission ),
6437  WRAP( mission_reward ),
6438  WRAP( start_trade ),
6439  WRAP( sort_loot ),
6440  WRAP( find_mount ),
6441  WRAP( dismount ),
6442  WRAP( do_chop_plank ),
6443  WRAP( do_vehicle_deconstruct ),
6444  WRAP( do_vehicle_repair ),
6445  WRAP( do_chop_trees ),
6446  WRAP( do_fishing ),
6447  WRAP( do_construction ),
6448  WRAP( do_mining ),
6449  WRAP( do_mopping ),
6450  WRAP( do_read ),
6451  WRAP( do_eread ),
6452  WRAP( do_read_repeatedly ),
6453  WRAP( do_craft ),
6454  WRAP( do_butcher ),
6455  WRAP( do_farming ),
6456  WRAP( assign_guard ),
6457  WRAP( assign_camp ),
6458  WRAP( abandon_camp ),
6459  WRAP( stop_guard ),
6460  WRAP( start_camp ),
6461  WRAP( buy_cow ),
6462  WRAP( buy_chicken ),
6463  WRAP( buy_horse ),
6464  WRAP( basecamp_mission ),
6465  WRAP( wake_up ),
6466  WRAP( reveal_stats ),
6467  WRAP( end_conversation ),
6468  WRAP( insult_combat ),
6469  WRAP( give_equipment ),
6470  WRAP( lesser_give_aid ),
6471  WRAP( lesser_give_all_aid ),
6472  WRAP( give_aid ),
6473  WRAP( give_all_aid ),
6474  WRAP( barber_beard ),
6475  WRAP( barber_hair ),
6476  WRAP( buy_haircut ),
6477  WRAP( buy_shave ),
6478  WRAP( morale_chat ),
6479  WRAP( morale_chat_activity ),
6480  WRAP( bionic_install ),
6481  WRAP( bionic_install_allies ),
6482  WRAP( bionic_remove ),
6483  WRAP( bionic_remove_allies ),
6484  WRAP( drop_items_in_place ),
6485  WRAP( follow ),
6486  WRAP( follow_only ),
6487  WRAP( deny_follow ),
6488  WRAP( deny_lead ),
6489  WRAP( deny_equipment ),
6490  WRAP( deny_train ),
6491  WRAP( deny_personal_info ),
6492  WRAP( hostile ),
6493  WRAP( flee ),
6494  WRAP( leave ),
6495  WRAP( stop_following ),
6496  WRAP( revert_activity ),
6497  WRAP( goto_location ),
6498  WRAP( stranger_neutral ),
6499  WRAP( start_mugging ),
6500  WRAP( player_leaving ),
6501  WRAP( drop_weapon ),
6502  WRAP( drop_stolen_item ),
6503  WRAP( remove_stolen_status ),
6504  WRAP( player_weapon_away ),
6505  WRAP( player_weapon_drop ),
6506  WRAP( lead_to_safety ),
6507  WRAP( start_training ),
6508  WRAP( start_training_npc ),
6509  WRAP( start_training_seminar ),
6510  WRAP( copy_npc_rules ),
6511  WRAP( set_npc_pickup ),
6512  WRAP( npc_thankful ),
6513  WRAP( clear_overrides ),
6514  WRAP( pick_style ),
6515  WRAP( do_disassembly ),
6516  WRAP( nothing )
6517 #undef WRAP
6518  }
6519  };
6520  const auto iter = static_functions_map.find( effect_id );
6521  if( iter != static_functions_map.end() ) {
6522  set_effect( iter->second );
6523  return;
6524  }
6525 
6526  if( effect_id == "u_bulk_trade_accept" || effect_id == "npc_bulk_trade_accept" ||
6527  effect_id == "u_bulk_donate" || effect_id == "npc_bulk_donate" ) {
6528  bool is_npc = effect_id == "npc_bulk_trade_accept" || effect_id == "npc_bulk_donate";
6529  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_bulk_trade_accept( jo, effect_id, is_npc ) ) );
6530  return;
6531  }
6532 
6533  if( effect_id == "lightning" ) {
6534  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_lightning() ) );
6535  return;
6536  }
6537 
6538  if( effect_id == "u_die" ) {
6539  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_die( false ) ) );
6540  return;
6541  }
6542 
6543  if( effect_id == "npc_die" ) {
6544  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_die( true ) ) );
6545  return;
6546  }
6547 
6548  if( effect_id == "u_prevent_death" ) {
6549  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_prevent_death( false ) ) );
6550  return;
6551  }
6552 
6553  if( effect_id == "npc_prevent_death" ) {
6554  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_prevent_death( true ) ) );
6555  return;
6556  }
6557 
6558  if( effect_id == "next_weather" ) {
6559  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_next_weather() ) );
6560  return;
6561  }
6562 
6563  if( effect_id == "npc_gets_item" || effect_id == "npc_gets_item_to_use" ) {
6564  bool to_use = effect_id == "npc_gets_item_to_use";
6565  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_npc_gets_item( to_use ) ) );
6566  return;
6567  }
6568 
6569  if( effect_id == "open_dialogue" ) {
6570  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_open_dialogue( jo, "" ) ) );
6571  return;
6572  }
6573  if( effect_id == "take_control" ) {
6574  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_take_control( jo, "" ) ) );
6575  return;
6576  }
6577  if( effect_id == "take_control_menu" ) {
6578  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_take_control_menu() ) );
6579  return;
6580  }
6581  if( effect_id == "u_wants_to_talk" ) {
6582  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_wants_to_talk( false ) ) );
6583  return;
6584  }
6585  if( effect_id == "npc_wants_to_talk" ) {
6586  set_effect( talk_effect_fun_t( talk_effect_fun::f_wants_to_talk( true ) ) );
6587  return;
6588  }
6589  jo.throw_error_at( effect_id, "unknown effect string" );
6590 }
6591 
6592 void talk_effect_t::load_effect( const JsonObject &jo, const std::string &member_name )
6593 {
6594  if( jo.has_member( "opinion" ) ) {
6595  JsonValue jv = jo.get_member( "opinion" );
6596  // Same format as when saving a game (-:
6597  opinion.deserialize( jv );
6598  }
6599  if( jo.has_member( "mission_opinion" ) ) {
6600  JsonValue jv = jo.get_member( "mission_opinion" );
6601  // Same format as when saving a game (-:
6602  mission_opinion.deserialize( jv );
6603  }
6604  if( !jo.has_member( member_name ) ) {
6605  return;
6606  } else if( jo.has_string( member_name ) ) {
6607  const std::string type = jo.get_string( member_name );
6608  parse_string_effect( type, jo );
6609  } else if( jo.has_object( member_name ) ) {
6610  JsonObject sub_effect = jo.get_object( member_name );
6611  parse_sub_effect( sub_effect );
6612  } else if( jo.has_array( member_name ) ) {
6613  for( const JsonValue entry : jo.get_array( member_name ) ) {
6614  if( entry.test_string() ) {
6615  const std::string type = entry.get_string();
6616  parse_string_effect( type, jo );
6617  } else if( entry.test_object() ) {
6618  JsonObject sub_effect = entry.get_object();
6619  parse_sub_effect( sub_effect );
6620  } else {
6621  jo.throw_error_at( member_name, "invalid effect array syntax" );
6622  }
6623  }
6624  } else {
6625  jo.throw_error_at( member_name, "invalid effect syntax" );
6626  }
6627 }
6628 
6629 talk_response::talk_response()
6630 {
6631  truefalse_condition = []( const dialogue & ) {
6632  return true;
6633  };
6634  mission_selected = nullptr;
6635  // Why aren't these null ids? Well, it turns out most responses give
6636  // empty ids, so things like the training code check for these empty ids
6637  // and when it's given a null id, it breaks
6638  // FIXME: Use null ids
6639  skill = skill_id();
6640  style = matype_id();
6641  proficiency = proficiency_id();
6642  dialogue_spell = spell_id();
6643 }
6644 
6645 talk_response::talk_response( const JsonObject &jo )
6646 {
6647  if( jo.has_member( "truefalsetext" ) ) {
6648  JsonObject truefalse_jo = jo.get_object( "truefalsetext" );
6649  read_condition( truefalse_jo, "condition", truefalse_condition, true );
6650  truefalse_jo.read( "true", truetext );
6651  truefalse_jo.read( "false", falsetext );
6652  } else {
6653  jo.read( "text", truetext );
6654  truefalse_condition = []( const dialogue & ) {
6655  return true;
6656  };
6657  }
6658  if( jo.has_member( "trial" ) ) {
6659  JsonObject trial_obj = jo.get_object( "trial" );
6660  trial = talk_trial( trial_obj );
6661  }
6662  if( jo.has_member( "success" ) ) {
6663  JsonObject success_obj = jo.get_object( "success" );
6664  success = talk_effect_t( success_obj, "effect" );
6665  } else if( jo.has_string( "topic" ) ) {
6666  // This is for simple topic switching without a possible failure
6667  success.next_topic = talk_topic( jo.get_string( "topic" ) );
6668  success.load_effect( jo, "effect" );
6669  } else if( jo.has_object( "topic" ) ) {
6670  success.next_topic = load_inline_topic( jo.get_object( "topic" ) );
6671  }
6672  if( trial && !jo.has_member( "failure" ) ) {
6673  jo.throw_error( "the failure effect is mandatory if a talk_trial has been defined" );
6674  }
6675  if( jo.has_member( "failure" ) ) {
6676  JsonObject failure_obj = jo.get_object( "failure" );
6677  failure = talk_effect_t( failure_obj, "effect" );
6678  }
6679 
6680  // TODO: mission_selected
6681  // TODO: skill
6682  // TODO: style
6683 }
6684 
6685 json_talk_repeat_response::json_talk_repeat_response( const JsonObject &jo )
6686 {
6687  if( jo.has_bool( "is_npc" ) ) {
6688  is_npc = true;
6689  }
6690  if( jo.has_bool( "include_containers" ) ) {
6691  include_containers = true;
6692  }
6693  if( jo.has_string( "for_item" ) ) {
6694  for_item.emplace_back( jo.get_string( "for_item" ) );
6695  } else if( jo.has_array( "for_item" ) ) {
6696  for( const std::string line : jo.get_array( "for_item" ) ) {
6697  for_item.emplace_back( line );
6698  }
6699  } else if( jo.has_string( "for_category" ) ) {
6700  for_category.emplace_back( jo.get_string( "for_category" ) );
6701  } else if( jo.has_array( "for_category" ) ) {
6702  for( const std::string line : jo.get_array( "for_category" ) ) {
6703  for_category.emplace_back( line );
6704  }
6705  } else {
6706  jo.throw_error( "Repeat response with no repeat information!" );
6707  }
6708  if( for_item.empty() && for_category.empty() ) {
6709  jo.throw_error( "Repeat response with empty repeat information!" );
6710  }
6711  if( jo.has_object( "response" ) ) {
6712  JsonObject response_obj = jo.get_object( "response" );
6713  response = json_talk_response( response_obj );
6714  } else {
6715  jo.throw_error( "Repeat response with no response!" );
6716  }
6717 }
6718 
6719 json_talk_response::json_talk_response( const JsonObject &jo )
6720  : actual_response( jo )
6721 {
6722  load_condition( jo );
6723 }
6724 
6725 void json_talk_response::load_condition( const JsonObject &jo )
6726 {
6727  has_condition_ = jo.has_member( "condition" );
6728  is_switch = jo.get_bool( "switch", false );
6729  is_default = jo.get_bool( "default", false );
6730  read_condition( jo, "condition", condition, true );
6731 
6732  optional( jo, true, "failure_explanation", failure_explanation );
6733  optional( jo, true, "failure_topic", failure_topic );
6734 }
6735 
6736 bool json_talk_response::test_condition( dialogue &d ) const
6737 {
6738  if( condition ) {
6739  return condition( d );
6740  }
6741  return true;
6742 }
6743 
6744 const talk_response &json_talk_response::get_actual_response() const
6745 {
6746  return actual_response;
6747 }
6748 
6749 bool json_talk_response::gen_responses( dialogue &d, bool switch_done ) const
6750 {
6751  if( !is_switch || !switch_done ) {
6752  if( test_condition( d ) ) {
6753  d.responses.emplace_back( actual_response );
6754  return is_switch && !is_default;
6755  } else if( !failure_explanation.empty() || !failure_topic.empty() ) {
6756  // build additional talk responses for failed options with an explanation if details are given
6757  talk_response tr = talk_response();
6758  tr.truetext = no_translation(
6759  string_format( pgettext( "failure_explanation: actual_response", "*%s: %s" ),
6760  failure_explanation.translated(), actual_response.truetext.translated() ) );
6761  if( !failure_topic.empty() ) {
6762  // Default is TALK_NONE otherwise go to the failure topic provided
6763  tr.success.next_topic = talk_topic( failure_topic );
6764  }
6765  d.responses.emplace_back( tr );
6766  }
6767  }
6768  return false;
6769 }
6770 
6771 // repeat responses always go in front
6772 bool json_talk_response::gen_repeat_response( dialogue &d, const itype_id &item_id,
6773  bool switch_done ) const
6774 {
6775  if( !is_switch || !switch_done ) {
6776  if( test_condition( d ) ) {
6777  talk_response result = actual_response;
6778  result.success.next_topic.item_type = item_id;
6779  result.failure.next_topic.item_type = item_id;
6780  d.responses.insert( d.responses.begin(), result );
6781  return is_switch && !is_default;
6782  }
6783  }
6784  return false;
6785 }
6786 
6787 static std::string translate_gendered_line(
6788  const std::string &line,
6789  const std::vector<std::string> &relevant_genders,
6790  const dialogue &d
6791 )
6792 {
6793  GenderMap gender_map;
6794  for( const std::string &subject : relevant_genders ) {
6795  if( subject == "npc" ) {
6796  gender_map[subject] = d.actor( true )->get_grammatical_genders();
6797  } else if( subject == "u" ) {
6798  gender_map[subject] = d.actor( false )->get_grammatical_genders();
6799  } else {
6800  debugmsg( "Unsupported subject '%s' for grammatical gender in dialogue", subject );
6801  }
6802  }
6803  return gettext_gendered( gender_map, line );
6804 }
6805 
6806 dynamic_line_t dynamic_line_t::from_member( const JsonObject &jo,
6807  const std::string_view member_name )
6808 {
6809  if( jo.has_array( member_name ) ) {
6810  return dynamic_line_t( jo.get_array( member_name ) );
6811  } else if( jo.has_object( member_name ) ) {
6812  JsonObject dl = jo.get_object( member_name );
6813  if( dl.has_member( "str" ) ) {
6814  dl.allow_omitted_members();
6815  translation line;
6816  jo.read( member_name, line );
6817  return dynamic_line_t( line );
6818  } else {
6819  return dynamic_line_t( dl );
6820  }
6821  } else if( jo.has_string( member_name ) ) {
6822  translation line;
6823  jo.read( member_name, line );
6824  return dynamic_line_t( line );
6825  } else {
6826  return dynamic_line_t{};
6827  }
6828 }
6829 
6830 dynamic_line_t::dynamic_line_t( const translation &line )
6831 {
6832  function = [line]( const dialogue & ) {
6833  return line.translated();
6834  };
6835 }
6836 
6837 dynamic_line_t::dynamic_line_t( const JsonObject &jo )
6838 {
6839  if( jo.has_member( "concatenate" ) ) {
6840  std::vector<dynamic_line_t> lines;
6841  for( const JsonValue entry : jo.get_array( "concatenate" ) ) {
6842  if( entry.test_string() ) {
6843  translation line;
6844  entry.read( line );
6845  lines.emplace_back( line );
6846  } else if( entry.test_array() ) {
6847  lines.emplace_back( entry.get_array() );
6848  } else if( entry.test_object() ) {
6849  JsonObject dl = entry.get_object();
6850  if( dl.has_member( "str" ) ) {
6851  dl.allow_omitted_members();
6852  translation line;
6853  entry.read( line );
6854  lines.emplace_back( line );
6855  } else {
6856  lines.emplace_back( dl );
6857  }
6858  } else {
6859  entry.throw_error( "invalid format: must be string, array or object" );
6860  }
6861  }
6862  function = [lines]( dialogue & d ) {
6863  std::string all_lines;
6864  for( const dynamic_line_t &line : lines ) {
6865  all_lines += line( d );
6866  }
6867  return all_lines;
6868  };
6869  } else if( jo.get_bool( "give_hint", false ) ) {
6870  function = [&]( const dialogue & ) {
6871  return get_hint();
6872  };
6873  } else if( jo.get_bool( "use_reason", false ) ) {
6874  function = [&]( const dialogue & d ) {
6875  std::string tmp = d.reason;
6876  d.reason.clear();
6877  return tmp;
6878  };
6879  } else if( jo.get_bool( "list_faction_camp_sites", false ) ) {
6880  function = [&]( const dialogue & ) {
6881  const auto &sites = recipe_group::get_recipes_by_id( "all_faction_base_types" );
6882  if( sites.empty() ) {
6883  return std::string( _( "I can't think of a single place I can build a camp." ) );
6884  }
6885  std::string tmp = "I can start a new camp as a ";
6886  tmp += enumerate_as_string( sites.begin(), sites.end(),
6887  []( const std::pair<recipe_id, translation> &site ) {
6888  return site.second.translated();
6889  },
6890  enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
6891  return tmp;
6892  };
6893  } else if( jo.has_string( "gendered_line" ) ) {
6894  std::string line;
6895  mandatory( jo, false, "gendered_line", line, text_style_check_reader() );
6896  if( !jo.has_array( "relevant_genders" ) ) {
6897  jo.throw_error(
6898  R"(dynamic line with "gendered_line" must also have "relevant_genders")" );
6899  }
6900  std::vector<std::string> relevant_genders;
6901  for( const std::string gender : jo.get_array( "relevant_genders" ) ) {
6902  relevant_genders.push_back( gender );
6903  if( gender != "npc" && gender != "u" ) {
6904  jo.throw_error( "Unexpected subject in relevant_genders; expected 'npc' or 'u'" );
6905  }
6906  }
6907  function = [line, relevant_genders]( const dialogue & d ) {
6908  return translate_gendered_line( line, relevant_genders, d );
6909  };
6910  } else {
6911  conditional_t dcondition;
6912  const dynamic_line_t yes = from_member( jo, "yes" );
6913  const dynamic_line_t no = from_member( jo, "no" );
6914  for( const std::string &sub_member : dialogue_data::simple_string_conds() ) {
6915  if( jo.has_bool( sub_member ) ) {
6916  // This also marks the member as visited.
6917  if( !jo.get_bool( sub_member ) ) {
6918  jo.throw_error_at( sub_member, "value must be true" );
6919  }
6920  dcondition = conditional_t( sub_member );
6921  function = [dcondition, yes, no]( dialogue & d ) {
6922  return ( dcondition( d ) ? yes : no )( d );
6923  };
6924  return;
6925  } else if( jo.has_member( sub_member ) ) {
6926  dcondition = conditional_t( sub_member );
6927  const dynamic_line_t yes_member = from_member( jo, sub_member );
6928  function = [dcondition, yes_member, no]( dialogue & d ) {
6929  return ( dcondition( d ) ? yes_member : no )( d );
6930  };
6931  return;
6932  }
6933  }
6934  for( const std::string &sub_member : dialogue_data::complex_conds() ) {
6935  if( jo.has_member( sub_member ) ) {
6936  dcondition = conditional_t( jo );
6937  function = [dcondition, yes, no]( dialogue & d ) {
6938  return ( dcondition( d ) ? yes : no )( d );
6939  };
6940  return;
6941  }
6942  }
6943  jo.throw_error( "dynamic line not supported" );
6944  }
6945 }
6946 
6947 dynamic_line_t::dynamic_line_t( const JsonArray &ja )
6948 {
6949  std::vector<dynamic_line_t> lines;
6950  for( const JsonValue entry : ja ) {
6951  if( entry.test_string() ) {
6952  translation line;
6953  entry.read( line );
6954  lines.emplace_back( line );
6955  } else if( entry.test_array() ) {
6956  lines.emplace_back( entry.get_array() );
6957  } else if( entry.test_object() ) {
6958  JsonObject dl = entry.get_object();
6959  if( dl.has_member( "str" ) ) {
6960  dl.allow_omitted_members();
6961  translation line;
6962  entry.read( line );
6963  lines.emplace_back( line );
6964  } else {
6965  lines.emplace_back( dl );
6966  }
6967  } else {
6968  entry.throw_error( "invalid format: must be string, array or object" );
6969  }
6970  }
6971  function = [lines]( dialogue & d ) {
6972  const dynamic_line_t &line = random_entry_ref( lines );
6973  return line( d );
6974  };
6975 }
6976 
6977 json_dynamic_line_effect::json_dynamic_line_effect( const JsonObject &jo,
6978  const std::string &id )
6979 {
6980  std::function<bool( dialogue & )> tmp_condition;
6981  read_condition( jo, "condition", tmp_condition, true );
6982  talk_effect_t tmp_effect = talk_effect_t( jo, "effect" );
6983  // if the topic has a sentinel, it means implicitly add a check for the sentinel value
6984  // and do not run the effects if it is set. if it is not set, run the effects and
6985  // set the sentinel
6986  if( jo.has_string( "sentinel" ) ) {
6987  const std::string sentinel = jo.get_string( "sentinel" );
6988  const std::string varname = "npctalk_var_sentinel_" + id + "_" + sentinel;
6989  condition = [varname, tmp_condition]( dialogue & d ) {
6990  return d.actor( false )->get_value( varname ) != "yes" && tmp_condition( d );
6991  };
6992  std::function<void( const dialogue &d )> function = [varname]( const dialogue & d ) {
6993  d.actor( false )->set_value( varname, "yes" );
6994  };
6995  tmp_effect.effects.emplace_back( function );
6996  } else {
6997  condition = tmp_condition;
6998  }
6999  effect = tmp_effect;
7000 }
7001 
7002 bool json_dynamic_line_effect::test_condition( dialogue &d ) const
7003 {
7004  return condition( d );
7005 }
7006 
7007 void json_dynamic_line_effect::apply( dialogue &d ) const
7008 {
7009  effect.apply( d );
7010 }
7011 
7012 void json_talk_topic::load( const JsonObject &jo )
7013 {
7014  if( jo.has_member( "dynamic_line" ) ) {
7015  dynamic_line = dynamic_line_t::from_member( jo, "dynamic_line" );
7016  }
7017  if( jo.has_member( "speaker_effect" ) ) {
7018  std::string id = "no_id";
7019  if( jo.has_string( "id" ) ) {
7020  id = jo.get_string( "id" );
7021  } else if( jo.has_array( "id" ) ) {
7022  id = jo.get_array( "id" ).next_string();
7023  }
7024  if( jo.has_object( "speaker_effect" ) ) {
7025  JsonObject speaker_effect = jo.get_object( "speaker_effect" );
7026  speaker_effects.emplace_back( speaker_effect, id );
7027  } else if( jo.has_array( "speaker_effect" ) ) {
7028  for( JsonObject speaker_effect : jo.get_array( "speaker_effect" ) ) {
7029  speaker_effects.emplace_back( speaker_effect, id );
7030  }
7031  }
7032  }
7033  bool insert_above_bottom = false;
7034  if( jo.has_bool( "insert_before_standard_exits" ) ) {
7035  insert_above_bottom = jo.get_bool( "insert_before_standard_exits" );
7036  }
7037  if( !insert_above_bottom || responses.empty() ) {
7038  for( JsonObject response : jo.get_array( "responses" ) ) {
7039  responses.emplace_back( response );
7040  }
7041  } else {
7042  int dec_count = 0;
7043  if( !responses.empty() &&
7044  responses.back().get_actual_response().success.next_topic.id == "TALK_DONE" ) {
7045  dec_count = 1;
7046  }
7047  if( responses.size() >= 2 &&
7048  responses[ responses.size() - 2].get_actual_response().success.next_topic.id == "TALK_NONE" ) {
7049  dec_count = 2;
7050  }
7051  for( JsonObject response : jo.get_array( "responses" ) ) {
7052  responses.emplace( responses.end() - dec_count, response );
7053  }
7054  }
7055  if( jo.has_object( "repeat_responses" ) ) {
7056  repeat_responses.emplace_back( jo.get_object( "repeat_responses" ) );
7057  } else if( jo.has_array( "repeat_responses" ) ) {
7058  for( JsonObject elem : jo.get_array( "repeat_responses" ) ) {
7059  repeat_responses.emplace_back( elem );
7060  }
7061  }
7062  if( responses.empty() ) {
7063  jo.throw_error_at( "responses", "no responses for talk topic defined" );
7064  }
7065  replace_built_in_responses = jo.get_bool( "replace_built_in_responses",
7066  replace_built_in_responses );
7067 }
7068 
7069 bool json_talk_topic::gen_responses( dialogue &d ) const
7070 {
7071  d.responses.reserve( responses.size() ); // A wild guess, can actually be more or less
7072 
7073  bool switch_done = false;
7074  for( const json_talk_response &r : responses ) {
7075  switch_done |= r.gen_responses( d, switch_done );
7076  }
7077  for( const json_talk_repeat_response &repeat : repeat_responses ) {
7078  talker *actor = d.actor( repeat.is_npc );
7079  std::function<bool( const item & )> filter = return_true<item>;
7080  for( const itype_id &item_id : repeat.for_item ) {
7081  if( actor->charges_of( item_id ) > 0 || actor->has_amount( item_id, 1 ) ) {
7082  switch_done |= repeat.response.gen_repeat_response( d, item_id, switch_done );
7083  }
7084  }
7085  for( const item_category_id &category_id : repeat.for_category ) {
7086  const bool include_containers = repeat.include_containers;
7087  const auto items_with = actor->items_with( [category_id,
7088  include_containers]( const item & it ) {
7089  if( include_containers ) {
7090  return it.get_category_of_contents().get_id() == category_id;
7091  }
7092  return it.type && it.type->category_force == category_id;
7093  } );
7094  for( item * const &it : items_with ) {
7095  switch_done |= repeat.response.gen_repeat_response( d, it->typeId(), switch_done );
7096  }
7097  }
7098  }
7099 
7100  return replace_built_in_responses;
7101 }
7102 
7103 cata::flat_set<std::string> json_talk_topic::get_directly_reachable_topics(
7104  bool only_unconditional ) const
7105 {
7106  std::vector<std::string> result;
7107 
7108  auto add_reachable_for_response = [&]( const json_talk_response & json_response ) {
7109  const talk_response &response = json_response.get_actual_response();
7110  if( !only_unconditional || !json_response.has_condition() ) {
7111  result.push_back( response.success.next_topic.id );
7112  result.push_back( response.failure.next_topic.id );
7113  }
7114  };
7115 
7116  for( const json_talk_response &r : responses ) {
7117  add_reachable_for_response( r );
7118  }
7119  for( const json_talk_repeat_response &r : repeat_responses ) {
7120  add_reachable_for_response( r.response );
7121  }
7122 
7123  return cata::flat_set<std::string>( result.begin(), result.end() );
7124 }
7125 
7126 std::string json_talk_topic::get_dynamic_line( dialogue &d ) const
7127 {
7128  return dynamic_line( d );
7129 }
7130 
7131 std::vector<json_dynamic_line_effect> json_talk_topic::get_speaker_effects() const
7132 {
7133  return speaker_effects;
7134 }
7135 
7136 void json_talk_topic::check_consistency() const
7137 {
7138  // TODO: check that all referenced topic actually exist. This is currently not possible
7139  // as they only exist as built in strings, not in the json_talk_topics map.
7140 }
7141 
7142 void unload_talk_topics()
7143 {
7144  json_talk_topics.clear();
7145 }
7146 
7147 void load_talk_topic( const JsonObject &jo )
7148 {
7149  if( jo.has_array( "id" ) ) {
7150  for( auto &id : jo.get_string_array( "id" ) ) {
7151  json_talk_topics[id].load( jo );
7152  }
7153  } else {
7154  const std::string id = jo.get_string( "id" );
7155  json_talk_topics[id].load( jo );
7156  }
7157 }
7158 
7159 std::string npc::pick_talk_topic( const Character &/*u*/ )
7160 {
7161  if( personality.aggression > 0 ) {
7162  if( op_of_u.fear * 2 < personality.bravery && personality.altruism < 0 ) {
7163  set_attitude( NPCATT_MUG );
7164  return chatbin.talk_mug ;
7165  }
7166 
7167  if( personality.aggression + personality.bravery - op_of_u.fear > 0 ) {
7168  return chatbin.talk_stranger_aggressive ;
7169  }
7170  }
7171 
7172  if( op_of_u.fear * 2 > personality.altruism + personality.bravery ) {
7173  return chatbin.talk_stranger_scared;
7174  }
7175 
7176  if( op_of_u.fear * 2 > personality.bravery + op_of_u.trust ) {
7177  return chatbin.talk_stranger_wary;
7178  }
7179 
7180  if( op_of_u.trust - op_of_u.fear +
7181  ( personality.bravery + personality.altruism ) / 2 > 0 ) {
7182  return chatbin.talk_stranger_friendly;
7183  }
7184 
7185  set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
7186  return chatbin.talk_stranger_neutral;
7187 }
7188 
7189 std::string const &npc::get_specified_talk_topic( std::string const &topic_id )
7190 {
7191  static const dialogue_chatbin default_chatbin;
7192  std::vector<std::pair<std::string const &, std::string const &>> const talk_topics = {
7193  {default_chatbin.first_topic, chatbin.first_topic},
7194  {default_chatbin.talk_radio, chatbin.talk_radio},
7195  {default_chatbin.talk_leader, chatbin.talk_leader},
7196  {default_chatbin.talk_friend, chatbin.talk_friend},
7197  {default_chatbin.talk_stole_item, chatbin.talk_stole_item},
7198  {default_chatbin.talk_wake_up, chatbin.talk_wake_up},
7199  {default_chatbin.talk_mug, chatbin.talk_mug},
7200  {default_chatbin.talk_stranger_aggressive, chatbin.talk_stranger_aggressive},
7201  {default_chatbin.talk_stranger_scared, chatbin.talk_stranger_scared},
7202  {default_chatbin.talk_stranger_wary, chatbin.talk_stranger_wary},
7203  {default_chatbin.talk_stranger_friendly, chatbin.talk_stranger_friendly},
7204  {default_chatbin.talk_stranger_neutral, chatbin.talk_stranger_neutral},
7205  {default_chatbin.talk_friend_guard, chatbin.talk_friend_guard}
7206  };
7207 
7208  const auto iter = std::find_if( talk_topics.begin(), talk_topics.end(),
7209  [&topic_id]( const std::pair<std::string, std::string> &pair ) {
7210  return pair.first == topic_id;
7211  } );
7212  if( iter != talk_topics.end() ) {
7213  return iter->second;
7214  }
7215 
7216  return topic_id;
7217 }
7218 
7219 bool npc::has_item_whitelist() const
7220 {
7221  return is_player_ally() && !rules.pickup_whitelist->empty();
7222 }
7223 
7224 bool npc::item_name_whitelisted( const std::string &to_match )
7225 {
7226  if( !has_item_whitelist() ) {
7227  return true;
7228  }
7229 
7230  auto_pickup::npc_settings &wlist = *rules.pickup_whitelist;
7231  const rule_state rule = wlist.check_item( to_match );
7232  if( rule == rule_state::WHITELISTED ) {
7233  return true;
7234  }
7235 
7236  if( rule == rule_state::BLACKLISTED ) {
7237  return false;
7238  }
7239 
7240  wlist.create_rule( to_match );
7241  return wlist.check_item( to_match ) == rule_state::WHITELISTED;
7242 }
7243 
7244 bool npc::item_whitelisted( const item &it )
7245 {
7246  if( !has_item_whitelist() ) {
7247  return true;
7248  }
7249 
7250  const std::string to_match = it.tname( 1, false );
7251  return item_name_whitelisted( to_match );
7252 }
7253 
7254 const json_talk_topic *get_talk_topic( const std::string &id )
7255 {
7256  auto it = json_talk_topics.find( id );
7257  if( it == json_talk_topics.end() ) {
7258  return nullptr;
7259  }
7260  return &it->second;
7261 }
